Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Josef' kiangah, “Pasian in hihte khempeuh nang hong lak khin ahih manin, nang banga thu ngaihsut siam leh a pil om lo hi;
nang in ka inn sungah ulian na hi ding a, nangma thupiak bangin ka mite khempeuh gamta ding uh hi; kumpi tokhom tawh kisai-in kei in nang' sangin ka lianzaw bek ding hi,” ci hi.
Faro in Josef' kiangah, “En in, Izipt' leitang tung khempeuhah nang kong koih khin zo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in a min gelhna zungbuh ama' khut tung panin suahkhia-in Josef' khut-ah bulhsak a, puan hoih mahmah tawh amah zemin, a ngawng-ah kham khainiang khat oksak hi;
ama' zom-a ulian ahihna tawh ama' leeng nihna tungah amah tuangsak hi; ama' mai-ah amaute kiko a, “Khuk din un!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Izipt leitang tung khempeuh a ukin amah koih hi.
Tua tham loin Faro in Josef' kiangah, “Keimah in Faro ka hi hi, nangma' thukim lohin Izipt leitang tung khempeuhah kuamah in a khut a khe nangawn uh liik lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Faro in Josef' min Zefenath-paneah phuak hi; amah in On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh kiteengsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Izipt gamsungah Josef zin kawikawi hi.
Izipt kumpipa Faro’ nasemin a tum ciangin Josef kum sawmthum pha hi. Faro’ omna panin Josef paikhia a, Izipt gamsung khempeuhah pai hi.
A kihauh kum sagih sungin leitang in tampi piangsak a,
Izipt gamah tampi a om lai takin amah in tua kum sagih sunga ante khempeuh khawm a, khuapite sungah an khol hi; a kiim-a lote panin khuapi sim-ah amah in an khol hi.
A teh ding a khawl dong zahin Josef in tuipi sehnel zahin antang tampi khol hi, bang hang hiam cih leh kiteh khin zo lo hi.
Kialpi kum hong tun’ ma-in Josef in On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh tapa nih nei hi.
Josef in a ta masa Manasseh phuak hi; amah in, “Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ka haksatna khempeuh leh ka pa’ innkuan khempeuh a mangngilhin hong bawl hi,” ci hi.
A nihna amah in Efraim phuak hi; “Bang hang hiam cih leh ka thuakna gamsungah kei a pungin hong bawl hi,” ci hi.
Izipt gamsunga a om kum sagih sung hauhna bei ta hi;
Josef' gensa bangin kum sagih kialpi hong kipan hi. Gam dang khempeuhah kialpi om hi; ahih hangin Izipt gamsung tengah an om hi.
Izipt gam khempeuh a kial ciangin, an ngenin mite Faro' tungah kiko uh hi; Faro in Izipt mite khempeuh' tungah, “Josef kiangah pai un; note tunga ama' hong cih bangin gamta un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gam khempeuhah kialpi a tun’ kim ciangin Josef in ankholna innte khempeuh hongin, Izipt mite' tungah zuak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt gamah kialpi nasia hi.
Tua tham loin, leitung khempeuhah kialpi nasia ahih manin, antang lei dingin Josef' kiangah leitung mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Izipt-ah an a omna thu Jakob in a theih ciangin, amah in a tapate kiangah, “Bang hangin khat leh khat ki-en na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.
Amah in, “En un, Izipt-ah an om hi ci-in ka za zo hi; eite si loin i nuntak nadingin paisuk un la, ei’ ading an va lei un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Izipt-ah an lei dingin Josef sanggamte sawm paisuk uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jakob in Josef’ sanggampa Benjamin, a sanggamte tawh paisak lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ama' tungah siatna tung kha ding ci-in lau hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kanaan gam sungah kial tung ahih manin a hong pai dangte tawh Israel’ tapate zong an lei dingin hong paikhawm uh hi.
Tu-in Josef in tua gamah a ukpa ahi hi; gam mi khempeuh tunga an a zuakpa amah ahi hi. Josef' sanggamte hong pai-in, a maitang uh lei lam ngatin ama mai-ah hong kun uh hi.

Josef in a sanggamte mu-in thei a, ahih hangin amah in mi dang bangin bawlin amaute' tungah khauh pau hi. “Koi pan-a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” amah in ci hi. Amaute in, “An lei dingin Kanaan gam panin hong pai hi ung,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in a sanggamte thei a, ahih hangin amaute in amah thei lo uh hi.
Josef in a mangin amaute a mat khitna a mangte phawk hi; amah in amaute' kiangah, “Note in thukan na hi uh a, hih gam thanemna en dingin hong pai na hi uh hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in ama' kiangah, “Hi lo hi, topa aw, an lei dingin na nasemte a hong pai hi ung.
Kote khempeuh in mi khat’ ta ka hi uh a, kote in a thutak ka hi uh hi, na nasemte in thukan hi lo uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Hi lo hi, hih gam ginat lohna en dinga hong pai na hi uh hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in, “Ko, nangma nasemte in sanggam pasal sawm-le-nih ka hi uh a, Kanaan gamsungah mi khat’ ta ka hi uh hi; en in, a moi pen tu ni hunin ka pa uh tawh om a, khat pen om nawn lo hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Josef in amaute' kiangah, “Note’ tunga kong gen bangin a hi mah hi, note in thukan na hi uh hi.
Hih thu tawh note hong kithei ding hi: Faro in a nungta ahih mah bangin na sanggam moi pen uh hih lai-ah hong pai kei leh hih lai mun panin note na paikhia thei kei ding uh hi.

Note’ sungah thuman om hiam ci-in a kimuh nading, na thugente uh a kitel nadingin note thong sungah na om lai takun note khat kisawl un la, na sanggampa uh hong paipihsak un; tua ahih kei leh Faro in a nungta ahih mah bangin note in thukan na hi taktak uh hi,” ci hi.
Amah in thong sungah ni thum sung amaute koih hi.
A ni thum ni-in Josef in amaute' kiangah, “Keimah in Pasian zaktak ka hih manin hih bangin gamta un, tua hi leh na nungta ding uh hi:
note in thuman mi na hih uh leh na thong sung uhah na sanggamte uh khat omsak lai un la, a dangte pai-in na innkuan a gilkialte’ adingin an pua un la,
na sanggam moi pen uh kei' kiangah hong paipih un; tua ciangin na kam gente uh kitel ding a, note na si kei ding uh hi,” ci hi. Amaute tua mah bangin gamta uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute khat leh khat in, “A taktak i sanggampa tawh kisai-in eite i mawh hi, amah in eite' kiangah hong thumin eite in a thu i ngaih loh ciangin amah a lungkhamna i mu hi; tua ahih ciangin hih lungkhamna eite' tungah hong tung hi,” kici uh hi.

Reuben in amaute dawng a, “Tangvalpa' tungah khial kei un ci-in note' tungah hong gen hi lo ka hi hiam? Ahih hangin nong ngai kei uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ama' sisan man hong tung ahi hi,” ci hi.
Amaute’ kikal-ah kamphen khat om ahih manin Josef in amau’ paute a tel lam amaute in thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute' kiang panin amah kihei-in kap hi; amah amaute' kiangah hong pai kikin amaute hopih hi. Amah in amau' kiang panin Simeon la-in amau’ muhna-ah amah hen hi.
Amau' ipte antang tawh dipsakin, a van sung uhah amau’ sum ciat koih kikin, lampi-a a nek ding uh an a piak nading Josef in thupia hi. Tua mah bangin amau’ adingin kihihsak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a late uh antang suan-in paikhia uh hi.
Amaute khat in a giahna panun a la gan-an pia dingin a van a suah leh, a van gong-ah a sum mu hi;

amah in a sanggamte' kiangah, “Ka sum kikoih kik hi; hih lai-ah ka van gong-ah om!” ci hi. Hih thu hangin amaute lungsi uh a, liingin amaute khat leh khat ki-en uh a, “Pasian in eite hih banga hong bawl bang ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Kanaan gamah a pa uh Jakob' kiang a tun’ uh ciangin, amaute tunga thu piang khempeuh gen uh a,
“Mipa, tua gam topa kote' tungah hong khauh pau-in, tua gam thukan-in kote hong ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangin kote in ama' kiangah, ‘Kote thuman mi ka hi uh a, kote thukan ka hi kei uh hi;
kote in ka pa uh' tapa, sanggam pasal sawm-le-nih ka hi uh hi; khat pen om nawn lo a, tu ni hunin a moi pen Kanaan gamah ka pa uh tawh om hi,’ ka ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin mipa, tua gam topa in kote' tungah, ‘Note thuman mi na hihna uh hih tawh ka thei ding hi: na sanggamte uh khat kei' kiangah nusia un la, na innkuan gilkialte adingin antang la un la, na lampi uhah pai un.

Na sanggam moi pen uh kei' kiangah hong paipih un; tua ciangin note thukan hi loin thuman mi na hihna uh ka thei ding a, note' kiangah na sanggampa uh hong khah-in hih gamsungah sum na bawl thei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Amau’ vante a suah ciangun, en in, a milip-un a sumte uh a van sung ciat uhah om hi; amaute leh a pa un amaute’ sum kihente a muh uh ciangin, lungkham uh hi.

A pa uh Jakob in amaute' kiangah, “Ka tate tawh kei nong kikhensak zo uh hi: Josef om nawn lo, Simeon om nawn lo, tu-in note in Benjamin na la ding uh hi; hihte khempeuh kei tungah hong tung khin hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben in a pa' kiangah, “Na kiangah amah kong paipih kik kei leh ka tapa nihte that in; kei hong ap in, nang' kiangah amah kong ciahpih kik ding hi,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in, “A sanggampa si a, amah bek om ahih manin note tawh ka tapa hong paisuk lo ding hi. Note’ pai nading na khualzinna uhah ama' tungah siatna tung khazenzen leh, dahna tawh ka sam kangte Leinuai-ah na paipih suk ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tu-in gamsungah kialpi nasia semsem hi.
Izipt gam panin a puak uh antang amaute in a gaih khit uh ciangin, a pa un amaute' kiangah, “Pai kik un la, eite’ ading an tawm khat va lei un,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Judah in ama' kiangah, “Mipa in thupi takin kote hong hilhkhol a, ‘Na sanggampa uh tawh nong ton kei uh leh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
Ka sanggampa uh hong zuisak lecin kote paisukin nang’ ading an ka lei ding uh hi;

ahih hangin amah nong zuihsak kei leh kote ka paisuk kei ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mipa in kote' kiangah, ‘Na sanggampa uh tawh nong ton kei uh leh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci hi.
Israel in, “Mipa kiangah sanggam dang khat nei ung, ci-in genin bang hangin kei hong hici bawlsiat na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.

Amaute in dawngin, “Mipa in kote’ thu leh ka sanggamte uh’ thu lim takin hong dong a, ‘Na pa uh a nungta lai hiam? Sanggam dang na nei uh hiam?’ hong ci hi. Ama' kianga ka gen uh hih dotnate ka dawnna uh ahi hi; ‘Na sanggampa uh hong tonpih suk un,’ amah in hong cih ding lam kote in bangci theih kholh ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci uh hi.
Judah in a pa Israel' kiangah, “Tangvalpa hong zuisak in la, nang leh ko leh i tate si loin i nuntak theih nadingin kote ding-in ka va pai ding uh hi.

Keimah in ama' adingin a kikham ka hi ding hi; kei’ khut sung panin amah nong kal ding hi. Keimah in amah nang' kiangah hong ciahpih kik loin na mai-ah kong koih kik kei leh, tua mawhna kei hong thuaksak tawntung in;
bang hang hiam cih leh zekai lo hi lehang tu-in nih vei i tung kik khin ta ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin a pa uh Israel in amaute' kiangah, “A tuaci bang ding a hih leh hih bangin gamta un: gamsunga singgah limci pente na ip sung uhah pua un la, mipa' tungah letsong-in lingsi tawm, khuaizu tawm, singnai, mor paknamtui, pistakhio gah leh almond gahte puaksuk un.
Na sum uh a zah nih pua un; na van gong uh a, a kikoih kik sumte pua kik un; a kikhial hi kha ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh zong sam-in ding un la, mipa' kiangah pai kik un;
amah in na sanggampa uh leh Benjamin hong ciahsak kik theih nadingin Vanglianpen Pasian in mipa’ mai-ah note hehpihna hong pia ta hen. Ka tate tawh ka kikhen leh a kikhen ka hi ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in letsong la-in, amaute in sum a zah nih leh Benjamin la uh hi; amaute ding-in Izipt-ah manlangin paisuk uh a, Josef' mai-ah ding uh hi.

Josef in amaute tawh Benjamin a muh ciangin, amah in a inn sung nasempa’ kiangah, “Mite inn sungah paipih in la, gan khat go-in an bawl in, bang hang hiam cih leh mite in sun ciangin kei tawh an ne ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Josef' sawl bangin mipa in sem a, mite Josef' innah paipih hi.

Josef’ innah kipaipih ahih manin lau uh a, amaute in, “Eite sila-in hong bawlin i late a mat theih nading, eite’ tungah thu hong zongin eite hong hih theih nadingin, a masa lai-a i van sunga sum kikoihte’ hangin eite hong kipaipih hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute Josef’ inn sung nasempa kiangah paito uh a, inn kongkhak-ah amah tawh kihoin,
“Aw, topa aw, an lei dingin khat vei kong pai uh hi;
ka giahna mun uh ka tun’ uh ciangin ka vante ka hong uh a, ka sumte uh a cingin ka van sung ciat uhah om hi; tua ahih ciangin kote in tua sumte kong puakik uh a,
an lei nadingin sum dang zong kong pua uh hi. Ka van sung uhah kua in sum koih ahi hiam ka thei kei uh hi,” ci uh hi.

Amah in dawng a, “Nuam takin om un, lau kei un; na Pasian leh na pa’ Pasian in note adingin na van sung uhah sum koih hi ding hi; keimah in note’ sum a cingin ka ngah khin hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute' kiangah Simeon paikhiatpih hi.
Mipa in Josef' innah amaute paipihin, amaute tui pia-in, amaute in a khe uh sil khinin, amah in amaute’ late gan-an a piak khit ciangin,
amaute in tua lai-ah an ne ding uh ci-in za uh ahih manin sun-in Josef hong pai ciangin a piak ding uh letsong bawl khol uh hi.
Innah Josef hong pai ciangin amau' puak letsongte inn sungah ama' kiangah paipih uh a, ama' mai-ah lei lakah kun uh hi.
Amah in amau’ omzia dong a, “Na gen uh puteek, na pa uh a dam hiam? Amah a nungta lai hiam?” ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nangma' nasem ka pa uh dam hi, amah nungta lai hi,” ci uh hi. Amaute in a lu uh kun uh a, zahtakna pia uh hi.
Amah khuadak to a, a nu' tapa Benjamin mu a, “Hih in kei' kianga nong gen uh na sanggam moi pen uh ahi hiam? Pasian in nang hong hehpih hen, ka ta!” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a lungsimin a sanggampa ngai lua ahih manin Josef manlangin paikhia a, a kah nading mun zong hi. Amah a inn dei sungah pai-in tua lai-ah kap hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a mai phiatin hong paikhia hi; amah ki-ip tawmin, “An hong pia un,” ci hi.

Amaute in amah, amah guakin nesakin, amaute amau guakin nesakin, amah tawh a ne Izipt mite in amau guak mahin ne hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt mite in Hebru mite tawh an ne khawm lo hi, tua bang hihna in Izipt mite’ adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ama' mai-ah amaute a suah hun tawh kizui leh a suak masapen pan a moi pen dong a khangnona tawh kizui-in tu uh hi; lamdangsakna tawh amaute khat leh khat ki-en uh hi.
Josef' sabuai tung panin amau tanh ciat kipia-in, ahih hangin Benjamin’ tanh pen amaute’ aa zah nga pha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ne-in dawn-in amah tawh lungdam uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a inn sung nasempa thupia a, “Mite’ van sungah amau’ puak zawh zakzah guang in la, amau’ sum ciat a van gong ciatah koih in la,
ka ngun hai pen an lei nadingin a sum tawh a moi pen’ van gong-ah koihsak in,” ci hi. Amah in Josef’ gen bangin hih hi.
Zingsang khua a vak phetin a late uh tawh mite kisawlkhia hi.

Amaute a pai khit, ahih hangin khuapi panin a nai lai-in, Josef in ama' inn sung nasempa' kiangah, “Kithawi in la, mite va delh in; amaute na phak ciangin amaute' kiangah, ‘Bang hangin a hoih pen a sia tawh hong thuk na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin ka ngun hai gu na hi uh hiam?
Ka topa in hih hai sung panin dawnin, hih tawh amah in thu thei hilo ahi hiam? Hih bangin na gamtat manun na khial uh hi,’ va ci-in,” ci hi.
Amah in amaute a phak ciangin amah in amaute' kiangah hih thute gen hi.
Amaute in ama' kiangah, “Bang hangin ka topa in thu hih bang gen ahi hiam? Nasemte tua banga gamta ding hi dek peuhmah lo hi.
En in, ka van gong uh a, ka muh uh sumte Kanaan gam panin nang' kiangah kong puakkik uh hi; tua ahih leh na topa’ inn panin ngun hita leh kham hita leh bangci guk ding ka hi uh hiam?
Na nasemte' sung pan tua hai a kimuhna penpen kithat hen la, kote zong ka topa’ sila ka hi ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Na cih bang uh hi ta hen: a kimuhna penpen ka sila hi ding a, no a dang teng mawhna na baang kei ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a milip-in a van uh lei lakah nga suk uh a, a milip-in a van uh suah uh hi.
Nasempa in zong a, a ham pen panin kipanin a moi pen tawh tawp hi; Benjamin’ van sungah a hai kimu hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a puan uh balkeek-in, a late uh a van suan ciatin, amaute khuapi-ah hong paikik uh hi.
Judah leh a sanggamte Josef' innah a tun’ ciangin, amah tua lai-ah na om lai hi; ama' mai lei lakah amaute puk uh hi.
Josef in amaute' kiangah, “Note’ gamtatna a bangci gamtat ahi hiam? Kei bang mi in hih bang thu ka theihna theilo na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.

Judah in, “Ka topa' tungah bang hong ci gen ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang thu gen ding ka hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh ko bangci kiphel theih ding ka hi uh hiam? Pasian in na nasemte’ mawhna mukhia hi; en in, kote leh hai a kimuhna-pa zong, ka topa’ sila ka hi uh hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Tua bangin hi dek lo ding hi. Hai a kimuhna mipa bek ka sila hi ding hi; note ahih leh, na pa’ kiang uhah nuam takin ciah un,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama' kiangah Judah paito-in, “Ka topa aw, hong thum ing, na nasempa nang' tungah kam khat thu hong gensak in la, na nasempa' tungah na hehna hong sosak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in Faro mahmah tawh a kibang na hi hi.
Ka topa in a nasemte nong dong a, ‘Pa hita leh sanggam pasal hita leh na nei uh hiam?” nong ci hi.

Kote in ka topa' kiangah, ‘Kote in a teek pa khat leh a teek zawh-a a neih sanggam pasal moi khat ka nei uh hi; ama' sanggampa si a, a nu’ tate sung pan amah bek om lai hi; a pa in amah it mahmah hi,’ kong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in na nasemte' kiangah, ‘Ka mit tawh amah ka muh theih nadingin kei' kiangah amah hong tonpih suk un,’ na ci hi.
Kote in ka topa' kiangah, ‘Tangvalpa in a pa nusia thei lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a pa nusia leh a pa si ding hi,’ kong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in na nasemte' kiangah, ‘Note tawh na sanggam a moi pen hong paisuk khop kei leh ka mai nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi,’ nong ci hi.
Tua ciangin na nasemte ka pa' kiangah ka paikik uh ciangin ka topa’ thugente ama' kiangah ka gen uh hi.
Ka pa un, ‘Pai kik-in eite’ ading an tawm va lei un, hong cih ciangin

kote in, “Ka paisuk thei kei uh hi. Ka sanggam moi pen uh ko tawh hong pai leh ka paisuk ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka sanggam moi pen uh ko tawh hong pai kei leh mipa’ mai ka mu kei ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin na nasempa ka pa un kote' kiangah, ‘Ka zi in kei tawh tapa nih a neih na thei uh hi;
khat in kei hong nusia a, amah kibalzan khin taktak hi, ka ci hi; tua huna kipan amah ka mu nawn kei hi.
Hih a khat zong kei' kiang panin na lak uh a, ama' tungah siatna a tun’ leh, dahna tawh ka sam kangte Leinuai-ah na paipih suk ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, na nasempa ka pa' kiangah ka pai ciangin, tangvalpa kote tawh hong ciah kei leh, ama' lungsim khempeuh tangvalpa’ tungah om ahih manin,
kote tawh tangvalpa a ciah lohna a muh ciangin amah si ding hi; na nasemte in na nasempa ka pa uh’ samkangte dahna tawh Leinuai-ah ka paipih suk ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasempa in tangvalpa’ adingin ka pa tungah a kikham ka hi a, ‘Nang' kiangah amah kong paipih kik kei leh tua mawhsakna ka pa’ muhna-ah ka nuntak tawntungin ka thuak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kong thum hi, ka topa’ sila dingin tangvalpa’ tangin na nasempa hong omsak in; a sanggamte tawh tangvalpa ciahkiksak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalpa kei tawh hong ton kei leh ka pa' kiangah bangci ciahkik theih ding ka hi hiam? Ka pa’ tungah a tung ding siatna ka en ngam kei ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama' kianga dingte khempeuh’ mai-ah Josef ki-ip zo nawn lo hi; “Ka kiang panin mi khempeuh paikhiasak un,” ci-in amah kiko hi. Tua ahih ciangin Josef in a sanggamte' tungah amah a kipulak ciangin kuamah dang om lo hi.
Amah a ging-in kap khia ahih manin Izipt mite in za hi; Faro’ innkuante in zong za hi.
Josef in a sanggamte' kiangah, “Keimah in Josef ka hi hi; i pa a nungta lai hiam?” ci hi. Ahih hangin ama omna-ah amaute maizum uh ahih manin a sanggamte in amah dawng thei lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in a sanggamte' kiangah, “Ka nai-ah hong pai un, hong thum ing,” ci hi. Amaute a nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Amah in, “Keimah in Izipt-ah na zuak uh na sanggampa Josef ka hi hi.
Tu-in hih lai-ah kei nong zuak manun lungkham kei un, nomau' tungah kihehtawm kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh nuntakna a hingsak dingin note’ mai-ah Pasian in kei hong sawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh gamsungah hih kum nih sung kialpi tung zo hi; lo khawh loh, an lak loh ding kum nga om lai hi.
Note adingin leitungah a om lai mi a hingsak ding leh note adingin a suakta mi tampi a kem dingin note’ mai-ah Pasian in kei hong sawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih lai-ah a hong sawl mi in note na hi kei uh hi, Pasian ahi hi; amah in Faro’ pa-in kei hong bawlin, ama' inn khempeuh’ topa leh Izipt gam khempeuh ukpa-in amah in kei hong bawl khin hi.
Manlangin i pa' kiangah ciah to un la, ama' kiangah, ‘Na tapa Josef in hih bangin ci hi, Pasian in Izipt khempeuh’ topa-in kei hong bawl khin hi; ka kiangah hong paisuk hen, zekai kei hen;
Goshen leitangah na teng ding a, nang leh na tate leh na tate’ tate leh na tuuhonte leh na bawnghonte leh na neih khempeuh tawh, nangmah in kei tawh na kinai ding hi;
hong tung ding kialpi kum nga om lai ahih manin tua lai-ah nang kong vaak ding hi; tua hi kei leh nang leh na innkuanpite leh na neih khempeuh in zawn’na na ngah ding uh hi,’ ci hi, ci un.
Note' kianga thu hong gen in keima' kam ahihna tu-in note’ mit-in nong mu uh hi, ka sanggampa Benjamin’ mit in zong hong mu hi.
Izipt-ah keima' liatna khempeuh leh note’ muhsa khempeuh i pa’ kiangah na gen ding uh hi. Manlang un la, hih lai-ah i pa hong paipih suk un,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Benjamin ngawng kawi-in a kap hi; Benjamin in zong amah ngawng kawi-in a kap hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte khempeuh ngawng kawi-in a kap hi; tua khit ciangin a sanggamte in amah hopih uh hi.
“Josef’ sanggamte hong pai,” cihna thu Faro’ inn sungah a kizak ciangin, tua thu in Faro leh a nasemte lungdamsak mahmah hi.
Faro in Josef' kiangah, “Na sanggamte' kiangah, ‘Hih bangin gamta un: na ganhingte uh van suan un la, Kanaan gamah paikik un;
i pa leh na innkuanpihte uh la un la, kei' kiangah hong pai un, Izipt gam a hoihpen mun note kong pia ding a, note in gam hoih sunga piangte na ne ding uh hi.’
Amaute zong thu pia in la, ‘Hih bangin gamta un: na tate leh na zite’ adingin Izipt gam panin leeng la un la, i pa hong paipihin hong pai un.
Izipt gam khempeuh a hoih penna nomau’ aa ahih ciangin na vante uh ngaihsutin nei kei un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Israel’ tapate tua mah bangin gamta uh hi; Josef in Faro’ thupiak mah bangin amaute leeng pia a, lampi-a a nek ding uh zong an pia hi.
Amah in amaute khempeuh tungah puan hoih silh khat ciat pia hi; ahih hangin Benjamin' tungah ngun shekel za thum leh puan hoih silh nga pia hi.
Amah in a pa' kiangah a nuai-ate khak hi: Izipt na hoihte a pua la sawm, antang, anlum leh lampi-a a pa’ nek ding an a pua lapi sawm puak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a sanggamte sawl khia a, amaute a paikhiat ciangin amah in maute' kiangah, “Lampi-ah kitawng kei un,” ci hi,
Tua ahih ciangin amaute Izipt panin paito uh a, a pa uh Jakob' kiang Kanaan gamah ciah uh hi.
Amaute in ama' kiangah, “Josef nungta lai a, amah in Izipt gam khempeuh tungah a ukpa ahi hi,” ci uh hi. Amah in amaute’ thugen um lo ahih ciangin a lung si hi.
Ahih hangin amaute’ tunga Josef gen kammalte ama' kiangah a gen ciang uh leh Josef in amah puak nadinga a khak leengte a muh ciangin, a pa uh Jakob’ lungsim hing kik hi;
Israel in, “Pha zo hi; ka tapa Josef nungta lai hi; ka sih ma-in pai-in amah ka mu ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel in a neih khempeuh tawh a khualzin kipanin Be-ersheba tungin, a pa Isaak’ Pasian’ tungah biak piakna pia hi.
Pasian in Israel tungah zan-in thu gen a, “Jakob, Jakob,” ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amah in, “Keimah in na pa’ Pasian ahi, Pasian ka hi hi; Izipt-ah paisuk ding lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh minam lian khatin tua lai-ah nang kong bawl ding hi.
Izipt-ah nang tawh kong paisuk ding a, tua ciangin zong keimah in nang kong paipih to kik ding hi; Josef' khut sungah na si ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Be-ersheba panin Jakob ding khia hi; Israel’ tapate in a pa uh Jakob, a tate uh, a zite uh, amah puak nadinga Faro in a khak leeng sungah pua uh hi.
Amaute in zong Kanaan gamsunga a lam uh a ganhingte uh leh a nate uh la-in, Jakob leh ama' suan-le-khakte ahi,
a tapate, ama tapate’ tapate, a tanute, a tapate’ tanute tawh Izipt-ah pai uh hi; amah in a suan-le-khakte khempeuh Izipt-ah paipih hi.
Tu-in hihte in Israel’ suan-le-khak, Izipt-ah a pai Jakob leh a tate’ min ahi hi. Jakob’ ta u pen Reuben
leh Reuben’ tapate: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron leh Karmi ahi hi.
Simeon’ tapate: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohah, Jakhin, Zohar leh Kanaan numei’ tapa Shawl ahi hi.
Levi’ tapate: Gershon, Kohath leh Marari ahi hi.
Judah' tapate: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez leh Zarah (ahih hangin Kanaan gamah Er leh Onan si hi); Perez' tapate in Hezron leh Hamul ahi hi.
Isaakhar’ tapate: Tola, Puvah, Iob leh Shimron ahi hi.
Zebulun’ tapate: Sered, Elon leh Jahle-el
(hihte in Paddan-aram-ah Jakob tawh a neih Leah’ tapate hi a, a tanu Dinah tawh ahi hi; a tapa leh a tanute a vekpi in sawmthum-le-thum ahi hi).
Gad’ tapate: Zifion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi, leh Areli ahi hi.
Asher’ tapate: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah leh a sanggamnu uh Serah ahi hi. Beriah’ tapate: Heber leh Malkhiel
(hihte in Laban in a tanu Leah tungah a piak Zilpah’ tapate ahi hi; amah in Jakob tawh hihte nei hi—mi sawm-le-guk ahi hi).
Jakob’ zi Rachel’ tapate: Josef leh Benjamin ahi hi.
Josef in Izipt gamah On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh Manasseh leh Efraim nei hi.
Benjamin’ tapate: Bela, Bekher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim leh Ard
(hihte in Jakob tawh a neih Rachel’ tapate hi a, a vekpi-in mi sawm-le-li ahi hi).
Dan’ tapa in Hushim ahi hi.
Naptali’ tapate: Jahze-el, Guni, Jezer, leh Shillem
(hihte in Laban in a tanu Rachel’ tungah a piak Bilhah in Jakob tawh a neih tapate ahi hi—a vekpi in mi sagih ahi hi).
Izipt gamah a pai Jakob’ aa ahi ama' suan-le-khak, Jakob’ tapate’ zite a kisim loin, a vekpi in mi sawmguk-le-guk ahi hi;
Josef in Izipt gamah a neih a tapate in nih ahi hi; Izipt gamah a pai Jakob’ innkuan khempeuh sawmsagih ahi hi.
Amah in ama' mai Goshen-ah amah lam a lak dingin Josef' kiangah Judah ma sawl hi; amaute Goshen gamah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in a leengte kithawisakin Goshen-ah a pa Israel dawn dingin paito hi; a pa a muh phetin ngawng kawi-in tawl khat sung kap hi.
Israel in Josef' kiangah, “Na maitang mu khinin nang na nuntak lai thei ka hih manin tu-in ka si zongin phamawh nawn lo hi,” ci hi.
Josef in a sanggamte leh a pa’ innkuanpite kiangah, “Kei paito-in Faro’ kiangah ka va gen ding a, ama' tungah, ‘Kanaan gam-a a om ka sanggamte leh ka pa’ innkuanpihte kei' kiangah hong pai hi;
amaute in gankemte ahih manin tuucing ahi uh hi; amaute in a tuuhonte uh leh a bawnghonte uh leh a neih khempeuh uh hong paipih uh hi,’ ka va ci ding hi.
Faro in note hong samin note' kiangah, ‘Na nasep uh bang ahi hiam?’ hong cih ciangin,

Goshen leitangah na ten’ theih nadingun note in, ‘Kote hita leh ka pate uh hita leh ko, na nasemte in ka neu uh a, kipan tu hun dongin gankemte ka hi uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt mite’ adingin tuucing peuhmah a kihhuai ahi hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Josef pai-in Faro kiangah, “Ka pa leh ka sanggamte a tuuhon uh leh a bawnghon uh leh a neih khempeuh uh tawh Kanaan gam panin hong pai uh hi; amaute tu-in Goshen gamah om uh hi,” ci-in gen hi.
A sanggamte' lak panin amah in mi nga la-in Faro’ kiangah paipih hi.
Faro in a sanggamte' kiangah, “Na nasep uh bang ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amaute in Faro’ kiangah, “Ka pate uh mah bangin na nasem kote in tuucingte ka hi uh hi,” ci uh hi.

Amaute in Faro’ kiangah, “Hih gamah tawl khat a om dingin kong pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Kanaan gamah kialpi nasia lua ahih manin tua lai-ah na nasemte’ tuuhonte ading lonona om nawn lo hi; tu-in kong thum uh hi, na nasemte Goshen gamah hong teengsak in,” ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Josef' kiangah, “Na pa leh na sanggamte na kiangah hong tung khin hi.

Izipt leitang khempeuh nangma' thu ahi hi; na pa leh na sanggamte lei hoihna penah teengsak in; Goshen leitangah amaute teengsak in; amaute' lakah a hih thei mi na muh leh ka ganhingte a kem dingin koih in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in a pa Jakob tumpihin Faro’ mai-ah koih a, Jakob in Faro thupha pia hi.
Faro in Jakob' kiangah, “Na nuntak kum bangzah pha ta a hi hiam?” ci hi.
Jakob in Faro' kiangah, “Tawl khat ka khualzin hun in kum za leh kum sawmthum ahi hi; ka nuntak hun tomin siatna bek om a, ka pate tawl khat a om sung uh a nuntakna hunte ban nai lo hi,” ci hi.
Jakob in Faro thupha pia a, Faro’ omna panin paikhia hi.
Tua ciangin Faro’ thu piaksa bangin Josef in leitang a hoih pen, Rameses leitang, Izipt gamsungah neihsa pia-in a pa leh a sanggamte teengsak hi.
Josef in a pa, a sanggamte leh a pa’ innkuanpihte khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an pia hi.
Tu-in gam khempeuhah an om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kialpi nasia mahmah a, kialpi hangin Izipt mite leh Kanaan mite vul gawp uh hi.
Amaute in antang a leina hangin, Izipt gamsung leh Kanaan gamsunga sum om khempeuh Josef in ngah khin hi; Josef in Faro’ innah sum paipih hi.

Izipt gamsung leh Kanaan gamsunga sum a bei khit ciangin Izipt mite khempeuh Josef' kiangah hong pai-in, “Kote an hong pia in; bang hangin na muhna-ah si ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sum uh bei ta hi,” ci uh hi.
Josef in dawngin, “Na ganhingte uh hong pia un, na sum uh bei ahih leh na ganhing khekna-in an kong pia ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Josef' kiangah a ganhingte uh paipih uh hi; Josef in sakolte, tuuhonte, bawnghonte, late khekna-in amaute an pia hi; a ganhingte uh khekna-in Josef in tua kum sung amaute an pia hi.

Tua kum a bei ciangin, a kum kik ciangin amaute ama' kiangah pai-in, ama' kiangah, “Ka sum uh a beikhitna ka topa uh tungah kong im kei ding uh hi; ganhing honte ka topa’ aa ahi hi; ka pumpi uh leh ka leitang uh cih sim loh ka topa’ muhna-ah bangmah om lo hi.

Bang hangin kote si-in ka leitang uh nangma' muhna-ah maimawk ding ahi hiam? Kote leh ka leitang uh an tawh hong lei in la, kote leh ka leitang uh Faro’ sila ka hi ding uh hi; leitang mawk val loin, kote si loin ka hin’ theih nadingun khaici hong pia in,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in Izipt gam khempeuh Faro’ adingin lei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kialpi nasia lua ahih manin Izipt mi khempeuh in a lote uh zuak uh hi. Leitang in Faro’ aa suak hi;
mihingte ahi leh, Izipt gam mong khat panin a mong khat dongin amah in sila-in bawl hi.

Siampite’ leitang bek amah in lei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite in Faro’ tung panin a kiciangtan zah an ngah uh a, amaute' tungah Faro in a piak tawh amaute nungta uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in a leitang uh zuak lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in mite' kiangah, “En un, tu ni-in note leh na leitang uh Faro’ adingin kong lei hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah no adingin khaici om a, note in leitang tungah na vawh ding uh hi.
An lak ciangin Faro' tungah seh-nga-suah-seh-khat na pia ding uh a, seh-nga-suah-seh-li pen lo-ah khaici ding, note leh na innkuanpihte uh leh na tate uh’ an dingin na tang ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nang in ka nuntakna uh nong honkhia khin zo hi: ka topa uh lungdam hen la, kote in Faro’ sila ka hi ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in seh-nga-suah-seh-khat nei ding hi cihna, tu ni donga a om, Izipt leitang tawh kisai-in Josef in ngeina kip khatin bawl hi; siampite’ leitang bek Faro’ aa suak lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Goshen gam, Izipt leitangah Israel teeng hi; tua sungah amaute in neihsa ngah uh a, pungin tampi tak pha uh hi.
Izipt gamah Jakob kum sawm-le-sagih nungta hi; tua ahih ciangin Jakob’ nite, a nuntak kumte in kum za leh kum sawmli-le-sagih ahi hi.

Israel a sih ding hun a nai ciangin, amah in a tapa Josef samin ama' kiangah, “Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh, ka phei nuai-ah na khut koih in la, hehpih tak leh citakin kei nong bawl ding thu ciam in. Izipt-ah kei hong vui kei in la,
ka pate tawh ka tawlngak khawm ciangin Izipt panin kei hong puakhia in la, amau’ kivuina munah kei hong vui in,” ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Na gensa bangin ka hih ding hi,” ci hi.
Amah in, “Kei' tungah hong kiciam in,” ci hi; amah ama' tungah kiciam hi. Tua ciangin Israel a ciangkhut dawnah amahmah kingam suk hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin, “En in, na pa a ci na hi,” ci-in Josef' kiangah kigen hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a tapa nihte Manasseh leh Efraim paipih hi.
Jakob kiangah, “Na tapa Josef na kiangah hong pai hi,” ci-in kigen hi; tua ciangin Israel in a tha saan-in lupna tungah tu hi.
Jakob in Josef' kiangah, “Kanaan gam Luz-ah Vanglian Pasian kei' tungah hong kilangin kei thupha hong pia a,
kei' kiangah, 'En in, nang hong pungsakin, tampi hong phasakin, mihing hon khatin hong bawlin, nang’ khit cianga na suan-le-khakte tunga a neih dingin hih leitang ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in, Izipt-ah nang' kiangah kong pai ma-in Izipt gam sungah nang' sung pan-a a suak na tapa nihte keima’ aa ahi hi; Reuben leh Simeonte mah bangin Efraim leh Manasseh in keima’ aa hi ding hi.
Amaute khit ciangin nang’ sung pan-a suak tate in nangma’ aa hi ding hi; amau’ gamh luahna-ah amau’ sanggamte’ min tawh amaute kilo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Paddan panin ka pai lai-in, Efrath tun’ madiak, Kanaan gam lam kal-ah ka dah nadingin Rachel si hi; Efrah (Bethlehem) paina lampi-ah amah ka vui hi,” ci hi.
Israel in Josef' tapate a muh ciangin amah in “Hihte kua ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Josef in a pa’ kiangah, Pasian in hih lai-ah kei hong piak ka tapate ahi hi,” ci hi. Amah in, “Kong thum hi, amaute thupha ka piak theih nadingin ka kiangah hong paipih in,” ci hi.
Tu-in Israel’ mitte a khanghamna hangin mang a, amah in khua mu thei lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Josef in ama' kiangah amaute paipih hi; amah in amaute nam-in kawi hi.
Israel in Josef kiangah, “Na maitang mu dingin ka kingaihsun kei hi; en in, Pasian in na tate zong kei hong musak hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in amaute a khuk panin lakhia-in, amahmah lei lam nga-in kun hi.
Josef in amaute gel la-in, Efraim ama khut tak lam Israel’ vei lam khutah, Manasseh ama veilam khut, Israel’ tak lam khutah paipih hi.
Israel in a taklam khut zanin a nauzawpa Efraim’ lutang tungah nga a, Manasseh a ta upa ahih manin, a khut kipaih pehsakin Manasseh’ lutang tungah a veilam khut nga hi.
Amah in Josef thupha pia-in, “Ka pate Abraham leh Isaak in a na a sep sak Pasian, tu ni dongin ka nuntak tawntung tuu bangin lam hong pi Pasian,

siatna khempeuh panin kei hong tankhia vantungmi in hih tangvalte thupha pia in; amaute' sungah keima' min leh ka pa Abraham leh Isaak’ min kizomsak in; leitung laizang ah amaute mi honpi khatin khangsak in,” ci hi.
A pa in a tak lam khut Efraim’ lutang tungah a koih Josef in a muh ciangin tua in amah lungkim losak hi; Efraim lutang panin Manasseh’ lutang tungah koih dingin amah in a pa’ khut la hi.
Josef in a pa' kiangah, “Hilo hi, ka pa aw; bang hang hiam cih leh hih pen a suak masa ahi hi; na taklam khut ama' lu tungah koih in,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin a pa in nial a, “Ka thei hi, ka ta aw, ka thei hi; amah zong mi khat suak ding a, amah zong lian ding hi; ahi zongin a naupa amah sangin lianzaw ding a, a suan-le-khakte in minam lianpi khat suak ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua ni-in amaute thupha pia a, “Note in Israel sungah thupha na kipia ding uh a, ‘Pasian in Efraim leh Manasseh bangin note hong bawl hen,’ kici ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Manasseh’ mai-ah Efraim koih hi.
Tua ciangin Israel in Josef kiangah, “En in, kei a si ding ka hi ta hi, ahih hangin Pasian in nang tawh hong om ding a, na pate’ leitangah nang hong paipih kik ding hi.
Tua tham loin, ka namsau leh ka thal tawh Amor mite’ khut tung panin ka lak mual pang khat, na sanggamte’ tung sangin nang' tungah kong pia zaw hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in a tapate sam a, “A hong tung ding hunte ah note tunga hong tung ding thu kong gen theih nadingin note hong kikhawm un.
Jakob’ tapate aw, hong kikhawm un la za un, na pa Israel’ thu ngai un.
Reuben, nang in ka ta upa, ka vangliatna leh ka thahatna gah, kiphatsakna ah ka tungtuan’na, vangliatna ah ka tungtuan’na na hi hi.
Tui bangin kip loin, na tungtuang kei ding hi, bang hang hiam na cih leh na pa’ zi na luppih hi; tua ciangin na ninsak hi – ka lupna ah na paito hi.
Simeon leh Levi-te in unau hi a, a hiam uh ngongtat nadingin zang uh hi.
Amau’ kikhopna-ah ka pai kei ding a, amau’ pawl tawh ka kizom kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a hehna uhah amaute in mi that uh a, amau' kiphatsakna tawh amaute in bawngtalte zagui sattat uh hi.
Amau’ sinsona in lauhuai a, amau’ hehna kihtak huai hi, ciamsiatna ngah ta uh hen! Jakob sungah amaute ka khenthang ding a, Israel sungah amaute ka thehthang ding hi.
Judah, na sanggamte in nang hong phat ding a, na galte’ ngawng na heek ding a, na sanggamte na mai-ah hong kun ding uh hi.
Judah in humpinelkai tawh kibang hi; ka ta aw, na matsa ganhing na nekna panin na paito hi. Amah kun suk a, humpinelkai-pa leh humpinelkai-nu bangin lum hi; kua in amah phong ngam ding ahi hiam?
Judah kiang pan kumpi ciangkhut paikhia lo ding, ukpa’ ciangkhut zong a khe kikal pan paikhia lo ding, a neipa' kiangah a tun’ mateng, mite’ thuman’na ama' tungah om ding hi.
A sakolno leenggui-ah khihin, a lano leenggui hoih pen-ah khihin, amah in a puante leenggah zu sungah sawpin a puansilhte leenggah tuisan sungah sawp hi;
ama' mitte leenggahzu sangin vom zaw ding a, a hate bawngnawi sangin paak zaw ding hi.
Zebulun in tuipi gei-ah teeng ding hi; amah in teembaw khawlmun suak ding a, Sidon ciangah a gamgi om ding hi.
Issakhar in a hat la hi a, vangik nih kikal-ah lum hi;
tawlngakna mun a hoihna leh leitang a nopna mu hi; tua ahih ciangin a pua dingin a liangko niamsak a, sawl zawh thu-a nasepna tawh sila suak hi.
Israel minamte khat bangin Dan in a mite thu khen ding hi.
Dan in lampi-ah gulpi hi ding a, sul gei-ah gulgu nei hi ding hi, sakol’ khetul petin a tuangpa nungkiat hi.
Na hotkhiatna ka ngak hi, Topa aw.
A buluhte in Gad sim ding a, ahih hangin amah in amaute khetul su ding hi.
Asher’ an lim ding a, amah in kumpi anlimte bawl ding hi.
Naftali in a kikhah sakhipi hi a, sakhino suakkhiasak hi.
Josef in a gah pha leenggui hi a, cik tui gei-a a gah pha hiang ahi hi; a hiangte kulh tungah zam hi.
Thal tawite in nakpi takin amah sim-in, amah thal tawh kap a, nasia takin gimsak hi;
ahih hangin ama' thal liing loin om a, a khutte kizaptel sak hi, Jakob’ Vanglian Pa’ khut (Israel Suangpi, Tuucingpa’ min),
nang hong huh ding na pa’ Pasian’ tunga om vantung thuphate, nuai-a tuithukna sunga om thuphate, ang sung leh gil sung thuphate tawh nang thupha hong pia ding Vanglian Pasian tawh.
Na pa’ thuphate in tawntung mual liante’ thupha, tawntung mual neute’ tamna sangin vanglian zaw hi; tuate in Josef’ lutang tung leh a sanggamte' kiang panin a tuamkoihpa’ tungah om ta hen.
Benjamin in a ne bakbak keivom hi a, zingsangin a sa matsa ne-in, nitakin a ngahsa teng hawm hi,” ci hi.
Hihte khempeuh in Israel minam sawm-le-nihte ahi hi; hih in amau tawh kituak ciatin thupha a piak, a pa in amaute thupha pia-in a gente ahi hi.

29-30 Tua ciangin amah in amaute thu hilh a, amaute’ kiangah, “Kei in ka mipihte’ kiangah a kigawm ding ka hi ta hi; kivui nading mun-in neih dingin Abraham in Hit mi Efron’ tung panin a lo tawh a lei khop, Kanaan gam, Mamre nisuahna lam-a om, Makpelah lo-a leihawm, Hit mi Efron’ lo-a leihawm sungah ka pate tawh hong vui un.
Tua lai munah amaute in Abraham leh a zi Sarah vui uh hi; tua lai munah amaute in Isaak leh a zi Rebekah vui uh hi; tua lai munah keimah in Leah ka vui hi –
lo leh tua sunga om leihawm Hit mite' tungpanin a kilei ahi hi,” ci hi.
Jakob in a tapate thuhilh a man khit ciangin’ a lupna tungah lai-tat a, a nunung pen a hu sang a, ama' mihingte kiangah kigawm hi.
Tua ciangin Josef a pa' tungah pukin, ama' tungah kap a, amah nam hi.
A pa a muat loh nadingin a bawl dingin Josef in a nasem zatui siamte thu pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin zatui siamte in zatui tawh Israel bawl uh hi;
zatui tawh bawlna nasep hun tampi kisam ahih manin tua nasep ni sawmli sung sep ding kisam hi. Izipt mite ama' hangin ni sawmsagih sung kap uh hi.
Ama' hangin kahna hun a bei ciangin Josef in Faro’ innsung upate' kiangah, “Tu-in note' mai-ah maipha ka ngah leh Faro’ kiangah thu nong va gensak ding uh kong thum hi.

Ka pa in kei hong kiciamsak a, ‘Kei a si ding ka hita hi: Kanaan leitangah kei adingin ka khuatsa han sungah kei nong vui ding hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kei hong paitosak in la, ka pa hong vuisak in, ci-in kong thum hi; tua ciangin kei kong ciahkik ding hi, va cihsak un,” ci hi.
Faro in dawngin, “Paito in la, nang hong kiciamsak bangin na pa vui in,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pa vui dingin Josef paito hi; amah tawh Faro’ uliante khempeuh, a inn sung upate, Izipt gam upate khempeuh zong,
Josef innkuante khempeuh, a sanggamte, a pa’ innkuante mah bangin paito uh hi; a tate uh, a tuuhonte uh leh a ganhing honte bek uh Goshen gamah kinusia hi.
Tua lai munah amah tawh leengte leh sakol tuangte zong paikhawm to uh hi; tua lai-a paite tam mahmah hi.
Amaute Jordan gun gal khat, Atad’ buhcilna phual a tun’ uh ciangin, nakpi takin dahna tawh thuum uh hi; amah in a pa hangin ni sagih sung dahna hun bawl hi.

Tua gam-a teeng Kanaan mite in, Atad’ buhcilna-ah tua banga kahna a muh uh ciangin, amaute in, “Hih in Izipt mite’ adingin a nasia thuumna ahi hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun in Abelmizraim kici hi; tua in Jordan gungal khat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute a thupiak bangin ama' tapate in ama adingin bawlsak uh hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh ama' tapate in Kanaan gamah amah pua-in, kivui nading mun-a neih dingin Abraham in Hit mi Efron’ tung panin a lo tawh a lei khop, Mamre nisuahna lam-a om, Makpelah mun-a lo sunga leihawm sungah vui uh hi.
Amah in a pa a vui khit ciangin, a sanggamte leh a pa vui dingin amah tawh a pai khempeuhte tawh Izipt-ah Josef ciahkik hi.
Josef' sanggamte in a pa uh a sih khitna a muh uh ciangin, amaute in, “Josef in eite hong mudahin ama' tunga siatna i bawl khempeuh amah in hong thukkik kha ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Josef' kiangah thu puak uh a, “I pa in a sih ma-in hih bangin thu hong pia a,

‘Josef' kiangah hih bangin ci un. Na sanggamte’ thupalsatna leh a khialna na maisak in, kong thum hi, bang hang hiam cih leh nang' tungah amaute in siatna hong bawl uh hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang' tungah kong thum uh hi, i pa’ Pasian’ nasemte’ thupalsatna hong maisak in,” ci uh hi. Amaute in ama' kiangah thu a gen ciangin Josef kap hi.
A sanggamte zong hong pai-in ama mai-ah puk uh a, “En in, kote in nangma' nasemte ka hi uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Josef in amaute' kiangah, “Lau kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Pasian’ za-ah om ka hi hiam?
Note in ahih leh, kei’ tungah a sia dingin na ngaihsun uh hi; ahih hangin Pasian in tu ni hun-a mah bangin mi tampite a nuntak theihna a pian’ nadingin a hoih dingin a ngaihsut ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lau kei un; note leh na tate uh adingin an kong pia ding hi,” ci hi. Amah in tua bangin kip gen pha kikin amaute hehnem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef, amah leh a pa’ innkuan tawh Izipt-ah teeng uh hi; Josef kum za leh kum sawm nungta hi.
Josef in khang thumna ahi Efraim’ tate mu hi; Manasseh’ tapa Makhir’ tate zong Josef’ inn sung mahah suak uh hi.

Josef in a sanggamte' kiangah, “Kei a si ding ka hi ta hi; ahih hangin note’ kiangah Pasian hong pai-in hong huh ding a, hih leitang panin amah in Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob' tunga a ciamsa leitang-ah note hong paikhiatpih to ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in Israel tapate’ kiciamna bawlin, “Note' kiangah Pasian hong hawh ding a, note in hih lai panin ka guhte na pua to ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kum za leh kum sawm pha-in Josef si hi; amaute in zatui tawh amah a muat loh nadingin bawl uh a, Izipt hankuang sung khatah amah kikoih hi.
Jakob tawh Izipt-ah a hong pai, amau’ innkuan ciat tawh ahi, Israel’ tapate’ minte in:
Reuben, Simeon, Levi, leh Judah,
Issakhar, Zebulun, leh Benjamin,
Dan leh Naftali, Gad leh Asher ahi hi.
Jakob’ suan-le-khakte khempeuh mihing sawmsagih ahi hi; Josef pen Izipt-ah na om khin zo hi.
Tua ciangin Josef leh a sanggamte leh tua khang mi khempeuh si uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel suan-le-khakte pung-in nakpi takin khang uh hi; amaute tampi pha-in nakpi takin a vangliatna uh khang hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute tua gamah dim uh hi.
Tu-in Josef a thei lo kumpi thak khat Izipt gamah hong khang hi.
Amah in a mihingte' kiangah, “En un, Israel mite eite’ adingin tam lua-in thahat lua uh hi.

Hong pai un, amaute hong tam kha ding uh ahih manin ngaihsut siamna tawh amaute hih ni, eite' tungah gal hong om leh amaute in i galte pawlin eite hong do-in hih gam panin taikhia kha ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute nasepna tawh a gimsak dingin amaute' tungah nasem ukte koih uh hi; amaute in Faro’ adingin vankoihna Pithom leh Ra-amses khuapite lam uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute a kinenniam ciangin amaute tampi pha zaw-in kizelhthang zaw uh hi. Izipt mite in Israel mite kihta uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel mite gim mahmahin nasemsak uh a,
buan leh leiseek tawh a haksa nasepna leh lo sungah nasep namkim khempeuh tawh amau’ nuntakna haksasak uh hi; amaute’ sepna khempeuhah amaute in gim mahmahin semsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Izipt kumpipa in khat’ min in Shifrah kici-in a dang khat min in Puah a kiciHebru mi naudomte' kiangah,
“Hebru numeite nau domin, nausuahna tutphah tungah a tu na muh uh ciangun, tapa ahih leh a naungek na that ding uh hi; ahih hangin tanu ahih leh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh a, Izipt kumpipa in amaute a thupiak bangin gamta lo uh hi, nau pasalte nungtasak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Izipt kumpipa in naudomte sam in, amaute' kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin gamta-in, nau pasalte nungtasak na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.

Naudomte in Faro’ kiangah, “Hebru numeite in Izipt numeite tawh a kibat loh hang ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thadim uh a, amau' kiangah naudomte a tun’ ma-in amaute na suak khin pahpah uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in naudomte lim bawl hi; mite khangin a thahatna uh khang hi.
Naudomte in Pasian zahtak ahih manin amah in amaute' tungah suan-le-khak a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in ama' mihing khempeuh thupia a, “Hebru mite sung panin tapa a suak khempeuh Nail gun sungah na khia ding uh a, ahih hangin tanu khempeuh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tu-in Levi’ suan-le-khakte khat in Levi numei khat zi-in la hi.
Numei gai-in tapa khat nei hi; amah in nau hoih khat hi ci-in a muh ciangin, kha thum sung seel hi.

Amah in naungek a seel zawh nawn loh ciangin ama adingin pumpeng tawh kibawl lawh khat phansak a, tua lawh pen buan leh kultal tui tawh zut hi; amah in tua sungah naungek sialin gun gei-a phaikungte' lakah koih hi.
Amah bang a kicih hiam cih a thei dingin a gamla mun khatah a sanggamnu ding hi.
Tu-in Faro’ tanu kisil dingin gun-ah hong pai a, a numei-nasemte gun gei-ah pai uh hi; amah in phaikungte' lakah a lawh mu a, tua lawh la dingin a numei-nasem sawl hi.
Amah in a hon’ ciangin naungek mu hi; en in, naungek kap hi. Tua nu in amah hehpih a, “Hih in Hebru mite’ ta khat ahi hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamnu in Faro' tanu' kiangah, “Keimah pai-in Hebru numeite’ lak panin nang adingin naupang hong khoisak dingin naucing khat ka va sapsak ding hiam?” ci hi.
Faro’ tanu in ama' kiangah, “Pai in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin numeino pai-in naupang’ nu va sam hi.
Faro’ tanu in ama' kiangah, “Hih naupang la in la, kei adingin hong khoisak in, na thaman kong pia ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin nupi in naupang la-in khoi hi.
Naupang khang a, amah in Faro’ tanu' kiangah paipih a, amah in tua nu’ tapa suak hi; amah in a min Moses phuak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Tui sung panin amah ka kaikhia hi,” ci hi.
Ni khat, Moses a khan’ khit ciangin, ama' mipihte' kiangah pai-in amau’ nasep haksatnate mu hi; Izipt mi khat in ama' mipihte khat ahi Hebru mi khat a sat mu hi.
Amah khuadak kawikawi-in, kuamah mu lo ahih manin amah in Izipt mipa thatin sehnel sungah seel hi.
A zing ciangin amah a paikhiat ciangin, en in, Hebru mi nih na kilai uh hi; amah in a gamta khial mipa' kiangah, “Bang hangin na lawm sat na hi hiam?” ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Kote' tungah ulian ding leh thukhen dingin kua in nang hong koih ahi hiam? Izipt mipa na thah bangin nang in keimah thah ding hong sawm na hi hiam?” ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses lau a, “A thu kithei taktak hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Faro in tua thu a zak ciangin Moses thah dingin zong hi. Ahih hangin Faro’ kiang panin Moses tai-in Midian gamah om hi; amah tuikhuk gei khatah tu hi.
Tua lai takin Midian siampipa in tanu sagih nei hi; amaute hong pai-in tuitawi uh a, a pa uh’ tuuhonte tui pia dingin kuangzawn dim uh hi.
Tuucingte hong pai-in amaute hawlkhia hi; ahih hangin Moses dingto-in amaute huh a, a tuuhonte uh tui piaksak hi.
A pa uh Re-u-el kiangah amaute a tun’ ciangun amah in, “A bangci-a tu ni-a hong hici ciah baih na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.
Amaute in, “Izipt mi khat in tuucingte khut sung panin kote hong honkhia-a, ko adingin tui nangawn hong tawisakin tuuhonte tui pia hi,” ci uh hi.
Amah in a tanute' kiangah, “Amah koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Bang hangin tua mipa nusia na hi uh hiam? Amah in an hong nek theih nadingin va sam un,” ci hi.
Tua mipa tawh a om khop dingMoses lungkim a, amah in Moses' tungah a tanu Zipporah pia hi.
Tua nu in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Gershom phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Gam dangah peemta ka hi hi,” ci hi.
Tua ni tampi hun sung kikalin Izipt kumpipa si hi. Israel mite a salsuahna sung uh-ah thumin, huhna ngenin kiko khia uh a, a salsuahna sung uh-ah amau’ kikona Pasian' kiang tung hi.
Pasian in amau’ thumna za-in, Pasian in Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob tawh a thuciamna phawk hi.
Pasian in Israel mite mu a, Pasian in amaute’ omzia lunghimawh hi.
Tu-in Moses in Midian siampi ahi, a sungpa Jethro’ tuuhon kem hi; amah in a tuuhon gamlak nisuahna lamah paipih a, Pasian’ mual ahi Horeb tung hi.
Sawlbawk meikuang sung panin ama' tungah Topa’ vantungmi in kilang hi; amah khuadak a, en in, sawlpang kuang hi, ahih hangin kangtum lo hi.
Moses in, “Bang hangin sawlpang kangtum lo hiam, kei pai-in hih a lamdang ka muh ka va en ding,” ci hi.
Tua thu thei dingin amah a paina Topa in a muh ciangin, sawlpang kawm panin Pasian in amah sam a, “Moses, Moses!” ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A nai-ah hong pai kei in; na khe panin na khedapte suahkhia in, bang hang hiam cih leh nangma' din’na mun in lei siangtho ahi hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Keimah in na pa’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaak’ Pasian, leh Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,” ci hi. Moses in ama' maitang hum hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian a et ding amah lau hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Izipt-ah a om ka mihingte’ gimna mu khinin a uk nasem ukte hangin amau’ kikona ka za khin hi; amau’ thuaknate ka lunghimawh a,

Izipt mite’ khut sung panin amaute khahkhia-in, tua leitang panin amaute lakhia-in a hoih a tanzau leitang, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitang, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite’ omna-ah amaute paipih dingin kong paisuk hi.
Tu-in, en in, Israel mite’ kikona kei' kiang hong tung khin a, Izipt mite in amaute a netniamna ka mu khin hi.
Hong pai in, nang in ka mihingte ahi Israel' tapate Izipt panin na paikhiatpih theih nadingin Faro’ kiangah nang kong sawl ding hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Pasian' kiangah, “Faro' kiangah pai-in Izipt panin Israel mite a paikhiatpih dingin kei in kua ka hi hiam?” ci hi.

Amah in, “Nang tawh kong om taktak ding hi; hih in nangma adingin nangmah kong sawlna lim hi ding hi: nangmah in Izipt panin mihingte na paikhiatpih khit ciangin, nang in hih mual tungah Pasian’ na na sem ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Pasian' kiangah, “Israel mihingte' kiangah kei va pai-in amaute' kiangah, ‘Na pate uh Pasian in note' kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ va ci leng, amaute in, ‘Ama' min bang ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dong leh, amaute’ tungah bang ci ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Pasian in Moses’ kiangah, “KEIMAH ka hi hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Israel mihingte' tungah hih thu gen in, ‘KEIMAH a kici pa in note' kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ ci in,” ci hi.

Pasian in zong Moses' kiangah, “'Hih thu Israel mihingte' tungah gen in, "Topa, na pate’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaak’ Pasian, leh Jokob’ Pasian in note' kiangah kei hong sawl hi," ci in: hih in keima' min hi tawntung a, tua ahih manin keimah in khang tawntunga phawk ding ka hi hi.

Pai in la, Israel upate kaikhawmin amaute' kiangah, ''TOPA, na pate uh’ Pasian, Abraham, Isaak leh Jakob’ Pasian keima' tungah hong kilang khinin, 'Note leh Izipt gam sungah note' tungah hong kibawlna ka mu khin hi;

Izipt gimna panin note hong lakhia-in Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Pere mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite’ leitang, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitangah note kong paipih ding ka kiciam hi,' ci hi," va ci in.

Amaute in nangma' thu hong ngai ding uh hi; nang leh Israel upate Izipt kumpipa' kiangah pai-in ama' tungah, "Topa ahi Hebru mite’ Pasian in kote hong dawntuah zo hi; tu-in kong thuum uh hi, Topa ka Pasian uh tungah biakna ka piak theih nadingun ni thum khualzinna gam lakah kote hong paisak in," va ci un.
Khut vanglian khat in thatang hat thu tawh a hih kei buang leh Izipt kumpipa in note hong paisak loh ding ka thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in ka khut zan-in tua sunga ka hih ding nalamdangte tawh Izipt ka vat gawp ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah in note hong paisak ding hi.
Keimah in Izipt mite’ muhna-ah hih mihingte maipha ka pia ding hi; note na paikhiat uh ciangin, a hawm guakin na pai kei ding uh hi,

numei peuhmah in a vengte leh ama' inn sunga om pak mite' kiang panin ngun leh kham tawh kibawl kizepnate leh puante ngen ding uh a, na tapate uh leh na tanute uh tungah tuate na koih ding uh hi, tua bangin note in Izipt mite’ na na sut ding uh hi,”' ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in dawngin, “Ahih hangin en in, amaute in kei hong um loin ka thu hong ngai lo ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘Nang' tungah Topa hong kilang lo hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Topa in ama' kiangah, “Na khut sunga om bang ahi hiam?” ci hi. Amah in, “Ciangkhut,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “lei lakah lawn in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in lei lakah lawn a, gulpi khat suak hi; tua gulpi' kiang panin Moses tai hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Na khut zan in la, a mei-in man in,” ci hi—tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin man a, ama' khut sungah ciangkhut suakkik hi—
“Amaute in a up theih nadingun Topa, amaute’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaak’ Pasian leh Jakob’ Pasian in nang' tungah hong kilang khin zo hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama' kiangah, “Na khut na ang sungah koih in,” ci kik hi. Amah in a khut a ang sungah koih hi; amah in a lakkhiat ciangin, en in, a khut phak a, vuk bangin pak hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Na khut na ang sungah koih kik in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut a ang sungah koih kik hi; amah in a lak khiat ciangin, en in, ama' ci-le-sa dangte mah bangin dam kik hi.
Pasian in, “Amaute in nang hong up kei a, lim masa a thudon kei leh zong, amaute in lim nunung um kha ding uh hi.

Amaute in hih lim nihte nangawn um loin na thu hong thudon kei leh, nangmah in Nail gun panin tui pawl khat la-in lei keu tangah na sung ding hi; Nail gun panin na lak ding tui in lei keu tungah sisan suak ding hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Topa' kiangah, “Oh, ka Topa aw, tu-ma-siah hita leh, na nasempa' tungah thu na gen-a kipan hita leh, keimah in thugen ka siam kei hi; ka kam pau ol-in, ka pau awk hi," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama' kiangah, "Kua in mipa’ kam bawl ahi hiam? Kua in amah pau thei losak, bilngongsak, musak, mittawsak ahi hiam? Topa ahi keimah hilo ka hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in pai in, keimah in na thugenna-ah kong huh ding a, na thugen ding nang kong hilh ding hi,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Oh, ka Topa aw, hong thum ing, mi dang khat sawl zaw in,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses’ tungah Topa heh a, amah in, “Levi mi na sanggampa Aaron om hilo ahi hiam? Amah in hoih takin thu a gen theihna ka cian theih hi; en in, nangmah dawn dingin amah hong paikhia a, amah in nang hong muh ciangin a lungsim sungah amah kipak ding hi.
Nangmah in ama' kiangah thu na gen ding a, a thugen dingte ama' kam sungah na koih ding hi; keimah in na thugenna uh-ah kong huh ding a, na hih ding uh kong hilh ding hi.
Amah in nang' tangin mite' tungah thu gen ding hi; amah in nang adingin kam hi ding a, nang in ama' tungah Pasian bang na hi ding hi.
Nangmah in limte na bawl nading ahi hih ciangkhut na khut sungah na tawi ding hi,” ci hi.

A sungpa Jethro' kiangah Moses pai-in ama' kiangah, “Hong thum ing, Izipt-ah ka sanggamte' kiangah kei hong ciahkik sakin amaute a nungta lai uh hiam hong musak in,” ci hi. Jethro in Moses' kiangah, “Nuam takin pai in,” ci hi.
Midian gam sungah Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Izipt-ah paikik in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma' nuntakna hong that nuam mite khempeuh si khin ta uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a zi leh a tapate la a, la khat tungah amaute tuangsakin, Izipt gamah paikik hi; Moses in ama' khut sungah Pasian’ ciangkhut tawi hi.

Topa in Moses' kiangah, “'Izipt-ah na ciahkik ciangin, nangma' hih theih dingin vangliatna kong piaksa nalamdangte khempeuh Faro’ mai-ah na hih ding thei in; ahih hangin keimah in ama' lungsim ka khauhsak ding a, amah in mite paisak lo ding hi.
Nangmah in Faro' kiangah, "Topa in hih bangin ci hi, Israel in ka tapa a suak masa hi a,
nangma' kiangah, 'Amah in kei hong biak theih nadingin ka tapa paisak in,' kong ci hi; amah paisak ding na nial leh, en in, na tapa a suak masa ka that ding hi,’ ci in,"'" a ci hi.
Lampi-ah a giahna khatah Topa in Moses dawntuah a, thah dingin amah zong hi.
Tua ciangin Zipporah in meisuang khat la-in a tapa’ vun dawn atkhiat sakin, tua tawh Moses’ khe nuh a, “Nang in kei' tungah sisan tawh zipipa na hi taktak hi!” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amah tuaci omsak hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in, "Vun-atna hangin sisan tawh zipipa na hi hi,” ci hi.
Topa in Aaron kiangah, “Moses dawn dingin gam lakah pai in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in, Pasian’ mual-ah amah dawnin amah nam hi.
Topa in amah a sawlna thute khempeuh leh ama' sep dinga a sawl limte khempeuh Moses in Aaron’ tungah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Moses leh Aaron pai-in Israel mite’ upate khempeuh kaikhawm uh hi.
Topa in Moses' kianga a gensa thute khempeuh Aaron in gen a, mite’ muhna-ah limte bawl hi.
Mite in um uh hi; Israel mite' kiangah Topa lungnuam loin, amau’ thuaknate amah in a muh khitna thu amaute in a zak uh ciangin, amaute in a lu uh kunin bia uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Faro kiangah Moses leh Aaron pai-in, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Amaute in gam lakah kei adingin pawi khat a kham theih nadingun ka mite paisak in,’ ci hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Faro in, “Ama' aw ngai-in Israel ka paisak dingin Topa in kua ahi hiam? Topa ka thei kei hi, tua tham loin Israelte ka paisak kei ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hebrute’ Pasian in kote hong dawntuah zo hi; hong thum ung, amah in natna ahih kei leh namsau tawh kote hong hih kha ding ahih manin, ni thum paina gam lakah kote hong paisakin Topa ka Pasian uh tungah biakna hong piasak in,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Izipt kumpipa in amaute' kiangah, “Moses leh Aaron aw, bang hangin amau’ nasepna panin mite paikhiasak ding na hi uh hiam? Na nasepnate uh-ah pai un,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in, “En un, tu-in hih gam mite tam a, amau’ nasepnate panin amaute natawlngasak uh hi!” ci hi.
Tua ni mahin Faro in nasem ukte leh a nasem mapite thu pia a,
“Tu-ma-siah-a bangin, leiseek bawl nadingin mite' tungah buhtu na pia nawn kei ding uh hi; amaute paisak un la, amau mah buhtu khawm tawmsak un.

Ahih hangin tu-ma-siah-a a leiseek bawl zah uh amaute na bawlsak ding uh hi, bangbang hita leh na khiam kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thadah uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute kiko-in, ‘Kote hong paisakin ka Pasian uh tungah biakna hong piasak un,’ ci uh hi.
Amaute in na semin zuauthute a don loh nadingin mihingte' tungah nasep haksa zaw suan un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nasem ukte leh nasem mapite paikhia-in mite' tungah, “Faro in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Note buhtu kong pia kei ding hi.
Note pai un la, na muhna peuhpeuh uh-ah na buhtu ding uh va zong tawm un; ahih hangin na nasep uh them khat zong hong kikhiam lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a buhtu dingun buhkung a kaikhawm dingin Izipt gam khempeuhah mite kikhenthang uh hi.
Nasem ukte in kin ngaihsut uh a, “Buhtu a om hun mah bangin na nasep uh ahi na nisim nasep uh zo un,” ci uh hi.
Israel mi nasem mapi, Faro’ nasem ukte in amaute uk dingin a koih mite kisatin, “Bang hangin tu ciang dong, leiseek bawl ding na nasep khempeuh uh hih khin nai lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in kidong hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi nasem mapite hong pai-in Faro' kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasemte hih bangin hong bawl na hi hiam?

Na nasemte' tungah buhtu hong kipia lo hi, ahi zongin amaute in ko tungah, ‘Leiseek bawl un!’ hong ci hi. En in, na nasemte hong kisat hi; ahih hangin khialhna pen nangma' mite’ tung mah-ah om hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Note na thadah uh hi, note na thadah uh hi; tua ahih ciangin note in, ‘Hong paisak un la, Topa' tungah biakna hong piasak un,’ na ci uh hi.
Tu-in pai un la, nasem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note buhtu hong kipia lo ding hi, ahi zongin leiseek a mal ngeina zah mah na piakhia ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in, “Bangbang hi ta leh ni sim-a leiseek na seek zah uh khiam lo ding,” a cih ciangin, amaute thu haksapi sungah om a hih lam uh Israel mi nasem mapite in mu uh hi.
Amaute Faro’ kiang panin a paikhiat ciangun, amaute a na ngak Moses leh Aaron tawh kituak uh hi;

amaute in, “Topa in note hong enin thu hong khen hen, bang hang hiam cih leh Faro leh a nasemte’ muhna-ah kote a khial nong suaksak uh a, kote thah nadingin amau' khut sungah namsau khat na koih uh hi,” amaute tungah ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa' lamah Moses kihei kikin, “Topa aw, bang hangin nangmah in hih mite' tungah siatna bawl na hi hiam? Bang hangin kei hong sawl peuhmah na hi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma' min suangin Faro’ kiangah thugen dingin ka pai khit-a kipan, amah in hih mite' tungah siatna bawl a, nangmah in na mihingte na honkhia het kei hi,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “Tu-in Faro’ tungah ka bawl ding na mu ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a thahat ka khut hangin amah in ut lopipi-in amaute sawlkhia ding hi, hi hi, amah in ut lopipi-in a thahat ka khut hangin ama' leitang panin amaute hawlkhia ding hi,” ci hi.
Pasian in Moses' kiangah, “Keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Abraham, Isaak leh Jakobte' tungah Vanglian Pasian-in ka kilang a, ahih hangin Topa ahi keima' min tawh amaute' tungah kei ka kitheisak kei hi.
Amaute tawl khat sung a teen’na leitang ahi Kanaan gam amaute' tungah pia dingin amaute tawh ka thuciamna zong ka kipsak hi.
Tua tham loin Izipt mite in sal-a a neih Israel mite’ thumna ka za zo a, ka thuciamna ka phawk zo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite' tungah, ‘Keimah in Topa ka hi hi, Izipt mite’ na nasepna uh panin note kong paikhiatpih ding hi, amau’ sal hih na panin note kong khahkhia ding hi, a kizan khut leh thukhenna nasep lian tawh note kong tanh ding hi,
keima' mi dingin note kong la ding a, keimah in note’ Pasian ka hi ding hi; Izipt mite’ vangik nuai panin note a hong paikhiatpihpa, Topa na Pasian uh ka hihna note in na thei ding uh hi.
Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakobte’ tungah khutlaam a, ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih ding hi; note' tungah tua leitang na neih dingun kong pia ding hi. Keimah Topa ka hi hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Moses in tua mah bangin Israel mite' tungah gen hi; ahih hangin amau’ lungsim kitapzanna leh gitlohna sungah a salsuahna uh hangin amaute in Moses’ thu ngai lo uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Pai-in va tum in la, ama leitang panin Israel mite a paikhiatsak nading Izipt kumpipa Faro’ kiangah gen in,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Topa kiangah, “En in, Israel mite in ka thu hong ngai lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin bangci-in thugen a siam lo keima' thu Faro in hong ngai ding ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Ahih hang in Topa in Moses leh Aaron' tungah thugen a, Izipt gam panin Israel mite a paikhiatpih nadingin Israel mite leh Izipt kumpipa Faro' tungah thu a gen ding hanthawn hi.
Hihte in amau’ innkuan lutangte ahi hi; Israel’ ta a suak masa Reuben’ tapate: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron leh Karmi hihte in Reubente beh ahi hi.
Simeon’ tapate: Jamuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakhin, Zohar leh Kanaan numei’ tapa Shawl; hihte in Simeonte beh ahi hi.
Hihte in amau khang tawh kizui-in Levi tapate min ahi hi: Gershon, Kohath leh Merari hi a, Levi nuntak kumte in kum za leh sawm-thum-le-sagih ahi hi.
Gershon’ tapate: amau’ innkuan tawh kizui-in Libni leh Shimei ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapate: Amram’ Izhar, Hebron leh Uzziel hi a, Kohath’ nuntak kumte in kum za leh sawmthum-le-thum ahi hi.
Merari’ tapate: Mahli leh Mushi ahi hi. Hihte in amau’ khang tawh kizui-in Levite beh ahi hi.
Amram in ama' pa’ sanggamnu Jokhebed zi-in la a, tua nu in amah tawh Aaron leh Moses nei hi. Amram’ nuntak kumte in kum za leh sawmthum-le-sagih ahi hi.
Izhar’ tapate: Korah, Nefeg leh Zikri ahi hi.
Uzziel’ tapate: Mishael, Elzafan leh Sithri ahi hi.
Aaron in Amminadab’ tanu, Nahshon’ sanggam nu ahi Elisheba zi-in la hi; tua nu in amah tawh Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar nei hi.
Korah’ tapate: Assir, Elkanah leh Abiasaf; hihte in Korahte beh ahi hi.
Aaron tapa Eleazar in Putiel’ tanute khat zi-in la hi; tua nu in amah tawh Finehas nei hi. Hihte in a innkuan kuanin Levi mite’ beh lutangte ahi hi.
“Izipt gam panin Israel mite ami’ honpi-in paikhiatpih in,” Topa in a cihna mite in hih Aaron leh Moseste ahi hi.
Izipt panin Israel mite paikhiatpih nading thu Izipt kumpipa Faro tunga thugente in amaute hi a, hih Moses leh hih Aaron zong ahi hi.
Izipt gamah Moses kiangah Topa in thu a gen ni-in,
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Keimah in Topa ka hi hi; nang' tunga kong gen khempeuh Izipt kumpipa Faro tungah gen in,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Topa' kiangah, “En in, keimah in thugen a siam lo mi ka hi hi; tua ahih ciangin bangci-in Faro in ka thu hong ngai ding ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Thei in, Faro’ tungah Pasian bangin nang kong bawl hi; na sanggampa Aaron in na kamsangpa hi ding hi.
Nang kong thupiak khempeuh na gen ding hi; ama' leitang panin Israel mite a paikhiatsak nadingin Faro' tungah na sanggampa Aaron in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in Faro’ lungsim ka khauhsak ding a, Izipt gamah ka limte leh nalamdangte ka tamsak hangin,

Faro in nang' thu hong ngai lo ding hi; tua ciangin keimah in Izipt tungah ka khut ka nga ding a, thukhenna nasepna lianpite tawh Izipt gam panin ka mi honpi, Israel mite ahi ka mihingte ka paikhiatpih ding hi.
Keimah in Izipt' tungah ka khut zan-in amaute' lak panin Israel mite ka paikhiatpih ciangin Izipt mite in keimah in Topa ka hihna thei ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Moses leh Aaron in tua mah bangin hih uh hi; Topa in amaute a thupiak bangin amaute in hih uh hi.
Tu-in amaute in Faro' tungah thu a gen lai takun Moses kum sawmgiat pha a, Aaron kum sawmgiat-le-thum pha hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,

“Faro in note' kiangah, ‘Note a thutak na hihna uh nalamdang khat tawh hong lak un,’ hong cih ciangin nangmah in Aaron’ kiangah, ‘Gulpi khat a suah theih nadingin na ciangkhut la in la, Faro’ mai-ah khiasuk in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro kiangah Moses leh Aaron pai-in Topa’ thupiak bangin hih uh hi; Aaron in Faro leh a uliante' mai-ah a ciangkhut lawn suk a, gulpi khat suak hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in mi pilte leh aisan siamte sam hi; amau’ Izipt mitphial siamte in zong amau’ siamna tawh tua bang teek mahin bawl thei uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a milip in a ciangkhut uh khiasuk ciat a, tuate gulpi vive suak hi. Ahih hangin Aaron’ ciangkhut in amau’ ciangkhutte valh tum hi.
Topa’ gensa bangin Faro’ lungsim khauh lai a, amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “Faro’ lungsim khauh hi, amah in mite paisak nuam lo hi.
Amah gun-ah a pai lai takin zingsangin Faro kiangah pai in; Nail gun gei-ah amah ngak in la, gulpi a suak na ciangkhut pen mah na khut sungah tawi in.

Nangmah in ama' kiangah, ‘Topa, Hebrute’ Pasian in nangma' kiangah kei hong sawl a, “Gam lakah amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingun ka mite paisak in; en in, nangmah in na mang nai kei hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih bangin ci hi, “Keimah in Topa ka hihna hih tawh na thei ding hi: en in, ka khut sunga om ciangkhut tawh Nail gun sunga om tui ka sat ding a, tua tui in sisan suak ding hi,
Nail gun sunga ngasa si-in, Nail gun uih ding a, Izipt mite in Nail gun panin tui dawn ding kih ding uh hi,’ ci hi, ci-in gen in,” ci hi.

Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Aaron' kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Na ciangkhut la in la, sisan a suah theih nadingin Izipt tuite, amau’ gunte, amau’ luite, amau’ bualte' tung leh amau’ tuili khempeuhte' tungah na khut zan in; Izipt gam sunga sing beel leh suang beel khempeuh sung nangawnah sisan om ding hi,’ ci in,” ci hi.
Moses leh Aaron in Topa’ thupiak bangin hih uh hi; Faro leh ama uliante’ muh-in amah in ciangkhut vik to-in Nail gun sunga om tui sat a, Nail gun sunga om tui khempeuh sisan suak hi.
Nail gun sunga ngasate si hi; Nail gun uih a, Izipt mite in Nail gun panin tui dawn thei lo uh hi; Izipt gamsung khempeuhah sisan om hi.
Ahih hangin Izipt mitphial siamte in amau’ siamna tawh tua bangmah bawl thei uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Faro’ lungsim a khauh ngei mahin khauh a, Topa’ gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.
Faro kihei-in a inn sungah pai a, amah in a lungsim nangawnah tua thu ngaihsutin nei nawn lo hi.
Amaute in Nail gun tui dawn thei lo uh ahih manin Izipt mite khempeuh in Nail gun kiim tengah tui dawn ding to uh hi.
Topa in Nail gun a sat zawh ni sagih pha ta hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' tungah, “Faro kiangah pai in la ama' tungah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi, “Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.
Ahih hangin amaute na paisak kei leh, en in, na gam khempeuh uiphukte tawh ka gimsak ding hi;

Nail gun in uiphukte tawh kidim ding a, tuate in na inn sung, na lupna inndei sung, na lupna tung, na nasemte leh na mihingte’ innte sung, na meikhukte leh na annel mekna kuang sungte-ah hong pai ding uh hi;
uiphukte in nang' tung leh na mite leh na nasemte khempeuh' tungah hong pai ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' tungah, “Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Gunte, luite, tuilite' tungah na ciangkhut tawh na khut zan in la, Izipt leitang tungah uiphukte paisak in!’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron in Izipt tuite' tungah a khut zan hi; uiphukte hong pai-in Izipt leitang tuam hi.
Ahih hangin mitphial siamte in amau' siamna tawh tua bangmah bawl thei uh a, Izipt leitang tungah uiphukte omsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses leh Aaron samin, “Kei leh ka mite' kiang panin uiphukte a lakkhiat nadingin Topa' tungah thum un; Topa' tungah biakna pia dingin mite ka paisak ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Faro' kiangah, “Nail gun sung cih sim loh, nangma' kiang leh na innte panin uiphukte a bei nadingin nang leh na nasemte leh na mite’ adingin ka thum theih nadingin a hun khat seh in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Zingciang,” ci hi. Moses in, “Topa ahi kote’ Pasian tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi ci-in na theih nadingin nangma' cih bang hi ta hen.
Nang leh na innte leh na nasemte leh na mite' kiang panin uiphukte paikhia ding uh hi; Nail gun sung bekah om ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro kiang panin Moses leh Aaron paikhia uh hi; Faro' tungah a tun’saksa uiphuk tawh kisai thu Moses in Topa' tungah ko hi.
Topa in Moses’ thugen bangin hih hi; innte leh huang sung leh lote panin uiphukte si hi.
Amaute in a lom lomin tuate khawm uh a, gamsung teng uih hi.
Ahih hangin nopna a om kik lam Faro in a muh ciangin, amah in a lungsim khauhsak a, Topa’ gensa bangin amau’ thu ngai lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' tungah, “Aaron' kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Izipt gamsung khempeuhah thokang a om dingin na ciangkhut zan in la leivui sat in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua mah bangin hih uh hi; Aaron in a ciangkhut tawh a khut zan-in, leivui sat a, mihing' tung leh ganhing' tungah thokang hong om hi; Izipt gamsung khempeuhah leivui teng thokang suak hi.
Mitphial siamte in amau’ siamna tawh thokang pian’sak ding sin uh a, ahih hangin amaute in hih thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mihing leh ganhing' tungah thokangte om hi.
Mitphial siamte in Faro' kiangah, “Hih in Pasian’ nasepna ahi hi,” ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Faro’ lungsim khauh a, Topa’ gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, ‘Zingsangin tho baihin amah gun-ah hong pai ding Faro ngak in, ama' kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi, “Amaute in keimah a hong biak theih nadingun ka mite paisak in.

Tua bang hi loin, ka mite na paisak kei leh, en in, nang leh na nasemte leh na mite' tung leh na innte' sungah tho honpite kong sawl ding hi; Izipt mite’ innte leh tuate’ din’na leitang zong tho honpite tawh kidim ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua ni ciangin keimah in hih leitungah Topa ka hihna na theih nadingin tho honpite a om loh nadingin ka mihingte a ten’na Goshen leitang keimah in ka tuam koih ding hi.
Tua bangin keima' mite leh nangma' mite a kilamdan’na khat ka bawl ding hi. Zing ciangin hih lim hong om ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in tua mah bangin hih hi; Faro' innsung leh ama' nasemte' innte sungah tho honpite hong pai a, Izipt gamsung khempeuh thote’ hangin leitang kisia hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses leh Aaron sam a, “Pai un, hih gamsungah na Pasian' tung uh-ah biakna pia un,” ci hi.

Ahih hangin Moses in, “Tua banga hih ding kituak lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt mite’ adingin a deihhuai lo biaknate kote in Topa ka Pasian uh tungah ka pia ding uh hi. Izipt mite’ adingin a deihhuai lo biaknate amau’ muhna-ah pia le ung, amaute in kote suang tawh hong deng ding uh hilo ahi hiam?
Kote in ni thum paina gam lakah pai-in ama' hong thupiak ding bangin Topa ka Pasian uh tungah biakna ka va pia ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in, “Gam lakah Topana Pasian uh tungah biakna pia dingin note kong paisak ding hi; ahih hangin gamlapi-ah na pai kei ding uh hi. Kei adingin hong thumsak in,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in, “En in, nang' kiang panin kei paikhia-in Faro' kiang pan, a nasemte' kiang pan leh a mite' kiang panin tho honpite zingciang a paikhiat theih nadingin Topa' tungah thu ka ngen ding hi; ahi zongin Topa' tungah biakna pia dingin mite paisak lohna tawh Faro hong zuau-tat kik nawn kei in,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro' kiang panin Moses paikhia-a Topa' tungah thungen hi.
Topa in Moses’ nget bangin hih a, Faro' kiang, a nasemte' kiang leh a mite' kiang panin tho honpite lakhia hi; khat zong om nawn lo hi.
Ahih hangin Faro in hih hunin zong a lungsim khauhsak lai a, mite paisak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' tungah, “Faro' kiangah pai in la ama' kiangah, ‘Topa, Hebrute’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, “Amaute in keimah a hong biak theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in amaute paisak ding nialin amaute na let lai leh,
en in, lo sunga om ganhingte ahi, sakolte, late, kalaohte, bawnghonte leh tuuhonte' tungah a nasia mahmah gimna Topa’ khut in tungsak ding hi.
Israel mite aa khempeuh khat beek a sih loh nadingin Israel’ ganhingte leh Izipt’ ganhingte kikalah Topa in a kilamdan’na khat bawl ding hi,” ci hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in a hun khat seh a, “Zing ciangin Topa in gamsungah hih na hong sem ding hi,” ci hi.
A zing ciangin Topa in hih na bawl hi; Izipt mite’ ganhing khempeuh si a, ahih hangin Israel mite’ ganhing khat zong si lo hi.
Faro in a en dingin mi sawl hi, en in, Israel’ ganhing khat zong si lo hi. Ahih hangin Faro’ lungsim khauh lai a, amah in mite paisak lo hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron' kiangah, “Meiphualpi panin khut dimin vut la un la, Faro’ muh-in vantung lamah Moses in lawn hen.
Tua in Izipt gam khempeuhah leivui nel suakin, Izipt gamsung khempeuhah mihing leh ganhing tungah meimatum suakin puakkham ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in meiphualpi panin vutte la-in, Faro mai-ah ding uh a, Moses in tuate vantung lamah lawnin, tuate in mihing leh ganhing tungah meimatum suakin puakkham hi.
Mitphial siamte in meimatum hangin Moses dem zo nawn lo uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mitphial siamte leh Izipt mite khempeuh in meimatum vei uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, Topa in Moses' tunga a gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Zingsangin tho baih in la, Faro’ mai-ah ding-in ama' kiangah, “Hebru mite’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, “Amaute in keimah a hong biak theih nadingin ka mihingte paisak in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khempeuhah kei tawh a kibang khat beek om lo hi ci-in na theih nadingin hih hunin na sungtawng dong leh na nasemte leh na mihingte' tungah ka gimnate khempeuh kong tungsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in keimah in ka khut zanin natna tawh nang leh na mihingte hong vat gawpin, leitung panin note hong kibeisak thei hi;
ahih hangin leitung khempeuhah keima' min a kipulak theih nadingin nang' tungah ka vangliatna lah ding deihna-in nang kong nungtasak hi.
Ka mihingte' tungah nang kiliansak lai-in amaute na paisak kei hi.
En in, zing ciang tu bang hunin Izipt gam a kisat-a kipanin tu hun dongin tua bang a kimu ngei lo a tam mahmah gialpi ka kiasak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mi sawl in la, na ganhingte leh gamlak-a na neihte khempeuh a muanhuai bukna-ah koih in; bang hang hiam cih leh gialpi in inn-ah a kipaipih lo, gamlak-a om mihing leh ganhing tungah kia ding a, amaute si ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro’ nasemte’ lak panin Topa’ thu a zahtak mi in ama' silate leh a ganhingte inn-ah taisak hi;
ahih hangin Topa'thu a don lo mi in ama' silate leh a ganhingte gamlakah nusia hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Izipt gamsung khempeuh a, mihing leh ganhing leh gamlak kungte khempeuh' tungah gialpi a kiat theih nadingin vantung lamah na khut zan in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in vantung lamah a ciangkhut zan hi; Topa in vanging leh gialpi puak a, leitungah meikuang tai suk hi. Topa in Izipt gamsungah gialpi zusak hi;
Izipt gam minam khat a suah khit-a kipanin tua bang a om ngei lo, a tam mahmah gialpi leh gialpi lakah mei a kuangzalzal tawntung om hi.
Gialpi in Izipt gam sunga a om mihing leh ganhing, na khempeuh deeng gawp hi; gialpi in gamlak kung khempeuh deeng gawp a, gamlak singkung khempeuh deengtan hi.
Israel mite a omna Goshen gam bekah gialpi kia lo hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in mi sawlin Moses leh Aaron samsak a amaute' kiangah, “Tu tungin ka khial hi; Topa man hi, kei leh ka mihingte ka khial uh hi.
Topa' tungah thum in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih vanging leh gialpi kicing zo hi; note kong paisak ding a, note na khawl nawn kei ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Moses in ama' kiangah, “Khuapi panin ka paikhiat khit phetin Topa’ lamah ka khut ka zan ding hi; leitung in Topa’ aa hi ci-in na theih nadingin vanging tawpin gialpi om nawn lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin nang leh na nasemte in ahih leh, Topa Pasian na zahtak nai lohna uh ka thei hi,” ci hi.
(Anthul kungte leh mangbuhham kisia hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mangbuhhamte a vuih laitak hi a, anthul kungte a pak laitak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mangbuh leh mangbuhmante sia lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tuate khangham nai lo hi.)
Tua ahih ciangin Faro' kiang pan khuapi pua-ah Moses paikhia a, Topa’ lamah a khut zan hi; vanging leh gialpi tawp a, leitungah guah bua nawn lo hi.
Ahih hangin guah leh gialpi leh vanging a khawlna Faro in a muh ciangin amah khial lai a, amah leh a nasemte in a lungsim uh khauhsak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Moses'tung tawn-a a gensa bangin Faro’ lungsim khauh a, amah in Israel mite paisak lo hi.

1-2 Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' tungah, “Faro kiangah pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute' lakah hih keima' limte ka lah theih nading leh keimah in Izipt mite gaamtak a, ka bawlna leh amaute' lakah bang limte bawl khin cihna thu na tate leh na tute’ zakna-ah na gen theih nading leh; keimah in Topa ka hihna na theih nadingin ama' lungsim leh a nasemte’ lungsim ka khauhsak hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Faro' kiangah Moses leh Aaron pai uh a ama' kiangah, “Hebru mite’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Ka mai-ah nang na kiniamkhiat nading bang tan vei nial ding na hi hiam? Amaute in keima' na hong sep theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite paisak ding na nial leh, en in, zing ciangin na gam sungah kauphete kong paipih ding a,
