kuamah in leitang a muh theih loh nadingin tuate in lei maitang khempeuh tuam ding uh hi; gialpi khit cianga nang adinga a om laite amaute in ne ding uh hi; amaute in gamlak-a a po nangma singkung khempeuh ne ding uh hi,

nangma innte leh na nasemte khempeuh leh Izipt mite’ innte khempeuh-ah dim ding uh hi; na pu na pate uh leitungah a pian uh a, kipan tuni donga tua bang a muh ngei lohte uh hi ding hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Tua ciangin amah kihei-in Faro’ kiang panin paikhia hi.

Faro’ nasemte in ama' kiangah, “Eite' tungah hih mipa bang tan vei thangzak hong hi ding ahi hiam? Amaute in amau’ Pasian, Topa a biak theih nadingun mite paisak in; Izipt a siatna thei tel nai lo na hi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro' kiangah Moses leh Aaron kipaipih kik hi; amah in amaute' kiangah, “Pai un, Topa, na Pasian uh va bia un; ahih hangin kua teng pai ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Moses in, “Ka khangnote uh leh ka khanghamte uh tawh ka paikhawm ding uh hi; ka tapate uh, ka tanute uh, ka tuuhonte uh leh ka bawnghonte uh tawh ka pai ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ adingin pawi khat ka kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute' kiangah, “Note leh na naupangte uh kong paisak taak leh note tawh Topa om ta ve! En un, note in ngimna hoih lo na nei uh hi.
Tua bang hilo ding! Note’ lak panin pasalte pai un la, Topa va bia un, bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen nomau’ ut ahi hi,” a ci hi. Faro’ omna panin amaute kihawlkhia hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Mose' kiangah, “Amaute Izipt leitang tungah hong omin, gialpi in a deen’ baang kung khempeuh a nek theih nadingin kauphete sapna-in Izipt leitang tungah na khut zan khia in,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Izipt leitang tungah a ciangkhut zan a, Topa in tua sun tawntung leh tua zan tawntung leitang tungah nisuahna huih nungsak hi; zingsang ciangin nisuahna huih in kauphete hong tun’ khin hi.
Tua ma-siah kauphe hon tua banga a tam a om ngei lo, cik mah ciangin zong a omkik ngei lo ding, Izipt leitang tung khempeuhah kauphe hong om a, Izipt gam buppi-ah om uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in leitang bup maitang tuam uh a, leitang mial hi, amaute in leitang tunga kung khempeuh leh gialpi’ deen’ baang sing gah khempeuh ne uh hi; Izipt leitang tung khempeuhah gamlak singkung hita leh kungno hita leh a hing khat beek om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses leh Aaron nawh sap a, “Topana Pasian' tung leh nangma' tungah ka khial khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khialhna hong maisak in, tu-a khat vei bek, kong thum hi, keima' tung panin hih sihna a lakkhiat ding Topa na Pasian tungah thum in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro' kiang panin amah pai khia-in Topa' tungah thum hi.
Topa in nitumna huihpi hat mahmah khat nungsak a, tua huih in kauphete laamto-in San Tuipi sung den’na hi; Izipt gam sungah kauphe khat zong om nawn lo hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in Israel mite paisak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Mite in khuamial sung a zawt nading, Izipt leitang tungah khuamial a om theih nadingin vantung lamah na khut zan in,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in vantung lamah a khut zan a, Izipt leitang tung khempeuhah ni thum sung khuamial sahpi om hi;
ni thum sung amaute khat leh khat kimu thei lo uh a, ama' omna panin kuamah tho khia thei lo hi; ahih hangin Israel mite in amau’ ten’na-ah khuavak nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses samin, “Pai in, Topava bia un; na tate uh zong note tawh hong pai thei ding hi; na tuuhonte uh leh na bawnghonte uh omsak lai un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Topa ka Pasian'tung uh-ah ka piak theih nadingun biak piakna leh meihal biakna kote nong neihsak kul hi.

Ka ganhingte uh zong kote tawh a pai kul hi; ganno khat zong kinusia lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ka Pasian uh ka biak nadingun tuate ka paipih ding uh hi, a mun ka tun’ matengun bang pen tawh Topa bia ding cih ka thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in amaute paisak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in ama' kiangah, “Kei' kiang panin kihem in; nang kidawm in: ka maitang hong mukik nawn kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka maitang nong muh ni-in nang na si ding hi,” a ci hi,
Moses in, “Na cih bang hi ta hen! Na maitang kong mukik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Faro leh Izipt tungah gimna khat ka tungsak lai ding hi; tua khit ciangin hih lai mun panin amah in note hong paisak ding hi; amah in note hong paisak ciangin note hong hawlkhia mang khin ding hi.
Pasal peuhmah in a vengte' kiang pan, numei peuhmah in zong a vengte' kiang panin ngun leh kham kizepnate a nget theih nadingun mite’ zakin thugen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Izipt mite’ muhna-ah mipa maipha pia hi. Tua tham loin, Moses pen Izipt leitang tung, Faro’ nasemte’ muhna leh mite’ muhna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Moses in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi. Zankim pawl-in Izipt mite' lakah ka pai ding hi;
kumpi tokhom tunga a tu Faro’ tacil-a kipanin an gawina nung-a a om numei-nasem’ tacil dong leh ganhing tacil khempeuh, Izipt gam sungah tacil khempeuh si ding hi.
Cik mah-a tua bang a om ngei lo, cik mah ciangin zong a omkik ngei lo ding kahna lianpi Izipt leitang tung khempeuhah om ding hi.
Ahih hangin Izipt mite leh Israel mite a kilamdangin Topa in bawl hi ci-in na theih nadingun Israel mite, mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh, ui khat zong tau lo ding hi.

Hih nangma'nasemte khempeuh keima' kiangah hong paisukin, keima' kiangah hong kunsuk ding uh a, ‘Nang leh nangmah hong zui mi khempeuh paikhia un,’ hong ci ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kei ka paikhia ding hi,” a ci hi. Faro' kiang panin amah heh mahmahin paikhia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Izipt leitang tungah ka nalamdangte a tam theih nadingin Faro in na thu hong ngai lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses leh Aaron in hih nalamdangte khempeuh Faro’ mai-ah bawl uh hi; Topa in Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in Israel mite a leitang panin paikhiasak lo hi.
Izipt gam sungah Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Tu kha in note' adingin kum kipatna hi ding hi; note' adingin kum khat sungah a kha masa hi ding hi.
Israel mihon khempeuhte' tungah gen in, tu kha ni sawm ni-in innkuan khat adingin tuuno ahih kei leh keelno khat, amau’ innkuan pha zah tawh kituakin amaute in ganno khat ciat la ding uh hi;
ganno khat’ adingin innkuan a tawm luat leh mipa khat in ama' inn zom a vengte tawh a mi tawh kituakin la ding hi; a mi tamna leh a nek zah uh tawh kizui-in ganno man pia ding uh hi.
Na ganno uh a sitbang lo hi ding a, kum khat a pha a pa hi ding hi; tua pen tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin, khat peuhpeuh hi thei ding hi;
tua pen, Israel mihonte khempeuh in a gannote uh a gawh ding hun nitak khuamui, tua kha ni sawm-le-li dong na kem ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a sisan kimkhat la-in a nekna uh inn kongkhak khuam nihte leh bangtungzawl nuh ding uh hi.
Amaute in tua zanin a sa hangin ne ding uh hi; silngo sawhloh anlum leh a kha mehteh tawh amaute in ne ding uh hi.
A sate mun khat peuhpeuhah a sial ahi a, tui tawh huanin ahi zongin ne loin, a lu leh a khete leh a sungkuate tawh hangin na ne ding uh hi.
Zingsang dong a khing na omsak kei ding uh a, zingsang cianga a khing om lai peuhmah na haltum ding uh hi.
Hih bang zia-in na ne ding uh hi: na kawng uh gakin, na khedapte uh na khe uh-ah bulhin, na ciangkhut uh na khut uh-ah na tawi ding uh hi; na nawh nek ding uh hi. Tua in Topa’ Pasian pawi ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in tua zanin Izipt gam ka nawk ding a, Izipt leitang tungah mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh tacil khempeuh ka vat gawp ding hi; Izipt pasiante khempeuh' tungah thu ka khen ding hi; keimah in Topa ka hi hi.

Note’ omna inn tunga sisan in note adingin lim hi ding hi; sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Izipt leitang ka vat gawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note' tungah hong tung lo ding hi.
“Hih ni in note adingin phawkna ni hi ding hi, note in Topa' tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uh hi; na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi.

Note in ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi; a ni masa ni-in note in na inn panun silngo na hemkhia ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh khat peuh in a ni masa ni panin a ni sagih ni dong silngo sawh a nek leh, Israel sung panin tua mipa kikhenkhia ding hi.

A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-in zong a siangtho kikhopna khat mah na nei ding uh hi, tua sung tengin na bangmah kisem lo ding hi; ahih hangin na milip-un na huansa bek mah na ne thei ding uh hi.

Note in silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni teekteekin Izipt leitang panin na mihonte uh ka paikhiatpih hi: tua ahih ciangin note in na khan tawntungun hih ni pen biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi.
Kha masa, tua kha ni sawm-le-li nitakin note in silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh a, tua kha ni sawmnih-le-khat nitak dong na ne ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ni sagih sung na inn sung uh-ah silngo kimu lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khat peuh, peemta hita leh gam mi hita leh in silngo sawh a nek leh, Israel mi honpi panin tua mipa kikhenkhia ding hi.
Silngo a kisawh peuhmah nane kei ding uh hi; na omna khempeuh uh-ah silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Israel upate khempeuh samin amaute' kiangah, “Nomau’ adingin na innkuan uh tawh a kituakin tuunote teel un la, paisan tuuno go un.

Puknah lom khat la un la, kuang sunga a om sisan sungah diahin, kuang sunga a om sisan tawh bangtungzawl leh kongkhak khuam nihte nuh un; zingsang matengin a inn kongkhak pua-ah kuamah paikhia lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt mite that dingin Topa in hong nawk ding hi; amah in bangtungzawl leh kongkhak khuam nih tunga sisan a muh ciangin Topa in kongkhak paisan ding a, a susia ding pen note that dingin na inn sung uh-ah tumsak lo ding hi.
Note leh na tapate in hih pen biakna ngeina kip-in na nei tawntung ding uh hi.
Amah in hong ciamsa bangin Topa in note hong piak ding leitang na tun’ uh ciangin hih nasep na zui ding uh hi.
Na tate un note' kiangah, ‘Hih bang hihna bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ hong cih ciangin

note in, ‘Topa’ paisanna biak piakna ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite’ innkuante hong khawi-in Izipt mite a thah lai-in Izipt gam sungah Israel innkuante paisan hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Mite in a lu uh kunin bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses leh Aaron a thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi.
Ama' kumpi tokhom tunga a tu Faro’ tacil-a kipanin thongmial sunga a om a kiman mite’ tacil leh ganhing tacil khempeuh, Izipt gam sunga a om tacil khempeuh, zankim lai takin Topa in vat gawp hi.
Tua zanin Faro leh a nasemte khempeuh leh Izipt mite khempeuh tho uh hi; Izipt gam sungah kahna lianpi om hi, bang hang hiam cih leh khat beek a sih lohna inn khat zong om lo hi.
Amah in Moses leh Aaron zan sap a, “Ding un, keima' mihingte lak panin note leh Israel mite paikhia un; pai un la, na gensa bangun Topa va bia un.
Na gensa bangun na tuuhonte uh leh na bawnghonte uh la un la, pai un; kei zong thupha hong pia un,” a ci hi.
Tua gam panin mite manlangin a sawl khiat nading uh-ah Izipt mite nawhtat mahmah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Eite khempeuh misi i hi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite in silngo sawh nai loh a annel lom uh la-in, annel mekna amau’ kuangte puan tawh tunin a liangko uh-ah pua uh hi.
Moses in amaute' tunga a gen bangin Israel mite zong gamta uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Izipt mite'tung panin ngun leh kham kizepnate leh puante ngen uh hi;
amau’ ngette a piak nadingun Topa in Izipt mite’ muhna-ah mite maipha pia hi. Tua bangin amaute in Izipt mite’ na sut uh hi.
Israel mite numei leh naupang kisim loin pasal tul za guk Rameses panin Sukkoth-ah khe-in pai uh hi.
Minam dang tampi leh tuuhon leh bawnghon, ganhing tampi zong amau tawh pai uh hi.

Izipt panin a ken’ uh annel lom panin amaute in silngo sawhloh moh em uh hi, tuate silngo kisawh lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh, Izipt panin amaute kisawnkhia a, zia-ol tat thei loin amau’ annek ding zong kiging man lo uh hi.
Israel mite Izipt-ah a om uh hun sung in kum za li leh kum sawmthum ahi hi.
Kum za li leh kum sawmthum a cin’ ni teekteekin Izipt leitang panin Topa’ mihonpite paikhia uh hi.
Amaute Izipt leitang panin a paikhiatpih nadingin hih in Topa’ zan vilna ahi hi; tua mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in amau khang tawntungin Topa’ adingin hih zan mah zan vilna-in nei uh hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron' kiangah, “Hih in paisan biakna ngeina kip ahi hi; gamdang mi kuamah in ne lo ding hi;
ahih hangin sum tawh a kilei sila peuhmah in a vun na at khit uh ciangin ne thei ding hi.
Peemta hita leh a kicial nasem hita leh in ne thei lo ding hi.
Inn khat sungah kine ding hi; inn pua-ah a sa na paikhiatpih kei ding uh hi; a guh na kuaitan kei ding uh hi.
Israel mihon khempeuhin hih ding uh hi.

Khual mi khat note' kiangah hong peem a, Topa’ adingin paisan a bawl leh, ama mipih pasal khempeuh a vun ki-at sak un, tua ciangin amah a nai-ah hong pai-in bawl thei ding hi; amah in gam mi khat tawh kibang ding hi. Ahih hangin vun ki-at lo mi kuamah in ne lo ding hi.
Gam mi leh note' lakah hong peem khual mi’ adingin ngeina khat bek om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hih uh hi; Topa in Moses leh Aaron a thupiak bangin amaute in hih uh hi.
Tua ni teekteekin Topa in Israel mite a honpi-un Izipt gam panin paikhiatpih hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“Keima' tungah tacil khempeuh hong ap in; Israel mihingte' lakah, mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh, naubu a hong masa pen peuhpeuh in keima aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Moses in mite' tungah, “Salsuahna gam, Izipt panin na paikhiat uh hih ni phawk un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in vangliatna khut tawh hih mun panin note hong paikhiatpih hi; silngo sawh anlum kine lo ding hi.
Abib kha, tu ni-in note a paikhia ding na hi uh hi.

Amah in note' tungah piak dinga na pate’ tungah a ciam, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitang, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite’ leitangah Topa in note hong paipih ciangin hih kha sungin hih bangin pawina hih ding uh hi.
Note in silngo sawhloh anlum ni sagih sung na ne ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-in Topa adingin pawi khat om ding hi.
Silngo sawhloh anlum ni sagih sung kine ding hi; note' tungah silngo sawh anlum kimu lo ding hi, note’ huang sung khempeuhah note’ tung panin silngo kimu lo ding hi.
Tua ni-in na tapa kiangah, ‘Izipt panin ka paikhiat lai-in Topa in kei adinga hong hihsakna hang hi,’ ci-in na gen ding hi.

Na kam in Topa’ thu kham a gen tawntung theihna dingin hih in na khut tungah lim, na mitte kikalah phawkna khat hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a vangliatna khut tawh hih mun panin nang hong paikhiatpih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in a kiseh hunin kum khat pan kum khat, hih biakna ngeina kip na zui ding uh hi.
“Amah in note leh na pate uh tungah a ciam bangin, Topa in Kanaan leitangah note hong paipih hun ciang leh note' tungah tua gam hong piak ciangin,
note in naubu a hong masa khempeuh Topa’ adingin na tuam koih ding uh hi. Na ganhing uh a tacil a pa khempeuh in Topaaa hi ding hi.
La a tacil peuhmah tuuno khat tawh na tanh ding uh hi, tua bang hi loin na tat kei ding uh leh a ngawg na kuaitan ding uh hi. Note’ tapate lak panin tacil peuhmah na tanh ding uh hi.
Hong pai ding hunah na tapa in, ‘Hih in bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in nang hong dot ciangin, nangmah in ama' kiangah, ‘Salsuahna, Izipt panin Topa in vangliatna tawh eite hong paikhiatpih hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro in eite paisak ding a nial tentan ciangin Izipt gamsunga tacil khempeuh, mihing tacil leh ganhing tacil khempeuh Topa in that hi. Tua ahih ciangin naubu a hong masa a pa khempeuh Topa' tungah biakna-in ka pia uh hi; ahih hangin ka tapate uh sung pan tacil khempeuh ka tanh uh hi,’ na ci ding hi,
Tua in na khut tung-a om ciamtehna lim ahih kei leh na mitte kikal-a talsuante bang hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a vangliatna tawh Izipt panin eite hong paikhiatpih hi,” a ci hi.

Faro in mite a paisak ciangin, lampi tom pen hita se leh, Pasian in Filistia gam tawnin amaute paipih lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “Amaute in gal a tuah ciangin mite kisikin Izipt-ah ciahkik kha ding hi,’ a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in San Tuipi lam manawhin gamlak lamah mite kot paipih hi. Israel mite galdo dingin kithawisa-in Izipt leitang panin pai to uh hi.

Moses in Josef' guhte paipih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Josef in Israel mite' tungah thupi takin ciam a, “Note' kiangah Pasian hong hawh ding hi; tua ciangin note in hih lai panin keima' guhte na pua ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Sukkoth panin amaute pai lai uh a, gamlak nawl, Etham-ah giahphual sat uh hi.

Amaute in sun hita leh zan hita leh khualzinin a pai theih nadingun sun-in amaute lam a lak dingin meii khuam khat tawh, zan-in amaute khuavak a pia dingin mei khuam khat tawh, amaute’ mai-ah Topa pai hi;
sun-a meii khuam leh zan-a mei khuamte in mite’ mai panin paikhia lo hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah,
“Israel mite kihei kikin Migdol leh tuipi kikal, Pihahiroth-mai, Baalzefon nisuahna lamah giahphual a sat ding gen in; tuipi gei, tua gal khatah giahphual na sat ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro in Israel’ thu tawh kisai genin, ‘Gam sungah amaute tangciak uh hi; gamlak in amaute khuhcip khin hi,’ ci ding hi.

Keimah in Faro’ lungsim khauhsakin, amah in amaute delh ding a, Faro leh a mi honpite khempeuh ka zawhna hangin minthan’na ka ngah ding hi; keimah in Topa ka hihna thu Izipt mite in thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute tua mah bangin gamta uh hi.

Mite tai khin zo hi, ci-in Izipt kumpipa kiangah a kigen ciangin, Faro leh ama nasemte’ ngaihsutna kikhel a, amaute in, “Eite’ na hong sep nading panin Israel i pai khiatsak, hih banga i gamtat bang himawk ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng kithawi sakin ama galkapte la-in,
a kitengkhia leeng za guk leh Izipt leeng khempeuh a ukte tawh kuan khawm hi.
Topa in Izipt kumpipa Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amaute kithamuanna tawh a paikhiat laitakun amah in Israel mite delh hi.
Izipt mite ahi, Faro’ sakolte, leengte, ama sakol tuangte leh a galkapte in amaute delh uh a, amaute giahphual satin tuipi-ah a omna uh, Pihahiroth gei, Baalzefon nisuahna lam munah pha uh hi.
Faro hong nai ciangin Israel mite khuadak to uh hi, en in, amaute' nungah Izipt mite hong kuan hi; amaute lau mahmah uh hi. Topa' tungah Israel mite kiko uh hi;
amaute in Moses' kiangah, “Izipt-ah han a om loh manin gamlakah a si dingin kote hong paikhiatpih na hi hiam? Izipt panin paikhiatpihna tawh kote' tungah bang hong bawl na hi hiam?

‘Kote hong hici omsak in la, Izipt mite’ na hong semsak in,’ ci-in Izipt-ah nang' tungah hong gen hi lo ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlak-a sih sangin Izipt mite’ na sep ding pen kote’ adingin hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Moses in mite' tungah, “Kihta kei un, kip takin ding un, amah in note adingin tu ni-a hong sep ding Topa’ hotkhiatna mu un; bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-a na muh uh Izipt mite, note in na mukik nawn kei ding uh hi.
Topa in note adingin hong dosak ding a, note ahih leh na om hithiat ding uh hi bek hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Bang hangin kei' tungah hong kiko na hi hiam? Israel mite mainawt-in a pai ding gen in.
Israel mite in leikeu tung tawnin tuipi a kantan theih nadingin na ciangkhut laamto in la, tuipi tungah na khut zan-in khenkham in.

Amau’ nungah amaute hong pai-in, keimah in Faro leh a mi honpite khempeuh, a leengte, a sakol tuangte ka zawhna hangin minthan’na ka ngah nading hi. Keimah in Izipt mite’ lungsim ka khauhsak ding a, amaute in hong nungdelh ding uh hi.
Faro leh ama' leengte leh ama' sakol tuangte ka zawhna hangin minthan’na ka ngah khit ciangin keimah in Topa ka hihna thu Izipt mite in thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel honpite' mai-ah a pai Pasian’ vantungmi kikhin-in amaute' nungah pai hi; amaute' mai panin meii khuam kikhinin amaute' nung-ah ding a,
Izipt honpite leh Israel honpite' kikal-ah pai hi. Tua lai-ah meii leh khuamial om hi; zan tawntung khat leh khat kinai kha loin zingsang khua hong vak hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in tuipi tungah a khut zan hi; Topa in zan tawntung nisuahna huihpi hat tawh tuipi leh luan’sakin, tuipi pen leikeu-in bawl a, tuite kikhen hi.
Israel mite tuipi laizang leikeu tungah pai uh a, amau' taklam leh veilam-ah kawm bangin tuite om hi.
Izipt mite ahi, Faro’ sakolte khempeuh, ama' leengte, leh ama' sakol tuangte in delh in tuipi laizang amaute' nungah pai uh hi.
Zingsang ciangin Topa in mei leh meii khuam sung panin Izipt mi honpite en sukin, Izipt mi honpite phial gawp a,
amau’ leeng peite tumsak ahih manin man bekbak-in hawl uh hi; Izipt mite in, “Israel’ mai panin tai ni; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt mite' lang pangin Topa in amau’ adingin do hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Izipt mite'tung, amau' leengte' tung, amau' sakol tuangte' tungah tui hong luan’ kik theih nadingin tuipi tungah na khut zan in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in tuipi tungah a khut zan a, a zingsang khuavak ciangin a luan’ ngei bangin tuipi luangkik hi; tua sungah Izipt mite tai uh a, Topa in tuipi laizangah Izipt mite tui tumsak hi.
Tui hong luangkikin leengte leh sakol tuangte leh tuipi sungah amaute a delh Faro’ mi honpite khempeuh tuum hi; amaute khat zong suakta lo hi.
Ahih hangin tuipi kantanin leikeu tungah Israel mite pai uh a, amau' taklam leh veilam-ah kawm bangin tuite om hi.
Topa in tua bangin Izipt mite’ khut sung panin tua ni-in Israelte honkhia hi; tuipi gei-ah Izipt mi a site Israel mite in mu uh hi.
Israelte in Izipt mite' tungah Topa’ bawl nasepna lianpi mu uh a, mite in Topa zahtak uh hi; amaute in Topa leh ama' nasem Moses um uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses leh Israel mite in Topa' tungah hih la sa uh a, “Topa tungah la ka sa ding hi, amah in minthangin zo khin a, amah in sakol leh a tuangpa tuipi sungah lawn hi.
Topa in ka hatna leh ka lungdamna hi a, amah in keima' kihotkhiatna suak khin hi; hih in keima' Pasian hi, amah ka phat ding hi, ka pa’ Pasian hi, amah ka liansak ding hi.
Topa in gal hang mi hi a, Topa in ama' min ahi hi.
“Faro’ leengte leh a galkap honpite amah in tuipi sungah lawn a, a kitengkhia ama uliante San Tuipi sungah tum hi.
Tui in amaute tuum a, suangtum bangin a thukna sungah amaute kiasuk uh hi.
Topa aw, na taklam khut, vangliatna-ah minthang hi, Topa aw, na taklam khut in galte thehthang hi.
Nangma' vangliatna tawh nangmah in na langte na lawnthal hi; nang in na hehna na khah khia a, tua in amaute buhkung bangin kangtum hi.
Na nak ging tawh tuite kiciangto a, tuite a lom-in kawm bangin ding to hi; tuipi sungah tui thukpi khal hi.
Galte in, ‘ka delh dinga, ka pha ding hi. A nate uh ka hawm ding a, ka deih zahzah-in tuate ka tang ding hi. Ka namsau ka dok ding a, ka khut in amaute susia ding hi,’ ci hi.
Nang in na huih tawh na mut a, tuipi in amaute tuum hi; a kihtakhuai tui sungah haknaw bangin amaute tum uh hi.
“Topa aw, pasiante' lakah kua in nang tawh kibang ahi hiam? Kua in nang tawh kibangin, siangthona-ah lianin, minthang nasepna-ah kihtakhuai-in, nalamdang sem ahi hiam?
Nang in na taklam khut na zan a, leitung in amaute nawmvalh hi.
“Nangmah in na ciamsa zui-in na tatkhiatsa mite na paipih hi, nangmah in na hatna tawh a siangtho na omna-ah amaute lam na lak hi.
Mite in za khin uh a, amaute liing uh hi; Filistia-ah a teng mite gimna in mancip hi.
Tu-in Edom ukpite lungkia uh a, Moab makaite, liin’na in mancip hi; Kanaan-ah a teeng mite khempeuh tuisuak khin uh hi.

Launa leh kihtakna amau' tungah tung a, nangmah' thahat vangliatna hangin amaute suangtum bangin taang loin om uh a, Topa aw, nangma' mite in a khen’ mateng, nangma' leisa mite in a khen’ mateng, amaute khikcip uh hi.
Nang in amaute hong paipihin nangma' mual tungah amaute na suan ding a, Topa aw, nangma' om nading mun-a na bawlsa munah, Topa aw, na khutte in a phuhsa na biakinn-ah, na koih ding hi.
Topa in uk tawntung ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro’ sakolte ama' leengte tawh, a sakol tuangte tuipi sungah a pai ciangin, Topa in tuipi tuite amaute tuumsak kik hi; ahih hangin Israel mite tuipi laizang leikeu tungah pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ sanggamnu, numei kamsang, Miriam in a khut-ah khuang khat tawi hi; ama' nungah numeite khempeuh lamin khuang tawh zui uh hi.
Miriam in amaute la sak hi: “Topa la sak un, amah in minthangin zo khin, amah in sakol leh a tuangpa tuipi sungah lawn hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in San Tuipi panin Israel mite paipih suak a, amaute Shur gamlakah pai uh hi; gamlak-ah amaute ni thum pai uh a, tui mu lo uh hi.
Amaute Marah a tun’ uh ciangin a tui kha ahih manin Marah tui dawn thei lo uh hi; tua ahih manin Marah ci-in min kiphuak hi.
Moses' tungah mite phun uh a, “Bang dawn ding i hi hiam?” ci uh hi.

Topa’ tungah amah kiko hi; Topa in singkung khat amah lak a, amah in tui sungah tua sing lawn a, tui lim hong suak pah hi. Topa in tua lai munah amaute adingin thukham khat leh ngeina kip khat bawl a, tua lai mun-ah amah in amaute' tungah ze-et hi. Amah in,

“Note in Topa na Pasian’ thu lim takin na ngaih uh a, ama' maiah a man nate hih-in, ama' thupiakte don a, ama' ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih uh leh, Izipt mite' tungah ka tun’sak natnate khat beek note' tungah kong tungsak kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa, note hong damsakpa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ciktui sawm-le-nih leh nisuh kung sawmsagih a omna mun Elim tung uh hi; tui gei tua mun-ah amaute in giahphual sat uh hi.
Amaute Elim panin ding khia uh a, Izipt leitang panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kha nihna ni sawm-le-nga ni-in Elim leh Sinai kikal-a om Sin gamlakah Israel mi honpite khempeuh tung uh hi.
Gamlakah Moses leh Aaron' tungah Israel mihon buppi phun uh a,

amaute' tungah, “Kote sabeel phungah tu-in ka kham takun an ka nek lai-un Izipt leitangah Topa in hong that khin hi zaw ta leh; bang hang hiam cih leh mihon buppi gilkialna tawh a that dingin note in gamlakah nong paikhiatpih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Mose' kiangah, “En in, note adingin vantung panin an kong zusak ding hi; keima' thu a zuih uh leh a zuih loh uh ka theihtel nadingin mite paikhia-in ni simin ni khat kham khop ding kaikhawm ding uh hi.
A ni guk ni-in mite in amau’ ciahpihte a bawl uh ciangin nisim-a a khop ngei zah nih pha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses leh Aaron in Israel mite' tungah, “Nitak ciangin Izipt leitang panin note hong paikhiatpihpa in Topa a hihna na thei ding uh a,

Topa’ tunga na phunna uh amah in za khin ahih manin zingsang ciangin Topa’ minthan’na na mu ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ tungah na phun theih nadingun kote in a bang hi mawk ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Moses in, “Ama' tungah na phunnate uh Topa in a zakna hangin, Topa in note' tungah nitakin nek ding sa, zingsangin kham tak-a na nek ding uh an hong piak ciangin—kote in a bang hi mawk ka hi uh hiam? Note’ phunnate in kote’ tung hi loin Topa’ tung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Aaron’ kiangah, “Israel mihon buppi' tungah, ‘Amah in note’ phunnate za khin ahih manin Topa’ mai a nai-ah hong pai un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Israel mihon buppi' tungah Aaron in thu a gen lai takin, amaute in gamlak lam en uh hi, en in, meii sungah Topa’ minthan’na hong kilang hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah,

“Israel mite’ phunnate ka za khin hi; amaute' kiangah, ‘Khuamui ciangin note in sa na ne ding uh a, zingsang ciangin an na kham ding uh hi; tua ciangin keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hihna na thei ding uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Nitak ciangin vamimte hong tungin giahphual tuam hi; zingsang ciangin giahphual kiim-ah daitui kia hi.
Daitui a kap ciangin gamlak lei maitang tungah a pa dildel a, a khal, vukkhal banga a pa dildel leitungah om hi.

Israel mite in a muh uh ciangin amaute khat leh khat in, “Bang ahi hiam?” kici uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua pen bang hiam cih thei lo uh hi. Moses in amaute' kiangah, “Topa in nek dinga note' tungah hong piak an ahi hi.

Topa’ thupiak in hih bang hi: ‘Note in na milip-un na kham zah ding uh khawm un; note in na puanbuk sung uh-ah a om mi zah tawh kituakin mi khat in lawhta khat ciat na la ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua mah bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi; amaute in kaikhawm uh a, kimkhat in tam, kimkhat in tawm kaikhawm hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in lawhta khat tawh a teh uh ciangin a tam a kaikhawmpa aa dim val lo a, tawm a kaikhawmpa’ aa dim lah lo hi; a milip-in a kham zah ding khawm uh hi.
Moses in amaute' kiangah, “Kuamah in zingsang dong koih kei hen,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in Moses’ thu ngai lo uh hi; mi pawl khat in zingsang dong koih uh a, than omin ning hi; amaute' tungah Moses heh hi.
Zingsang simin amaute in a kham zah ding ciat uh khawm uh hi; ahih hangin ni a sat ciangin tuisuak hi.
A ni guk ni-in amaute in an a zah nih, lawhta nih ciat, khawm uh hi; mihon makaite khempeuh hong pai-in Moses' kiangah a gen uh ciangin,

amah in amaute' kiangah, “Hih in Topa’ hong thupiak ahi hi: ‘Zing ciang pen a thupi-a tawlngak ni, Topa’ adingin sabbath siangtho ni ahi hi; na em dingte uh em-in, na huan dingte uh huan un la, a om lai teng zingsang ciang dong koih un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Moses’ sawl bangin zingsang dong koih uh hi; ning lo a, a sungah thante om lo hi.
Moses in , “Tu ni-in ne un, tu ni-in Topa adingin sabbath ahi hi; tu ni-in gamlakah na mu kei ding uh hi;
Note in ni guk sung na khawm ding uh hi; ahih hangin sabbath ni ahi a ni sagih ni-in bang mah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
A ni sagih ni-in a kaikhawm dingin mi pawl khat kuan khia uh a, amaute in bangmah mu lo uh hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Ka thupiakte leh ka thute zuih ding bang tan vei nial ding na hi hiam?

Thei in! Topa in nang' tungah sabbath hong pia zo hi, tua ahih ciangin a ni guk ni-in amah in nang' tungah ni nih ading an hong pia hi; note na milip-un nomau' omna ciatah om un, a ni sagih ni-in ama' omna panin kuamah paikhia kei hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a ni sagih ni-in mite tawlnga hi.
Tu-in Israel mite in a min manna ci uh hi; tua pen nannan tang tawh kibangin, a meel kang a, a limna pen, khuaizu tawh a kibawl mohpheng tawh kibang hi.

Moses in, “Hih in Topa’ thupiaksa ahi hi: ‘Izipt leitang panin note kong paikhiatpih lai-in gamlakah note kong vakna an amaute in a muh theih nadingun na khang tawntungun lawhta dim khat kem un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Moses in Aaron’ kiangah, “Beel khat la in la, tua sungah manna lawhta dim khat koih in la, na khang tawntungun a kikem dingin Topa’ mai-ah koih in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Aaron in kep dingin Tecipan’na mai-ah koih hi.
Amaute' teen’ theih nading leitang a tun’ mateng, kum sawmli sung Israel mite in manna ne uh hi; amaute Kanaan gamgi a tun’ matengun manna ne uh hi.
(Lawhta khat in seu khat seh-sawm-suah-seh-khat ahi hi.)
Topa’ thupiak bangin Israel mihon khempeuh Sin gamlak panin giahphual a ban banin sat uh a, Refidim-ah phual sat uh hi; ahih hangin mite’ dawn ding tui om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite in Moses’ mawhna zong uh a, “Tui dawn ding hong pia in,” ci uh hi. Moses in amaute' kiangah, “Bang hangin kei tungah mawhna hong zong na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin Topa ze-et na hi uh hiam?” ci hi.

Ahih hangin tua mun-ah tui duhin mite dangtak uh a, Moses tungah mite phun-in, “Kote leh ka tate uh leh ka ganhingte uh dangtakin a si dingin bang hangin Izipt panin kote hong paipih to na hi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa' tungah Moses kiko a, “Hih mite bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Suang tawh kei hong deeng dingin amaute kithawi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Israel upate pawl khat samin mite mai-ah pai in; Nail na satna ciangkhut na khut-in tawi in la, pai in.

En in, Horeb-a suangpi-ah nangma' mai-ah ka ding ding hi; nang in suangpi na sat ding a, mite in tui a dawn theih nadingin tua suang panin tui hong phul khia ding hi,” a ci hi. Isarel upate’ muhna-ah tua mah bangin Moses gamta hi.
Israel mite’ mawh zon’na leh amaute in Topa ze-etin, “Eite' lakah Topaom hiam om lo hiam?” a cihna hangun, amah in tua mun pen Massah leh Meribah ci-in min phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Amalek mite hong pai-in Israel mite tawh Refidim-ah kido uh hi.
Moses in Joshua' kiangah, “Eite adingin mi teel in la, paikhia-in Amalek mite tawh kido in; zing ciangin ka khut sungah Pasian' ciangkhut tawh mual dawn-ah ka ding ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih bangin Joshua gamta a, Amalekte tawh kido uh hi, Moses, Aaron leh Hurte mual dawn ah paito uh hi.
Moses in a khut a san’sak peuhmah ciangin Israel in neh hi; amah in a khut a niamsak peuhmah ciangin Amalekte in neh hi.

Ahih hangin Moses a khut kham hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in suangtum khat la-in ama' nuai-ah koih uh a, tua tungah amah tu a, Aaron leh Hur in a pang khat tuak panin ama' khutte len uh hi; tua ahih ciangin nitum mateng ama' khutte kip hi.
Joshua in Amalek leh ama' mite namsau tawh vat maai hi.

Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Keimah in vantung nuai khempeuh panin Amalek mite a kiphawkna ka phiat siangtho nading thu phawk nadingin hih thu laibu sung khatah gelh in la, Joshua’ kiangah genkik in,” a ci hi.
Moses in biakna tau khat lamin a min dingin Topa in keima' zawhna lim ahi hi, ci-in phuak a,
“Topa’ dial len in! Topa in a khang khangin Amalek mite do ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses’ sungpa, Midian siampi Jethro in Moses leh ama' mi Israelte’ adingin Pasian’ bawlsa khempeuh, Topa in Izipt panin Israel mite a paikhiatpihna thu za hi.

2-3 Tu-in Moses' sungpa Jethro in, amah in a sawl kik khit-a kipanin Moses’ zi Zipporah leh ama' tapa nihte kem a, a khat min in Gershom ahi hi (Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Gam dangah peemta ka hi hi,” ci hi),
a dang khat’ min in Eliezer ahi hi (bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka pa’ Pasian in keimah hong huhpa hi a, Faro’ namsau panin kei hong honkhia hi,” ci hi.)
Pasian’ mual tungah giahphual a satna gamlak Moses' kiangah ama' tapate leh a zi tawh, Moses' sungpa Jethro hong pai hi.
Mi khat in Moses' kiangah, “En in, na zi leh a tapa nihte tawh nang' kiangah na sungpa Jethro hong pai hi,” a cih ciangin
a sungpa dawn dingin Moses paikhia a, zahtakna pia-in amah nam hi; amaute khat leh khat omzia kidong tuak uh a, puanbuk sungah pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in a sungpa' kiangah Topa in Israel mite hangin Faro tung leh Izipt mite' tungah a bawlte khempeuh, lampi-ah amau' tungah a tung haksatna khempeuh leh Topa in amaute a hotkhiatna thu gen hi.
Izipt mite’ khut sung panin amah in amaute a khahkhiatna, Israel mite' tungah Topa in a hoih a bawlte khempeuh hangin Jethro lungdam hi.
Jethro in, “Izipt mite leh Faro' khut sung panin note hong khahkhia Topa in thupha ngah ta hen.

Topa in pasian khempeuh sangin a liat zawkna tu-in ka thei hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mite' tungah kiphatsakna tawh Izipt mite a gamtat lai takin amah in Iziptte’ khut nuai panin mite khahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
Moses’ sungpa Jethro in Pasian' tungah meihal biakna leh biak piakna bawl hi; Pasian’ mai-ah Moses’ sungpa tawh an a ne dingin Israel upate khempeuh tawh Aaron hong pai hi.
A zing ciangin mite thukhen dingin Moses tu a, zingsang a kipan nitak dongin Moses’ kiim-ah mite ding uh hi.

Mihingte adingin ama' hihte khempeuh Moses’ sungpa in a muh ciangin, amah in, “Mihingte' adinga nang' sep hih in bang ahi hiam? Bang hangin nang bek tu a, zingsanga kipan nitak dongin na kiim-ah mite khempeuh ding ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Moses in a sungpa' kiangah, “Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ deihna kan dingin kei' kiangah mite hong pai hi;
amaute in thu a neih uh ciangin kei' kiangah hong pai uh a, mi khat leh a vengpa' kikal-ah thu ka khen a, Pasian’ ngeina kipte leh ama' thukhennate amaute ka theisak hi,” a ci hi.
Moses’ sungpa in ama' kiangah, “Nangma' hih zia hoih lo hi.
Nang leh nangmah tawh a om mite in na zawngkhal lawh ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua nasep in nang’ ading gik lua hi; nang bek in na sem khin zo kei hi.
Tu-in ka thu hong ngai in; thu kong lak ding hi, Pasian in nang tawh hong om ta hen; Nangmah in Pasian' mai-ah mite' tangin pai-in, amau’ thute Pasian' kiangah na gen ding hi;
nangmah in ngeina kipte leh thukhennate amaute na hilh ding a, amau' lam pai nading leh amau' sep dingte amaute na theisak ding hi.

Tua tham loin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muanhuai mi leh sumgolh a mudah mi, misiamte na teelkhia ding hi; tua bang mite pen mi a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte' tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi.

Mite’ thu amaute khensak tawntung in; amaute in thu lian peuhmah ' kiangah hong puak ding uh hi, ahih hangin thu neute amau mah in khen tawm ding uh hi; tua hi leh nang adingin baih zaw ding hi, amaute in vangik hong puakpih ding uh hi.
Hih bangin hih lecin Pasian in thahatna hong pia ding a, nangmah in na sem paisuak zo ding hi; tua tham loin hih mite khempeuh zong amau' omna-ah lungnuam takin ciah thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa’ thu ngai-in ama' gen khempeuh hih hi.
Israel khempeuh' sung panin Moses in mipil misiamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte' tungah a uk-in mite lutang-in amaute bawl hi.
Amaute in mite' tungah a tawntungin thukhen uh hi; amaute in thuhaksate Moses' tungah puak uh a, ahih hangin thu neute amaute in khen tawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in a sungpa ciah khiasak a, Jethro zong ama' gamah a ciah hi.
Israel mite Izipt leitang panin a paikhiat zawh kha thumna a khadet ni-in amaute Sinai gamlak tung uh hi.
Amaute Refidim panin ding khia-in Sinai gamlak a tun’ uh ciangin, amaute in gamlak tua mual mai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Pasian' kiangah Moses pai to a, Topa in mual panin amah sam a, “Jakob’ suan-le-khak Israel mite' tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi;
Izipt mite tungah ka bawlna leh muvanlai in a kha tawh a note a puak bangin note hong pua-in keima' kiangah kong paipihna na mu khin uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in ka thu mang-in ka thuciamna na zuih uh leh mite khempeuh lak panin note in keima' neihsa na hi ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khempeuh keima aa hi a,
Note in keima' siampi nasep a sem minam, leh minam siangtho na hi ding uh hi. Israel mite' tungah na gen ding in hih thute ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses hong pai-in mite’ upate samin, Topa in amah a thupiak hih thute khempeuh amaute’ mai-ah sung hi.
Mi khempeuh in, “Topa’ gensa khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi,” ci-in dawng khawm uh hi. Moses in mite’ thugente Topa’ tungah gen hi.

Topa in Moses' tungah, “En in, nang kong hopih ciangin mite in a zak theih nading leh nang zong hong up tawntung nadingun meii sahpi sungah nang' kiangah kong pai ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses in mite’ thugente Topa' tungah gen hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Mite' kiangah pai in la tu ni leh zingciang sung teng amaute siangthosakin, amau’ puante amau mah sawp sakin,
a ni thum ni-in a baihsa-in om in; bang hang hiam cih leh a ni thum ni-in Sinai Mual tungah mite khempeuh’ muhna-ah Topa hong paisuk ding hi.
Nangmah in mite’ adingin dalna khat a kimkotah na koih ding a, ‘Mual tungah pai loin, a gamgi na lawn’ khak loh nadingun kidawm un; mual a lawng peuhpeuh kithat ding hi;

khut peuhmah in tua mipa lawng kha lo ding a, amah suang tawh kideng lum ahih kei leh kikap lum ding hi; ganhing hita leh mihing hita leh kihing khawi lo ding hi,’ na ci ding hi. Peengkul sau veipi hong kitum ciangin amaute mual tungah hong paito ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses mual tung panin mite' kiangah paisuk a, mite siangthosak hi; amaute in a puante uh sawp uh hi.
Amah in mite' kiangah, “Ni thum ni ciangin a baihsa-in om un; numei tawh lumkhawm kei un,” a ci hi.
A ni thum ni zingsang ciangin vangingte leh khuaphialepte omin, mual tungah meii sahpi om a, nakpi takin a ging peengkul kitum ahih manin giahphual-a om mi khempeuh liing uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in giahphual panin Pasian a dawn dingin mite paikhiatpih hi; amaute a om nading uh mual bul-ah om uh hi.
Sinai Mual meikhu in tuamcip hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in mei sungah tua mual tungah kum hi; a khu in meiphualpikhu bangin kahto a, a mual buppi nakpi takin liing hi.
Peengkul aw a nak gin’ semsem laitakin Moses pau a, Pasian in vanging sungah amah dawng hi.
Sinai Mual dawn-ah Topa hong paisuk hi; Topa in tua mual dawnah Moses sam a, Moses zong paito hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Amaute in Topa a en dingin hong kantanin amaute tampi tak si kha ding ahih manin paisuk in la mite hilhkhol in.
Amaute' tungah Topa heh lua kha ding ahih manin, Topa' kiangah hong pai siampite zong amaute mah kisiangtho tawmsak hen,” a ci hi.
Moses in Topa’ tungah, “Sinai Mual dongah mite hong pai thei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmahmah in kote nong thuhilh a, ‘Mual kimkotah dalnate bawl in la siangthosak in,’ nong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in ama' kiangah, “Paisuk in la, Aaron hong paipih to in; ahih hangin amaute' tungah amah heh lua kha ding ahih manin Topa' kiang dongah a pai dingin siampite leh mite paisuaksak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite' kiangah Moses paisukin amaute' kiangah gen hi.
Pasian in hih thute khempeuh gen a,
“Keimah in salsuahna, Izipt leitang panin nang a hong paikhiatpih Topana Pasian ka hi hi.
“Keimah longal pasian dang na nei kei ding hi.
“A kiseek milim hita leh, tunga vantung hita leh, nuai-a lei sung hita leh, lei nuai-a om tui sungah hita leh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh nang adingin na bawl kei ding hi;

amaute' mai-ah kun loin, amaute na bia kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah Topa na Pasian in a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte' tungah pate’ mawhna tate tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thukin,
ahih hangin kei hong it-in ka thupiakte a zui mi a khang tul tampite' tungah itna kip a lakpa ka hi hi.
“Topa na Pasian’ min na zangkhai ngaihsut kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama' min a zangkhai ngaihsut mi a mawh lo hi, ci lo ding hi.
“Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk in.
Ni guk sung nangma' na semin na nasep ding khempeuh na hih ding hi;

ahih hangin a ni sagih niin Topa na Pasian’ sabbath ahi hi; tua ni-in nang, na tapa, na tanu, na nasempa, na nasem nu, na ganhing ahi a, na huang sung a om peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh a ni guk sung tengin Topa in van leh lei, tuipi leh tuate' sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi.
“Topa na Pasian in nang hong piak leitang tungah na khan’ a sau theihna dingin na nu leh pa zahtak in.
“Mi na that kei ding hi.
“Nu-le-pa mawhna na bawl kei ding hi.
“Na na gu kei ding hi.
“Na vengte' lang khatah a man lo teci na pang kei ding hi.

“Na vengte’ inn na deihgawh kei ding hi; na vengte’ zi hita leh, ama' nasempa hita leh, ama' nasem nu hita leh, ama' bawngtal hita leh, ama' la hita leh, na vengte aa ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in mite khempeuh in vangingte, khuaphialepte, peengkul aw leh mual meikhu thu a theihtel uh ciangin, mite lau-in liing uh hi; amaute a gamla-ah ding uh a,
Moses' kiangah, “Nangmah in kote' kiangah thu hong gen in, kote in ka ngai ding uh hi; ahih hangin, kote si kha ding ka hih ciangun kote' tungah Pasian hong gensak kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Moses in mite' kiangah, “Lau kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note na khialh khak loh nadingun note in amah na kihtak theih nadingun note a entel dingin Pasian hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian’ omna meii sah' kiang ah Moses a pai lai takin mite a gamla-ah ding uh hi.
Topa in Moses' kiangah, “Nangmah in Israel mite' tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Vantung panin note kong hopihna note mahmah in na thei khin uh hi.
Note in kei tawh nong biak khop dingun ngun pasiante na bawl kei ding uh a, note’ adingin kham pasiante zong na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Note in keima' adingin lei tawh kibawl biakna tau khat na bawl ding uh a, tua tungah na meihal biaknate uh leh thunuam-a na biaknate uh, na tuute leh na bawngtalte uh pia un; keima' min a kiphawk nading mun-a ka bawlna peuhmah-ah note' kiangah keimah hong pai-in note thupha kong pia ding hi.
Note in keima' adingin suang tawh biakna tau na bawl uh leh, a kiseek suang tawh na bawl kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na na-zatte uh tawh na va suk uh leh a ninsak na hi uh hi.
Tua' tungah na selsim uh a kidawk loh nadingin ka biakna tau tung kahtoh nading kahlei a kul-in tausang na bawl kei ding uh hi,’ ci in.
“Tu-in hihte in amaute’ tungah na piak ding biakna ngeina kipte ahi hi.
Hebru mi sila khat na lei ciangin, amah in kum guk sung nasem ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin bangmah pia loin suakta-in amah paikhia ding hi.
Amah guakin hong pai ahih leh amah guak mahin paikhia ding hi; zi neisa-in hong pai leh amah tawh a zi zong paikhia ding hi.
A topa in amah zi guan a, tua nu in amah tawh tapate ahi a, tanute ahi zongin a neih leh, a zi leh a tate in a topa’ aa hi ding a, amah guakin paikhia ding hi.
Ahih hangin sila in a kitel takin genin, ‘Ka topa, ka zi, leh ka tate ka it hi; a suakta-in ka paikhia kei ding hi,’ a cih leh,

tua ciangin a topa in Pasian' kiangah amah paipih ding hi, amah in kongkhak ahi a, kongkhak khuam-ah ahi zongin amah paipih ding hi; a topa in phimpi khat tawh ama bil vuhsak ding hi; amah in a nuntak tawntung ama' na sepsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in a tanu sila-in a zuak ciangin, tua nu in pasal-silate bangin paikhia lo ding hi.

A topa in ama' zi dingin a sehsa tua numei in amah a lungkimsak kei leh, amah in tua nu kitanhsak ding hi; amah in tua nu' tungah citakin gamta lo ahih manin, amah in gamdang mi khat' tungah tua nu a zuak theih nading thu nei lo ding hi.
Amah in a tapa’ adingin tua nu a seh leh, amah in tanu bangin tua nu bawl ding hi.
Amah in ama' adingin zi dang khat a lak leh, amah in a masa numei’ annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lup khopna ding thu neihna khiam lo ding hi.
Amah in hih thu thumte tua nu’ adingin a bawl kei leh, sum piak kul lo, bangmah a kul loin tua nu paikhia thei ding hi.
“Mi khat sat-in a sisak mi peuhpeuh kithat ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a pan’sim hi lo a, ama' khut sungah Pasian in a puksak ahih leh, amah a tai theih nadingin note’ ading mun khat ka seh ding hi.
Ahih hangin mi khat in zuauna tawh mi dang khat thah ding tumin a hih leh, amah na thah theih nadingun note in ka biakna tau nangawn panin amah na la teitei ding uh hi.
“Ama' pa hita leh, ama' nu hita leh, a sat peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Mi khat gu a, amah in a zuak ahi a, amah in a neih lam ahi zongin a kimuhna mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Ama' pa hita leh, ama' nu hita leh, a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Mite kitawng a, khat in a dang khat suangtum khat tawh ahi a, ama' khuttum tawh ahi zongin tumin, mipa a sih loh hangin lupna ngakin,
tua ciangin mipa tho zo-in ama' ciangkhut tawh a vak khiat kik zawh nak leh, amah a tumpa siang ding hi; amah in ama' hun bei sung teng tangding bek ama' tungah loh ding a, amah dam siangsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in molhtum khat tawh ama' sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh satin a phual-ah a sih pah leh, amah kidantat ding hi.

Ahih hangin ni khat ahi a, ni nih khit ciang ahi zongin sila hong thawhzawh leh, amah dantah ding hilo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh sila in ama' neihsa ahih manin sila a sih ciangin a kidantah zah ding tang a sumh khin ahi hi.

“Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, ta-tolh-in; ahi zongin siatna in a zuih beh kei nak leh, tua nu’ pasal in ama' tunga a cih zah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam ding hi; amah in thukhente’ khenna bangin liau ding hi.
Siatna khat peuh in a zuih beh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna tangding nuntakna,
mit tangding mit, ha tangding ha, khut tangding khut, khe tangding khe,
meikang tangding meikang, liamna tang ding liamna, satna tangding satna pia ding hi.
“Mi khat in ama' sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh a mit sat-in a suksiat leh amah in tua mit’ hangin sila suaktasakin paikhiasak ding hi.
Amah in a sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh a ha a tup khiat leh, amah in tua ha’ hangin sila suaktasakin paikhiasak ding hi.
“Bawngtal khat in pasal hita leh numei hita leh a ki tawh a sik lup ciangin, a bawngtal kideng lum ding a, a sa kine lo ding hi; ahih hangin bawngtal neipa siang ding hi.

Ahih hangin a hun beisa-ah bawngtal in mi si thei a, a neipa kihilh napi-in a khum cip kei a, tua bawngtal in pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin a thah leh, bawngtal kideng lum ding a, a neipa zong kithat ding hi.
Ama'tung pan tatkhiatna sum a kinget leh, ama' nuntakna tatkhiat nadingin ama' tungah a kingen zahzah amah in pia ding hi.
Tua bawngtal in mi’ tapa ahi a, tanu ahi zongin a ki tawh a sik leh hih ngeina tawh kizui-in kigamta ding hi.
Bawngtal in sila ahi pasal hita leh numei hita leh khat a ki tawh a sik leh, a neipa in amau’ topa tungah ngun shekel sawmthum pia ding a, bawngtal kideng lum ding hi.
“Mi khat in dum honsa-in a nusia ahi a, mi khat in dum a tawh ciangin sin loin om ahi zongin, bawngtal hita leh la hita leh tua dum sungah a kiat leh,
dum neipa in loh ding hi; amah in a neipa' tungah sum pia ding a, ganhing luang pen ama aa hi ding hi.
“Mi khat’ bawngtal in a dang khat’ bawngtal liamsakin a sih leh, tua ciangin amaute in bawngtal a hing pen zuak ding uh a, tua man hawm ding uh hi; a ganhing si pen zong amaute in hawm ding uh hi.
Tua bang hi lo a, bawngtal in a beisa hunin mite si ngei hi ci-in kithei-a, a neipa in a khumcip kei leh, amah in bawngtal tangding bawngtal pia ding a, a si ganhing pen 'a hi ding hi.

1-4 “Mi khat in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi zongin gu-in, a that a, a zuak zongin, amah in bawngtal khat tang dingin bawngtal nga, tuu khat tang dingin tuu li piakik ding hi. Guta pa in ditkikna bawl ding hi; amah in bangmah a neih kei leh, ama' guktakna hangin amah kizuak ding hi. A kigu ganhing, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi a, tuu ahi zongin a hing-in ama' khut sungah a kimuh leh, amah in a zah nih pia ding hi. “Guta khat in inn vutlet a, kisatin amah a sih leh, tua sihna hangin mawhna om lo ding hi; ahih hangin ni suah khit ahih leh tua sihna hangin mawhna om ding hi.
“Mi khat in lo khat ahi a, leenggui lo-ah ahi zongin gan tasak a, a ganhing khah-in mi dang khat’ lo-ah a tat leh, amah in ama' lo leh ama' leenggah lo panin a hoih pen tawh ditkikna bawl ding hi.
“Mei kuang in gam kang a, a kikhol an ahi a, a ding lai an ahi a, lo ahi zongin a kat leh, mei a kangsakpa in a cing takin ditkikna bawl ding hi.
“Mi khat in a vengte' kiangah sum ahi a, van ahi zongin kep dingin pia a, tua mipa’ inn panin a kiguk leh, a gupa a kimuh leh amah in a zah nih pia ding hi.
A gupa a kimuh kei leh a vengpa’ vante amah in gu hiam gu lo hiam cih a kitel nadingin thukhente' mai-ah inn neipa kipaipih ding hi.

“Thu neihna khat peuhpeuh, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi a, tuu ahi a, puansilh ahi zongin, a mang na khat peuhpeuh, mi khat in, ‘Hih pen kei aa hi,’ a cihna thu-ah, a lang nihte’ thu pen thukhente’ mai-ah tung ding hi; thukhente in a mawhsak mipa in a vengpa' tungah a zah nih pia ding hi.
“Mi khat in ama vengte' tungah la ahi a, bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi zongin, ganhing khat peuhpeuh kep dingin a piak a, kuama' muh lohin tua ganhing a si a, a liam a, a kihawl khia ahi zongin ahih leh,
amah in a vengpa’ neihsa a gu kha hiam cih a kitheih nadingin amaute gel’ kikal-ah Topa tawh kiciamna om ding hi; a neipa in tua kiciamna saang ding a, amah in ditkikna bawl lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin ama' tung panin a kigu ahih leh, a neipa' tungah amah in ditkikna bawl ding hi.
Gamsa in a balzan ahih leh, lahtel nadingin tua ganhing paipihsak in; a kibalzan ganhing ditkikna amah in bawl lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in a vengte’ na khat peuhpeuh kawm a, a neipa om loin a liam a, a si zongin, amah in a kicingin ditkikna bawl ding hi.
A neipa tawh a omkhawm ahih leh amah in ditkikna bawl lo ding hi; a kikawm ahih leh a kikawm bangin pai ding hi.
“Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat zolin amah tawh a lup khop leh, amah in tua nu’ man ding moman letsong pia ding a, ama' zi hisak ding hi.
A numei’ pa in ama' tungah tua nu piak ding a nial leh, tua mipa in nungak moman letsong zah numei’ pa’ tungah sum pia veve ding hi.
“Numei aisannu na hing khawi kei ding uh hi.
“Ganhing tawh a mawh peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Topa bek sim loh pasian khat peuhpeuh' tungah biakna a pia peuhmah kisusia mang ding hi.
“Khual mi khat' tungah khialhna na bawl kei ding uh a, amah na nengniam kei ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in Izipt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uh hi.
Meigong numei ahi a, tagah ahi zongin na gimsak kei ding uh hi.
Note in amaute na gimsak uh a, amaute keima' tungah hong kiko leh, keimah in amau’ kikona ka za taktak ding hi;
ka hehna so-in namsau tawh note kong that ding a, na zite uh meigong numei leh na tate uh pa nei lo suak ding uh hi.
“Note tawh a om, a zawng keima' mite khat peuhpeuh' tungah sum leitawi na piak uh leh, ama' tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama' tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uh hi.
Khapna ahi na vengpa’ puansilh na lak ngei khak leh nitum ma-in ama' tungah na piakik ding hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh ama' kituamna in tua bek hi a, tua in ama' pumpi adingin puansilh ahi hi; amah bang dang tawh lum ding ahi hiam? Amah kei' tungah hong kiko leh ke’n ka za ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in hehpihna ka nei hi.
“Pasian na simmawh kei ding uh a, na mite uh a ukpa zong na samsia kei ding uh hi.
“Na anlakna pan leh na suknate panun a leetkhiate piak ding na zekai kei ding uh hi. “Na tapa cilte uh keima' tungah nong pia ding uh hi.
Na bawngtalte leh na tuute uh tawh tua mah bangin na hih ding uh hi; ni sagih sung a pi tawh om ding hi; a ni giat ni-in kei' tungah nong pia ding uh hi.
“Note in kei' tungah hong ki-ap mite na hi ding uh hi; tua ahih ciangin gamlakah gamsate in a balzan sa peuhmah note in na ne kei ding uh hi; note in tua sa uite na lot ding uh hi.
“Thu manlo na gen khia kei ding uh hi. Elna tawh teci pang dingin mi gilopa tawh na kipawl kei ding uh hi.
Siatna bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uh hi; thutang a heikhia dingin mi honpi' nungah kihei-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uh hi;
ama' thu neihna-ah mi zawngpa na lang neih kei ding uh hi.
“Na galte’ bawngtal ahi a, a la ahi zongin a gammang na tuah uh leh ama' kiangah na hawl kik ding uh hi.
Nangmah a hong mudahpa’ la a van tawh a puk na muh leh a la tawh amah na nusia kei ding a, tua la phot toh ding na huh ding hi.
“Ama'thu neihna-ah na mi zawngpa’ thutan’na na heikhiatsak kei ding hi.
A man lopi-a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem un la, a dikpa leh thumanpa that kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
Sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi, bang hang hiam na cih leh sumgolh in uliante mit tawsak a, thuman mite’ thu hei khiatsak hi.
“Khual mi na nengniam kei ding uh hi; khual mi’ lungsim na thei uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in Izipt leitangah khual mi na hi ngei uh hi.
“Note in na leitang uh-ah kum guk sung khai tuhin a piangte na kaikhawm ding uh hi;

ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau' mi a zawngte in a nek theih nadingin leitang tawlnga sakin lokhul-in na omsak ding uh hi; gamlak ganhingte in amau’ nusiatte ne thei ding uh hi. Na leenggui lote uh leh na oliv lote uh zong tua mah bangin na hih ding uh hi.

“Ni guk sung na nasep uh na sem ding uh hi, ahih hangin na bawngtal leh na la in tawlngakna a neih theih nading leh, na numei-nasem’ tapa leh khual mite in thathak a ngah theih nadingin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding hi.
Nang' tunga kong gente khempeuh thudon in; pasian dangte’ min genin nei kei in la, na kam sung panin zong tua bangte kizasak kei in.
“Kum khat in thum vei, keimah adingin pawi na bawl ding uh hi.

Silngo sawhloh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi; keimah in note kong thupiak bangin Abib kha sung a kisehsa hun ciangin ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua kha sungin Izipt panin note na paikhia uh hi. Khut hawm guak tawh keima' maiah kuamah hong kilaak lo ding hi.
Note in lo-a na tuh uh, na nasepna uh a gah masa, anlak pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Note in lo panin na nasepna uh a gah na kaihkhop uh kum bei ciangin kaihkhopna pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
Topa PASIAN’ mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khat in thum vei kilaak ding uh hi.
“Note in silngo sawh anlum tawh keimah biak piakna si na pia khawm kei ding uh a, ka pawi’ sathau zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uh hi.
“Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen Topa na Pasian uh’ innah na paipih ding uh hi. “Note in a pi’ nawizu tawh keelno na huan kei ding uh hi.
“En un, keimah in ka bawlsa mun-ah note hong paipih ding leh lam kal-ah note hong cing dingin note’ mai-ah vantung mi khat ka sawl hi.
Amah thudon-in ama' aw ngai un la amah lehdo kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in note’ thu palsatna hong maisak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keima' min tawh nasem ahi hi.
“Ahih hangin note in ama' aw lim takin ngai-in keima' gen bangin na gamtat uh leh na galte uh’ tungah gal ka hi ding a, na langte uh’ tungah lang ka hi ding hi.
“Note’ mai-ah ka vantungmi pai-in Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite' kiangah note hong paipihin, keimah in amaute ka phiatkhiat ciangin,
amau’ pasiante’ mai-ah note kun loin, amaute bia loin, amau' gamtat bangin na gamta kei ding uh a, note in amaute lawnthal mang kiuhkeuh-in amau’ milim khuampite na satnen gawp ding uh hi.
Note in Topa na Pasian uh’ na nasem ding uh a, keimah in na an uh leh na tui uh thupha ka pia ding hi; keimah in note’ lak panin cinatna ka lakhia ding hi.
Note’ leitangah kuamah nausia om lo ding a, a ciing zong om lo ding hi; note kong teek sihsak ding hi.
Keimah hong kikihtakna note’ mai-ah paisakin note’ phut khak ding mi khempeuh ka kitokgawpsak ding a, na galte khempeuh uh kinung hei-in note' kiang panin ka taisak ding hi.
Note’ mai panin Hiv mi, Kanaan mi leh Hit mi a hawlkhia dingin note’ mai-ah tunpi ka sawl ding hi.
Leitang gamkhing suakin gamlak ganhingte note’ lang khatah tampi pha kha ding ahih ciangin note’ mai panin kum khat sungin amaute ka hawlkhia kei ding hi.
Note khangin tampi pha-in leitang na luah matengun note’ mai panin tawm tawmin amaute ka hawlkhia ding hi.

Keimah in San Tuipi panin Filistia mite’ tuipi ciang leh gamlak panin Eufrates gun ciang dongah na gamgite uh ka phut ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua gam-a teeng mite note’ khut sungah kong pia ding a, note in na mai uh-ah amaute na hawlkhia ding uh hi.
Amaute ahi a, amau’ pasiante tawh ahi zongin thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Amaute in kei' tungah note hong khialsak kha ding ahih ciangin note’ leitang tungah amaute teeng lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note in amau' pasiante’ na nasep uh leh note’ tungah thangzak khat hong hi taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Moses' kiangah, “Nang leh Aaron, Nadab, Abihu leh Israel upate' sung pan sawmsagih tawh Topa' kiangah hong pai to un la, a gamla panin hong bia un.
Topa’ nai-ah Moses bek in hong nai ding hi; ahih hangin a dangte a nai-ah hong pai loin, mite amah tawh hong pai to khawm lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses hong pai-in Topa’ thugente khempeuh leh biakna ngeinate khempeuh mite' kiangah gen hi; mite khempeuh in aw kikhatin dawng uh a, “Topa’ gensa thute khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Moses in Topa’ thugente khempeuh gelh hi. Zingsangin amah tho baih a, mual bul-ah biakna tau khat lamin, Israel minam sawm-le-nihte tawh kituakin khuam sawm-le-nih phut hi.
Amah in Israel mi tangvalte sawlin, tuate in meihal biakna leh thu-nuam-a biakna bawngtalte tawh Topa' tungah pia uh hi.
Moses in sisan kimkhat la-in, kuangte sungah koih a, sisan kimkhat biakna tau tungah theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in thuciamna laibu la-in, mite’ zak-in tua laibu sim hi; amaute in, “Topa’ gensa khempeuh kote in ka hih ding uh a, kote ka thumang ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
Moses in sisan la-in mite' tungah theh a, “Hih thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in Topa in note tawh a bawlsa thuciamna sisan en un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses leh Aaron, Nadab, Abihu leh Israel upate' sung pan sawmsagih pai to uh a,
amaute in Israel Pasian mu uh hi; ama' khe nuai-ah a siangthona van meel tawh a kibang, suangmanpha tawh a kibawl suangphahpek bang pian om hi.
Amah in Israel mi makaite gimna ngahsak lo hi; amaute in Pasian mu uh a, tua ciangin an ne-in tui dawn uh hi.

Topa in Moses kiangah, “Keima' kiang mual tungah hong paito in la, tua lai-ah ngak in; amaute a kihilh nadingin keima' gelhsa, thukham leh thupiakna tawh, suangpeekte nang' tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama' nasempa Joshua tawh Moses kithawi uh a, Pasian' mual tungah paito uh hi.
Amah in upate' kiangah, “Note' kiangah kong paikik matengun hih lai-ah kote hong ngak un; en un, note tawh Aaron leh Hur om hi; kitotna a nei peuhpeuh amaute' kiangah paisak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mual tungah Moses paito a, meii in mual tuam hi.
Topa’ minthan’na in Sinai Mual tungah kinga a, meii in ni guk sung tua mual tuam hi; a ni sagih ni-in amah in meii lak panin Moses sam hi.
Tu-in Topa; minthan’na a maipuakzia in, Israel mite’ muhna-ah mualvum dawn-ah a kangtum thei meikuang tawh kibang hi.
Meii sungah Moses tum a, mual tungah paito hi. Moses sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung mual tungah om hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Amaute in kei adingin biakna hong paipih nadingin Israel mite' kiangah gen in; ama' lungsim in a utsak mi peuhmah tung panin kei adingin biakna na sang ding hi.
Amaute' tung panin na san’ ding biakna in hih ahi hi: kham, ngun, sumngo,
a dum, a dupsan, a ausan puante leh a kop-a kikhuk khau tawh kigan puan hoih, keel mul,
a kisansak tuutal vunte, keel vunte, singkha sing,
meivakte ading sathau, nilh sathau ding leh paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
siampipuan leh awmdal-a bulh dingin onik suangte ahi hi.
Amaute' lakah kei ka om theih nadingin kei adingin biakinn khat amaute bawlsak in.
Biakbuk leh a na-zatte’ lim ding tawh kisai-in nang' tungah kong lahsate khempeuh tawh kituakin nangmah in na bawl ding hi.
“Amaute in singkha sing tawh singkuang khat bawl ding uh hi; a dung tong nih leh khap, a vai tong khat leh khap, a san’na tong khat leh khap hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak tawh tua singkuang na zut ding a, a sung leh a pua na zut ding hi, a tung kimkot-ah kham tawh a geihual na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in tua singkuang adingin kham kual li sungin a singkuang khe li' tungah tuate na bulh ding a, a pang khatah kual nih, a pang lang khatah kual nih na bulh ding hi.
Nangmah in singkha sing zawl na sui ding a, tuate kham tawh na zut ding hi.
Singkuang puak nadingin singkuang pang-a kualte' sungah zawlte na khum ding hi.
Singkuang’ kualte' sungah a zawlte om suak ding hi; tuate kila khia lo ding hi.
Nang' tunga kong piak ding tecipan’na nangmah in singkuang sungah na koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin kham citak tawh hehpihna tokhom khat na bawl ding hi; a dung tong nih leh khap, a vai tong khat leh khap hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham tawh kherub nih na bawl ding hi; hehpihna tokhom mong tuak-ah a kiseek tua kherubte na bawl ding hi.
Mong khatah kherub khat, a mong lang khatah kherub khat mah bawl in; hehpihna tokhom tawh a kizomin a mong tuak-ah kherubte na bawl ding hi.
Kherubte in a khate uh a tungah zal ding uh a, amau’ khate tawh hehpihna tokhom liim sunin amaute khat leh khat kimai-ngat ding uh hi; hehpihna tokhom lamah kherubte’ mai nga ding uh hi.
Singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom na koih ding hi; singkuang sungah nang kong piak ding tecipan’na na koih ding hi.

Hehpihna tokhom tung, tecipan’na singkuang tunga om kherub nihte' kikal panin nang tawh ka kituah ding a, Israel mite’ adingin nang' tungah thupiakna kong piak dingte khempeuh nang' tungah kong gen ding hi.
“Nangmah in singkha sing tawh sabuai khat na bawl ding hi; a dung tong nih, a vai tong khat, a san’na tong khat leh khap hi ding hi.
Kham citak tawh na zut ding a, a kimkotah kham tawh a geihual na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in khut peek cia a zai zawlpeek khat a kimkotah na bawl ding a, tua a zawlpeek kimkot ah a geihuai na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in tua sabuai’ adingin kham kual li na bawl ding a, tuate pen a kiu li, a khe lite-ah na gak ding hi.
Sabuai puak nading zawlte a len dingin a zawlpeek gei-ah a kualte om ding hi.
Nangmah in singkha sing zawlte bawlin kham tawh na zut ding a, hihte tawh sabuai kipua ding hi.
Biak piakna-a a kipiate buak nading paknamtui’ adingin a kuangdaite leh a pakante, tuiphih nadingin a thawl gongbakte leh a kung-ukte na bawl ding hi; kham citak tawh tuate na bawl ding hi.
Keima' mai sabuai tungah Ompihna Anlum na koih tawntung ding hi.
“Kham citak tawh meivakkhuam khat na bawl ding hi. Meivakkhuam bul leh a kungte pen a kiseek nate tawh kibawl ding hi; a haite, a nunte leh a pakte in tua tawh sa-khat hi khawm ding uh hi;
a pangte panin hiang guk meengkhia ding a, a pang khat ah meivakkhuam hiang thum meengkhia-in, a pang lang khatah meivakkhuam hiang thum mah meengkhia ding hi;

hiang khat ciat tungah a nun leh a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum leh a dang hiang khat ciat tungah a nun leh a pak a om, almond tawh a kibang hai thum leh a dang hiang khat ciat tungah a nun leh a pak a om, almond tawh a kibang hai thum mah kibawl hi—tua ahih ciangin hiang gukte meivakkhuam panin meengkhia hi;
a meivakkhuam tung mahmahah a nunte leh a pakte tawh a om, almond bangin a kibawl hai li om-in,
meivakkhuam panin hiang guk a kopte’ bul-ah tua tawh sakhat ahi nun khat om hi
Amau’ nunte leh a hiangte in sakhat hi ding a, a vekpi-in kham citak a kiseek sakhat hi ding hi.
Nangmah in ama' adingin meivak sagihte na bawl ding hi; ama' omna mai teng khua a vaksak dingin meivakte kikoih ding hi.
A taitehte leh a kuangte kham citak hi ding hi.
Kham citak talen khat tawh hih nazatte khempeuh kibawl ding hi.
Mual tungah nang' tunga hong kilak hih nate pen amau’ lim ding bangin na bawl ding thei in.
“Tua tham loin a kop-a kikhuk khau hoih tawh kigan dalna puan sawm leh a dum, a dupsan leh a ausan khaute tawh biakbuk na bawl ding hi; hoih taka a kibawl kherubte tawh tuate na bawl ding hi.
Dalna puan a dung tong sawmnih-le-giat hi ding a, dalna puan a vai tong li hi ding hi; dalna puan khempeuh kikim ciat ding hi.
Dalna puan ngate khat leh khat kikhuituah ding hi; dalna puan a dang ngate zong khat leh khat kikhuituah ding hi.

A kikhuituah a masa dalna puan a nawlnung pen’ nawl dung suk-ah khau dum tawh a bilvangte na bawl ding hi; tua mah bangin a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan nawlnung pen’ nawl dung suk mah-ah a bilvangte na bawl ding hi.
Dalna puan khat tungah bilvang sawmnga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan nawl-ah bilvang sawmnga mah na bawl ding hi; a bilvangte khat leh khat kitang ding uh hi.
Biakbuk pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in kham kilhna sawmnga bawlin, kilhnate tawh dalna puan khat leh khat na kimatsak ding hi.
“Biakbuk tungah a puanbuk dingin keel mul tawh puante zong na bawl ding hi; puan sawm-le-khat na bawl ding hi.
Tua puan a dung tong sawmthum, a vaitong li ciat hi ding hi; puan sawm-le-khatte kikim ding hi.
Tua puan ngate amau leh amau khuituahin, puan gukte zong amau leh amau mah na khuituah ding a, a gukna puan pen puanbuk mai-ah na khep ding hi.
A kikhuituah puan khat nawl-ah a bilvang sawmnga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna puan nawlnung pen nawl-ah a bilvang sawmnga mah na bawl ding hi.
“Tua pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in sumngo kilhna sawmnga bawlin, a bilvangte sungah kilhnate guangin, puanbuk na kimatsak ding hi.
Puanbuk puan a valkhia, puan a lang a val pen, biakbuk nungah kaisuk ding hi.
Puanbuk puan a dung lam, pang khatah tong khat, a pang lang khatah tong khat a val pen, a khuh dingin biakbuk hih lam pang leh hua lam pangte-ah kaisuk ding hi.
A kisansak tuutal vunte leh keel vunte tawh puanbuk khuhna khat na bawl ding hi.
“Biakbuk adingin a po to ding khuampeekte singkha sing na bawl ding hi.
A khuampeek khat a tun’ tong sawm hi ding a, a vai tong khat leh khap vive hi ding hi.
A bulh nadingin a khuampeek khatah a zang nih ciat om ding hi:
Biakbuk khuampeekte na bawl ding hi; leitaw lam pang adingin khuampeek sawmnih hi ding hi;

a khuampeek sawmnihte' bul-ah bullen sawmli ngun tawh na bawl ding a, a zang nihte’ adingin khuampeek dang khat bul-ah bullen nih a khuampeek dang khat bul-ah a zang nihte adingin bullen nih mah hi ding hi;
biakbuk a pang nihna lam, leilu lam panga a khuampeek sawmnihte leh
nguntawh kibawl a bullen sawmlite’ adingin, khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih, a dang khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih mah hi ding hi;
nitumna lam, biakbuk nung lam adingin khuampeek guk na bawl ding hi.
Biakbuk nung lam kiute’ adingin a khuampeek nih na bawl ding hi;
tuate a bul lamah kikak ding a, ahih hangin a kual masa-ah a dawn kimat ding hi; a nih-in tua bang hi ding hi; tuate in a kiu nihte piangsak ding uh hi.
Ngun tawh kibawl amau’ bullen, bullen sawm-le-gukte tawh a khuampeek giat pha ding hi; khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih, a dang khuampeek khat bul-ah bullen nih mah om ding hi.
“Singkha sing, zawl-in na bawl ding hi,
biakbuk pang khat-a khuampeek adingin nga, biakbuk a pang lang khat-a khuampeek adingin zawl nga, nitumna lam biakbuk nung lam pang-a a khuampeekte’ adingin zawl nga hi ding hi.
A zawl laita, a khuampeek kim ciang a banto pen mong khat pan mong khat paisuak ding hi.
A khuampeekte kham tawh zut-in, zawlte a len dingin amau kualte kham tawh na bawl ding hi; zawlte kham tawh na zut ding hi.
A lim ding geelna, mual tungah nang' tungah hong kilak mah tawh kizui-in biakbuk na lam ding hi.
“A dum, a dupsan, a ausan nate leh a kop-a kikhuk khau hoih tawh dalna puan khat na bawl ding hi; hoih taka a kibawl kherubte tawh kibawl ding hi;
ngun tawh kibawl bullen lite' tungah a om kham kibawl vankhaina nei-in, kham tawh a kizut singkha khuampi lite' tungah na khai ding hi.
A kilhnate-ah dalna puan khai sukin, dalna puan sung tua lai mun-ah tecipan’na singkuang na koih ding hi; dalna puan in siangtho pen mun panin siangtho mun khen ding hi.
Siangtho pen mun sunga om tecipan’na singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom na koih ding hi.
Dalna puan pua lamah sabuai koih-in, sabuai tawh a kisan biakbuk leitaw lam pangah meivakkhuam na koih ding hi; leilu lam pangah sabuai na koih ding hi.
“Puanbuk kongkhak dingin, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem kongpuankhai khat na bawl ding hi.
Kongpuankhai adingin singkha khuampi nga bawlin kham tawh na zut ding hi; a vankhainate kham hi ding a, tuate’ adingin sumngo bullen nga na bawl ding hi.
“Biakna tau singkha sing tawh bawlin, tong nga sau-in tong nga na zaisak ding hi; biakna tau a ning kim ding a, a tun’ tong thum hi ding hi.
A kiu lite-ah ki na bawl ding hi; a kite in a biakna tau tawh sakhat hi ding a, sumngo tawh na zut ding hi.
Ama adingin vut koihna ding beelte leh kawbiate, kuangte, sikkeute leh vut luahna peekte na bawl ding hi; a nazat khempeuh sumngo tawh na bawl ding hi.
Ama adingin siklen, a vang simsiam zong sumngo tawh na bawl ding hi; siklen tung, a kiu lite-ah sumngo kual li na bawl ding hi.
Siklen in biakna tau kim ciang a bat suk theih nadingin biakna tau zawl nuai panin na bulh ding hi.
Biakna tau adingin zawl, singkha sing zawl bawlin sumngo tawh tuate na zut ding hi;
a kipuak ciangin biakna tau pang nihte-ah a zawlte a om theih nadingin a kualte’ vang sungah a zawlte kikhum ding hi.
Singpekte tawh a kuakin na bawl ding hi; mual tunga nang' tungah hong kilaksa bangin kibawl ding hi.
“Biakbuk tual na bawl ding hi. A tual in leitaw lam pangah pangkhat adingin tong za a sau, a kop-a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan a kikhaisukte nei ding hi;
a khuamte sawmnih leh a bullente sawmnih pen sumngo tawh a kibawl hi ding hi, ahih hangin khuampi tunga vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.

Leilu lam panga ding zong a sauna tua bangmah hi-in, a kikhaisukte tong za sau ding a, a khuamte sawmnih leh a bullente sawmnih in sumngo tawh a kibawl hi ding hi, ahih hangin khuampi tunga vankhainate leh a gaknate in ngun tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.
Nitumna lam pangah buk tual a vai lam adingin khuampi sawmte leh bullen sawmte tawh tong sawmnga a sau a kikhaisukte om ding hi.
A mai lam, nisuahna lam buk tual a vai in tong sawmnga hi ding hi.
Kongpi pang khat ading a kikhaisukte in tong sawm-le-nga hi ding a, khuampi thumte leh bullen thumte tawh hi ding hi.
A pang lang khatah a kikhaisukte in tong sawm-le-nga hi ding a, khuampi thumte leh bullen thumte tawh hi ding hi.

Buk tual-a kongpi dingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk khau hoihte tawh a kigan, phim tawh khui-in a kizem, tong sawmnih a sau kongpuankhai khat om ding hi; tua in khuampi lite leh bullen li nei ding hi.
Buk tual kiim-a khuampi khempeuh ngun tawh kibawl gakna tawh kigak ding hi; a vankhainate ngun hi-in a bullente sumngo hi ding hi.
Buk tual a dung tong za khat, a vai tong sawmnga, a san’na tong nga hi-in, a kop-a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan a kikhaisukte leh sumngo bullente tawh hi ding hi.
Biakbuk na zat ahi a kizang ding peuhmahte leh a khetphimte khempeuh leh buk tual a, khetphimte khempeuh sumngo tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.
“Meivak a kuang tawntung dingin a kikoih theih nading, a vak dingin amaute in a kisuzan oliv gah thau siangtho nang' kiangah hong paipih nadingin Israel mite thu na pia ding hi.

Kikhopna buk sung, tecipan’na mai-a dalna puan pua lam-ah, Aaron leh ama' tapate in nitak-a kipan zingsang dong Topa’ mai-ah meivakte kuangsak ding uh hi. Tua pen, Israel mite in amau' khang tawntungin a zuih ding uh ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.

“Tua ciangin keimah' tungah siampi na a sem dingin Israel mite' lak panin na sanggampa Aaron leh amah tawh a tapate—Aaron leh Aaron’ tapate, Nadab leh Abihu, Eleazar leh Ithamar, nangma' kiangah la in.
Minthan’na leh hoihna tawh a kidim nadingin na sanggampa Aaron ading biakna puan siangtho na bawl ding hi.
Keima' siampi nasepna-ah amah a ap dingin amaute in Aaron’ puante a bawl nading, hih theih ciimna ka guatsa, siamna a nei mite khempeuh tungah gen in.

Hihte in amaute’ bawl ding puante ahi hi: awmdal khat, siampipuan khat, puantualpi khat, sikli nei-a a gial puantungsilh khat, dialpi khat leh kawnggak khat ahi hi; keima' tungah siampi na a sem ding na sanggampa Aaron leh ama' tapate’ adingin amaute in biakna puan siangthote bawl ding uh hi.
“Amaute in kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk tawh a kigan puan hoihte zang ding uh hi.
Amaute in siampipuan pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh bawlin hoih takin a kibawl hi ding hi.
A kizop khawm theih nadingin a mong nihte-ah a kimat liangkaihna puan nih nei ding hi.
Amah a gak dinga hoih tak-a a kigan tua tunga puan om pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk puan hoihte tawh kibawlin, a sepna zia leh a nate a kibang hi ding hi.
Nangmah in onik suang nih la-in tuate' tungah Israel tapate’ min na gelh ding a,
amau’ suahna tawh kizui-in amau' min gukte suang khat tungah gelhin, a om lai gukte’ min a suang dang khat tungah na gelh ding hi.
Kizepna a bawlpa in min gelhna a bawl bangin Israel tapa sawm-le-nihte’ minte tawh suang nihte na gelh ding hi; tuate pen kham-a zepna tawh na um ding hi.
Israel tapate phawkna suang dingin siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tungah tua suang nihte na bulh ding hi; Aaron in ama' liangko nihte' tungah phawk nadingin Topa’ mai-ah amaute’ min pua ding hi.
Kham tawh kibawl a kiphut kizepna leh
khau banga a kihual, kham citak khainiang nih na bawl ding hi; a kihual khainiangte pen a kiphutte' tungah na bulh ding hi.
“Hoih tak-a a kibawl thukhenna awmdal khat na bawl ding hi; siampipuan a kibawl mah bangin na bawl ding hi; kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute leh a kop-a kikhuk puan hoih tawh na bawl ding hi.
A ning kikim-in thuap nih hi ding a, a dung khap khat, a vai khap khat hi ding hi.
Tua sungah suang gual li-in na bulh ding hi. Sardis suang, topaz suang leh karbankel suang gual khat in a gual masa hi ding hi;
a gual nihna in emerald suang, sapfeiros suang leh diamond suang hi ding hi;
a gual thumna in jakinth suang, agate suang leh amethist suang hi ding hi;
a gual lina in khrysolite suang, onik suang leh jasper suang hi ding hi; kham tawh zepna sungah tuate kibulh ding hi.
Israel tapate’ min tawh kituakin amaute’ min a omna suang sawm-le-nih om ding hi; tuate in minam sawm-le-nihte’ adingin amau’ min ciat kigelhin, min gelhna tawh kibang ding hi.
Awmdal adingin khau tawh a kibang, a kihual kham citak khainiang na bawl ding hi;
awmdal adingin kham kual nih na bawl ding a, awmdal mongah tua kual nihte na bulh ding hi.
Awmdal mong a kual nihte' sungah kham khau nihte na khum ding hi;
khau mong nihte zepna tawh na zom ding a, siampipuan’ liangkaih puan mai lamah tua bangin na zom ding hi.
Kham kual nih na bawl ding a, awmdal mong nih, siampi puan tawh a kizom a sung lamah na bulh ding hi.
Kham kual nih na bawl ding a, siampipuan liangkaih nihte’ nuai a mai lam, hoih taka a kigan siampi puankhau a kizopna tung sanah na bulh ding hi.
Hoih taka a kigan siampipuan’ khau tungah a om theih nading leh siampipuan tung panin awmdal a kol theih loh nadingin amaute in siampipuan’ kual-ah khau dum khat-in a kual tawh gak ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ mai-ah phawk tawntung nadingin amaute paipih dingin siangtho munah amah a pai ciangin, Aaron in ama' lungtang tunga a om thukhenna awmdal sungah Israel tapate’ minte pua ding hi.

Thukhenna awmdal sungah Urim leh Thummim na koih ding a, Topa’ mai-ah a pai ciangin Aaron’ lungtang tungah tuate om ding hi; tua bangin Aaron in ama' lungtang tungah Israel mite’ thukhenna Topa’ mai-ah pua tawntung ding hi.
“Siampi puantualpi puan dum bek tawh na bawl ding hi.
Puan ngawng bangin a kikeek loh nadingin a ngawng kimkotah a kigan tawh a kizim, lutang thawl a vang nei ding hi.
A mong-ah a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh a kizem mang kawlsing gah bawlin, a mong kiim-ah amaute’ kikal-ah kham siklong bawlin
puantualpi mong kimkotah a gah bangin na bawl ding hi.
Amah in biakna na a sep ciangin Aaron in tua puan silh ding a, amah a sih khak loh nadingin Topa’ mai a siangtho munah a tum ciang leh a pusuah ciangin a gingte kiza ding hi.
“Nangmah in kham citak tawh a peek khat na bawl ding a, min gelhna a kibawlte mah bangin tua tungah, ‘Topa ading siangtho’ ci-in na gelh ding hi.
Tua pen, khau dum khat tawh dialpi tungah na gak ding hi; dialpi mai lamah om ding hi.

Tua pen Aaron’ taltang-ah om ding a, Israel mite in letsong siangtho a piakna uh ahi, a siangtho biak piakna-ah mawhna a om peuhmah Aaron in ama' tungah khu ding hi; Topa’ mai-ah amaute a kisan’ theih nadingin ama' taltang tungah tua a peek om tawntung ding hi.
“A puantungsilh khau hoih tawh sikli nei a gial-in na gan ding a, khau hoih tawh dialpi khat na bawl ding a, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem kawnggak khat na bawl ding hi.
“Aaron’ tapate' adingin puantungsilhte, kawnggakte, lukhute na bawl ding hi; minthan’na leh hoihna tawh a kidim nadingin tuate na bawl ding hi.

Amaute in keima' tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun na sanggampa Aaron leh amah tawh a om ama' tapate' tungah tuate na silhsak ding a, amaute sathau nilhin, nasem dingin kipsakin, na siangthosak ding hi.
A ci guak-a a omna uh a tuam dingin amau adingin puan hoihte tawh pheituamte na bawlsak ding hi; tuate in kawng panin phei ciang ban ding hi;

amaute kikhopna buk-ah a pai ciang uh ahi a, siangtho mun-ah nasem dingin biakna tau nai-ah a pai ciang uh ahi zongin, Aaron leh ama' tapate in tuate silh ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh amaute in amau' tung mah-ah mawhna a kisuantawm suakin si ding uh hi. Hih in amah leh ama khit cianga a suan-le-khakte adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
“Tu-in hih in, amaute in keima' tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun amaute na sian’thosak nadingin amaute' tunga na hih ding ahi hi. Bawngtalno khat leh a sitbang lo tuutal nih,
leh silngo sawhloh anlum, sathau tawh a kihel silngo sawhloh mohte, sathau tawh a kizut silngo sawhloh mohphengte la in. Tuate pen mangbuh nel tawh na bawl ding hi.
Lawh khat sungah tuatekoihin tuate a lawh-in paipih-in, a bawngtal leh a tuutal nih zong na paipih ding hi.
Aaron leh a tapate kikhopna buk kongkhak-ah na paipih ding a, amaute tui tawh na sil ding hi.
Nangmah in puante la-in, Aaron’ tungah puantungsilh leh siampi puantualpi, siampipuan leh awmdal koihin, hoih taka a kigan siampipuan gakna tawh amah na gak ding hi;
ama' lu tungah dialpi khimsakin, dialpi tungah kumpi lukhu siangtho na khusak ding hi.
