A kum giatna ah lo na pawi uh ciangin, note in anlui na ne ding uh hi; anthak hong tun’ a kum kua mateng note in a lui na ne ding uh hi.
Leitang in keima’ aa ahih manin neih suak dingin leitang kizuak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei tawh a omkhawm mikhual leh peemtate na hi uh hi.
Note in na neih uh leitang khempeuh na kitanh kik sak thei ding uh hi.
“Na sanggampa zawngin a neihsa leitang khenkhat a zuak leh, tua ciangin amah tawh a kinai a behpa hong pai-in a sanggampa zuaksa tanh ding hi.
Mi khat in tua na a tatsak ding mi a neih kei a, amahmah hong hau kikin a tanh zo dingin a pian’ leh,
amah in tua na a zuak zawh a kumte sim hen la, a zuakna mipa tungah a val-a piak dingte pia kik hen; amah in a neihsa ngah kik ding hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama adingin ngah kik zawh nading lampi a neih kei leh, tua ama zuak na pen jubili kum mateng a leipa’ khut sungah om ding hi; jubili ciangin tua na kipia khia-in, amah in a neihsa ngah kik ding hi.
“Mi khat in khuapi kulh sungah ten’na inn khat a zuak leh, a kizuak khit kum khat bit sungin amah in tanh kik thei ding hi; kum khat bit sung amah in tatkik theih nading thu nei ding hi.
Tua pen kum khat khit bit sungin a kitatkik kei leh, khuapi kulh sunga om tua inn pen a leipa in khang tawntungin a neih dingin kibawlsak ding hi; jubili ciangin kipiakik lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin a kimkotah kulh a nei lo khua neu-a innte pen gam sung lote tawh a kibangin kingaihsun ding hi; tuate kitanh kik thei ding hi; jubili ciangin tuate kipiakhia ding hi.
Ahi zongin Levi mite’ khuapite, amau neihsa khuapite-a innte ahih leh, Levi mite in khat vei peuh ciangin tanh thei ding uh hi.

Levi mi khatpeuh in ama tat kik theih ding hi napi a tat kei leh, amau neihsa khuapi sunga tua inn pen jubili ciangin kipia khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mite’ khuapi sunga innte pen Israel mite lakah amau neihsa ahi hi.
Ahih hangin amau khuapi taang gamte kizuak thei lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in amau’ neih tawntung na ahi hi.
“Na sanggampa uh zawng-in, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vaak ding uh hi; mikhual leh peemta bangin amah in note tawh om ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh no kiangah hong ten’ theih nadingin ama tung panin ameet akhang la kei un la, na Pasian uh zahtak un.
Note in ama tungah a meet-in sum leitawi pia loin, ama tungah a meet-in na an uh zong na pia kei ding uh hi.
Keimah in note’ Pasian ahi ding leh, note tungah Kanaan leitang a hong pia dingin Izipt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
“Na gei-a na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na sem sak kei ding hi:
amah in nang kiangah a kicial nasem leh peemta bangin om ding hi. Amah in jubili kum mateng nang tawh na hong sem ding hi;
tua ciangin nang kiang panin amah leh amah tawh a om a tate paikhia-in, ama innkuan zuan kikin, a pate’ neihsa ngah kik ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Izipt gam panin ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte ahi uh hi; a amaute sila-in kizuak lo ding hi.
Note in hih gawpgawpna tawh amah na uk kei ding uh a, na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi.
Note in na neih theih ding uh sila pasal leh sila numeite in: note in na kimkot uh a, om minamte lak panin sila pasal leh sila numei na lei thei ding uh hi.
Note in na gam sung uhah a suak, note lakah a hong peem mi khualte leh note tawh a om amau’ innkuante lak panin zong na lei thei ding uh hi; amaute in nomau’ aa hi thei ding uh hi.

Note in amaute pen note khit ciangin na tapate uh tungah amau’ neih tawntung dingin a luah dingin na pia thei ding uh hi; note in sila-in amaute na nei thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggam uh Israel mite khat leh khat hih gawpgawpna tawh na ki-uk kei ding uh hi.

“Note tawh a om khualmi ahih kei leh peemta khat hong hau a, ama kianga om na sanggampa uh zawngin, no tawh a om khualmipa tung ahi a, peemta-pa tung ahi zongin, tua ahih kei leh khualmipa innkuan khatpeuh peuh tungah amah a kizuak leh,
amah in a kizuak khit ciangin amah kitanh kik thei ding hi; ama sanggamte khatpeuh peuh in amah tanh thei ding hi;

ama innlak pa ahih kei leh a innlak sanggampa in tanh thei ding hi; ama innkuan sunga a kinai pih a beh khatpeuh in amah tanh thei ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong amah a hauh leh amahmah kitanh kik thei ding hi.

Amah in ama tungah amahmah a kizuak-a kipan jubili kum dong amah a leipa tawh tuat ding a, ama suahtak nading sum pen a kum phazah tawh kituak hi ding hi; a topa tawh a omkhawm hun sung teng pen a kicial nasem khat thaman zah-in seh ding hi.
Kum tampi in a sap lai leh, amah in tuate tawh kituakin ama thaman ding a kipiakna sung panin ama kitatkhiat nadingin pia kik ding hi.
Ahih hangin jubili kum ding kum tawmkhat in a sap leh amah in a topa tawh tuatna khat nei ding hi; ama sepsak ding kum a om lai tawh kituakin ama kitatkhiat nadingin sum pia kik ding hi.
Amah in a topa tungah a kum kum-a kicial nasempa tawh kibang ding hi; a topa in note’ muhna ah hih gawpgawpna tawh amah uk lo ding hi.
Hih bang danin amah a kitatkhiat kei leh, jubili kum ciangin amah leh amah tawh a om a tate’ kikhahkhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in kei adingin nasemte ahi uh hi; amaute pen Izipt gam panin keimah in ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte ahi uh hi: keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

“Note in nomau adingin a mai-ah na kun dingun milim bawl loin, a kiseek milim hita leh khuam hita leh ding sak loin, na gam sung uhah suang milim na phut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
Note in ka sabbath-te tangin ka biakinn na zahtak ding uh hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
“Note in ka thukham zui-in ka thupiaknate mangin tuate na sep uh leh,
keimah in note guahtui amau’ hunin kong pia ding a, leitang in ama gahte hong piangsakin, lo-a kungte in amau’ gah gah ding uh hi.

Na cil uh ante lenggah lawh hun dong kimang ding a, leenggah minte in lo pawi hun dong kimang ding hi; note in na kham takun na an uh na ne ding uh a, lungnuam takin na gam sung uhah na teeng ding uh hi.

Keimah in gam sungah nopsakna hong pia-in, note lungdam takin na lum ding uh a, bangmah in note hong lausak lo ding hi; keimah in gam sung panin ganhing gilote ka hawlkhia ding a, gal kidona in na gam uh hong nawk lo ding hi.
Note in na galte uh na delh ding uh a, note mai-ah namsau in amaute puksak ding hi.
Note nga in zakhat zo-in, note zakhat in tulsawm na zo ding uh hi: note’ mai-ah namsau in na galte uh puksak ding hi.
Keimah in note ka hong pingaihsut ding a, note hong pung sakin, tampi hong phasakin, note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi.
Note in sau veipi a kikhol a luite ne-in, note in a thak koih nadingin alui na hahsiang masa ding uh hi.
Keimah in note lakah omna ka bawl ding a, keimah in note kong kih kei ding hi.
Keimah in note lakah omin note’ Pasian hi-in, note in keima mite na hi ding uh hi.
Note in amau sila na hih loh nadingun Izipt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi; keimah in note’ hakkolte kuaitanin note a dingtangin kong pai sak hi.
“Ahih hangin note in ka thu ngai loin, hih thupiaknate khempeuh na hih kei uh a,
note in ka thukhamte nialin, note in ka biakna ngeina kipte kih a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh sem loin, ka thuciamna na palsat uh leh,

keimah in note tungah hih bangin kong hih ding hi: note tungah hong tung dingin keimah in thakhat thu-a dipkuatna, zawngkhalna, leh mite siasakin nuntakna a kiamsak ding cisa natna kong tung sak ding hi. Note’ lo pawi in a mawkna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na galte un tuate ne ding hi;
Keimah in note kong maisiat ding a, na galte uh mai-ah, lelhna na thuak ding uh hi; note hong mudah mite in note hong uk ding a, kuamah in note hong delh lo napi-in na tai ding uh hi.
Tua bang hi napi-in note in ka thu nong ngaih kei uh leh, keimah in na khialhna hangun a zah sagih vei-in note kong thuhilh kik ding a,
keimah in na kiphatsakpih uh note’ vangliatna susia-in, na vantungte uh sik bangin bawlin na leitung uh sumngo bangin ka bawl ding hi;
na leitang un ama gah piangsak loin, na gam sung uh a, kungte in amau gah gah lo ding ahih manin note’ thatang a mawkna-a bei hi ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kei tawh kilehngatin pai-in, keima thu na ngaih kei uh leh, keimah in note’ khialhna a zah sagih vei-in note tungah gimna kong tung sak ding hi.
Keimah in note lakah gamsate hong khahin, amaute in na tate uh hong neksak ding a, na ganhingte uh susia-in, note mi tawmno khat hong suah ding a, note’ lampite in gamkhing suak ding hi.
“Hih banga hihna tawh kei lamah note hong kihei loin, kei tawh kilehngatin na pai lai uh leh,
kei zong note tawh a kilehngatin pai-in, keimahmah in na khialhnate uh hangin a zah sagih vei-in note kong sat ding hi.

Keimah in thuciamna omsa bangin phulakna na a sem ding namsau khat note tungah kong tung sak ding hi; na khuapi sung uhah note na kikhaihkhop uh leh zong keimah in note’ lakah natna kong tung sak ding a, galte khut sungah note hong kipia ding hi.

Keimah in note’ nuntakna an ka suksiat ciangin, nupi sawm in meibung khat sungah na anlum uh em ding a, na anlum uh a tawi tehin hong pia kik ding hi; note in na ne ding uh a, na kham zo kei ding uh hi.
“Tua bang hi napi-in note in keima thu ngai loin, kei tawh kilehngatin na pai lai uh leh,
note tawh a kilehngatin ka heh ngawh pah ding a, note’ khialhna hangin keimahmah in a zah sagih vei-in kong thuhilh ding hi.
Note in na tapate uh a sa na ne ding uh a, na tanute uh sa zong na ne ding uh hi.
Keimah in mual dawn-a na biaknate uh susia-in, na paknamtui biakna taute uh phukin, na milim’ siluang hawmte uh tungah na luanghawmte uh ka paii ding hi; keimah in note kong kih ding hi.
Keimah in na khuapite uh siasakin, na biakinnte uh gamkhing ka suaksak ding a, nomau’ gim namtuite ka diik kei ding hi.
Keimah in leitang ka siasak ding a, tua tungah a teeng na galte un lamdang sa ding uh hi.
Keimah in minamte lakah note kong thehthang ding a, keimah in namsau a paai panin dokin note kong delh ding hi; na leitang uh gamkhing hi ding a, na khuapite uh a sia hi ding hi.
“Tua ciangin na galte uh leitangah na om tan vei uh, gamkhing-a a om sung teng, leitang in a sabbath-te a ngah hi ding hi; tua ciangin leitang tawlnga-in, a sabbath-te ngah ding hi.
Ama tungah na ten’ lai takun a ngah loh tawlngakna ahi na sabbath-te uh, gamkhing a, a om sung teng a tawlnga hi ding hi.

Note sung panin galte leitangah a om lai mite tungah lungsim gimna ka tungsak ding hi; nahthel ging in amaute tai sak ding a, namsau mai-ah mi khat a tai bangin amaute tai ding uh a, kuamah in a delh lohpi-in amaute puk ding uh hi.
Kuamah in delh lo napi-in namsau mai pan a taikhia bangin amaute khat leh khat kiphupai ding uh hi; note in na galte uh nan’ zawh nading vangliatna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Minamte lakah note na sia ding uh a, na galte uh leitang in note hong nemang ding hi.
Note sung panin galte’ leitangah a om laite amau’ mawhna hangin kiam ding uh hi; amau’ pute pate’ mawhna hangin amau zong amaute mah bangin kiam ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh leh kei tawh kilehngatin a paina uh hangin amaute tawh kilehngatin pai-in, amau galte’ leitangah amaute ka paipihna thu ahi, amau’ mawhna leh, a pu a pate’ mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uh leh; ~
tua ciangin keimah in Jakob tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding a, keimah in Isaak tawh ka thuciamna leh Abraham tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding a, keimah in leitang zong ka phawk ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in leitang nusia-in, amaute om loin gamkhingin a om sung teng leitang in a sabbath-te na ngah ding hi; amaute in ka biakna ngeina kipte nialin, amaute in ka thukhamte mudah ahih manin, amaute in a mawhna uh thuak ding uh hi.

Bang bang ahi zongin, amaute a galte uh gam sungah a om sung teng uh keimah in amaute nilkhia loin, amaute a susia maimang zah ding leh amaute tawh ka thuciamna a pelh zah dingin amaute ka mudah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa amau Pasian ka hi hi;

ahih hangin keimah in amaute ka ngaihsutna-in keimah in amau’ Pasian ka hih theih nadingin, minamte’ muhna ah Izipt gam panin ka paikhiatpih amau’ pu leh pate tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte Moses tung tawnin Sinai Mual tungah Topa in amah leh Israel mite kikalah a bawl thukhamte leh biakna ngeina kipte leh thute ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Mi khat in a tuam vilvel-in kiciamna a bawl ciangin, tua a kiciamna a bawl ciangin, tua a kiciamna mite pen nangmah in Topa’ aa dingin na seh ding hi;
pasal kum sawmnih panin kum sawmguk a phate a man na sehna pen, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in mi khat ciangin ngun shekel sawmnga hi ding hi.
Tua mi in numei ahih leh, na sehna in shekel sawmthum hi ding hi.
Tua mi in kum nga pan kum sawmnih ciang a pha mi ahih leh, a man na sehna in pasal shekel sawmnih hi ding a, numei shekel sawm hi ding hi.
Tua mi in kha khat pan kum nga ciang a pha mi ahih leh, a man na sehna in pasal ngun shekel nga hi ding a, numei na sehna in ngun shekel thum hi ding hi.
Tua mi in kum sawmguk pan a tungsiah ahih leh, pasal na sehna in shekel sawm leh nga hi ding a, numei shekel sawm hi ding hi.

Mi khat zawng lua-in nangma seh zah a piak zawh kei leh, amah in siampipa kiangah a mi hong paipih ding a, siampipa in ama man seh ding hi; a kiciam mipa a siamna tawh kizui-in siampipa in ama man seh ding hi.
“Mite in Topa tungah biakna-in a piakte in ganhing ahih leh, mi khatpeuh in Topa tungah a piak tua bang ganhingte khempeuh a siangtho ahi hi.

Amah na khatpeuh peuh, ahoihte ahoih lo tawh ahi zongin, ahoih lote ahoih tawh a hi zongin, laih lo, kheek lo ding hi; amah in ganhing khat ganhing adang khat tawh a kheek leh, tua ganhing leh a kheekna ganhing a siangtho hi ding hi.
Tua pen Topa tungah biakna-in kipia thei lo ganhing nin khat ahih leh, mipa in siampipa mai-ah a ganhing paipih ding a,
siampipa in hoih hi ci-in ahi zongin sia hi ci-in ahi zongin a man zah seh ding hi; nang siampipa in a seh bangin hi pah ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua ganhing a tat nop leh, a kisehna banah seh nga suah seh khat behlap ding hi.
“Mi khat in a siangtho dingin Topa tungah a inn a ap ciangin, siampipa in hoih hi ci-in a hi zongin sia hi ci-in ahi zongin a man zah seh ding hi; siampipa in a seh bangin kip ding hi.
A appa in ama inn a tat nop leh, a kisehna banah sehnga suah sehkhat sum tawh behlap ding a, tua inn ama’ aa hi ding hi.
“Mi khat in a luah ahi ama leitang phel khat Topa tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici tawh kizui hi ding hi; mangbuhham beem khat a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi.
Amah in jubili kum a, kipanin a lo a ap leh, nangma sehna zahzah bit ding hi;
ahih hangin jubili khit ciangin amah in a lo a ap leh, siampipa in jubili kik dong a om lai kumte tawh kizui-in a man zah sum seh ding a, nangma sehna zah panin kikhiam ding hi.
Lo a appa in a tat nop leh, a kisehna banah sehnga suah sehkhat sum tawh behlap ding a, tua in ama’ aa hi suak ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a lo tanh nuam lo ahi a, amah in midang khat tungah a lo a zuak ahi zongin ahih leh, tua pen amah in tanh kik thei nawn lo ding hi;
a lo pen, jubili huna piak khiat ciangin, a ki-apsa lo mah bangin Topa tungah a siangtho hi ding hi; siampipa in tua lo tang ding hi.
Amah in a luahna tawh a neih a hilo, a leisa lo pen Topa tungah a ap leh,
siampipa in jubili kum ciang dong ding tua mah seh ding a, a mipa in tua ni-in a kiseh zah, Topa tungah a siangtho-in pia ding hi.
Jubili kum ciangin a lo pen a kileina-pa, gamluahna tawh tua leitang a nei mipa tungah pia kik ding hi.
A kisehna peuhmah biakinn shekel tawh kizui hi ding hi: gerah sawmnih ciangin shekel khat hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin tacil pen Topa’ aa ahih mah bangin, kuamah in ganhing tacilte ap thei lo ding hi; bawng hita leh tuu hita leh Topa’ aa ahi hi.
Ganhing nin ahih leh, nangma sehna bangin amah in lei kikin, tua banah seh nga suah seh khat behlap ding hi; tua hi lo a, a kitat kei leh, a kisehna bangin kizuak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin mi khat in a neih, Topa tungah a ap, a ki-apsa nate, mi hita leh ganhing hita leh, a luah ama lo hita leh, kizuak lo ding, kitanh lo ding hi; a ki-ap na peuhmah Topa tungah siangthopen hi.
Mite lak panin a kisusia mang ding a, ki-apsa mi peuhmah, kitanh lo ding hi; kithat ding hi.
“Leitung pana piang seh sawmsuah seh khat khempeuh khaici hita leh singgah hita leh, Topa’ aa ahi hi; Topa adingin siangtho hi.
Mi khatpeuh in seh sawmsuah seh khat a, a piak na khatpeuh peuh a tat nop leh, amah in tua banah seh nga suah seh khat behlap ding hi.
Bawnghon leh tuu, keelhon seh sawm suah seh khat khempeuh leh a cingpa’ ciangkhut nuai-a a pai ganhing khempeuh seh sawmsuah seh khat peuhmah Topa adingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
Mi khat in pha hiam sia hiam ci-in kantel lo ding a, khek lo ding hi; a khek leh, tua leh a khekna pen a siangtho hi ding hi; tua pen kitanh lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in Sinai Mual tungah Topa in Israel mite ading Moses tungah a piak thupiakte ahi hi.
Amaute in Izipt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kum nihna, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in, Sinai gamlak kikhopna puanbuk sungah Topa in Moses hopihin, hih bangin ci hi,
“Israel mi honte khempeuh a mi pha zah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, pasal peuhmah a milip-in sim in;
nang leh Aaron in Israel sungah kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha, galdo dingin a kuan thei ding mi khempeuh a hon a honin na sim ding uh hi.
A minam simin a beh sungah a lutang ahi mi khat ciat nang tawh hong om ding uh hi.
Hihte in no hong huh dingte min ahi hi. Reuben sung panin Shedeur’ tapa Elizur;
Simeon sung panin Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel;
Judah sung panin Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon;
Issakhar’ sung panin Zur’ tapa Nethanel;
Zebulun, sung panin Helon’ tapa Eliab;
Josef tapate, Efraim sung panin Ammihud’ tapa Elishama, leh Manasseh sung panin Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel;
Benjamin sung panin Gideoni’ tapa Abidan;
Dan sung panin Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer;
Asher’ sung panin Okran’ tapa Pagiel;
Gad sung panin De-uel’ tapa Eliasaf;
Naftali sung panin Enan’ tapa Ahira ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in mihon sung panin a kiteel, amau’ phung sung panin a makaite, Israel behte’ lutangte ahi uh hi.

Topa in Moses a thupiaksa bangin Moses leh Aaron in a min kilosa hih mite khawmin, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in amaute in kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha peuhmah a milipin a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in amau leh amau a kiciamteh mihon buppite khawm uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Sinai gamlakah amaute sim hi.
Israel tacil, Reuben mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha pasal peuhmah, a milipin, a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei khempeuh:
Reuben minam tul sawmli leh tulguk leh zanga pha hi.
Simeon mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a pha pasal peuhmah, a milipin, tua a kisimte a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei khempeuh:
Simeon minam tul sawmnga leh tulkua leh zathum pha hi.
Gad mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in galdo dingin a kuan thei khempeuh:
Gad minam tul sawmli leh tulnga leh zaguk leh sawmnga pha hi.
Judah mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min pha zah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Judah minam tul sawmsagih leh tulli leh zaguk pha hi.
Issakhar mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Issakhar minam tul sawmnga leh tulli leh zali pha hi.
Zebulun mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Zebulun minam tul sawmnga leh tul sagih leh zali pha hi.
Josef mi, Efraim mi a kicite, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Efraim minam tul sawmli leh zanga pha hi.
Manasseh mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Manasseh minam tul sawmthum leh tulnih leh zanih pha hi.
Benjamin mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Benjamin minam tul sawmthum leh tulnga leh zali pha hi.
Dan mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Dan minam tul sawmguk leh tulnih leh za sagih pha hi.
Asher mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min pha zah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Asher minam tul sawmli leh tulkhat leh zanga pha hi.
Naftali mi, a suan a khakte, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah a min phazah tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan, a beh beh-in, galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah:
Naftali minam tul sawmnga leh tulthum leh zali pha hi.
Hih mite, Moses leh Aaron in Israel makai, amau’ beh ciat taangin a ding mi sawm-le-nihte’ huhna tawh a sim uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi vekpi, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah, a beh beh-in, Israel sung pan galdo dingin a kuan thei pasal peuhmah—
a vekpi in tul zaguk leh tulthum leh zanga leh sawmnga pha hi.
Ahih hangin Levi mite ahih leh amau’ nam min pua-in adangte tawh kisim khawm lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Levi minamte na sim kei ding hi, Israel mite lakah amaute na sim khawm kei ding hi;

ahih hangin Levi mite pen teci pan’na biakbuk leh a sung nazat khempeuh, leh tua tawh a kisai na khempeuh a uk dingin seh in; amaute pen biakbuk leh a nazat khempeuh a pua dingte hi a, amaute in a biakbuk semin, a kimkotah phual sat ding uh hi.
Biakbuk a kikhin ding ciangin Levi mite in phel ding uh hi; biakbuk a kilam ding ciangin Levi mite mah in lam ding uh hi. Midang khatpeuh peuh a kiang nai-ah hong pai leh, tua mi kithat ding hi.
Israel mite in a milip-un amau’ giahphual ciat leh a dialkhai gei ciat uhah a pawl pawlin a puanbuk uh lam ding uh hi;
ahih hangin Israel mi honte tungah hehna a om loh nadingin teci pan’na biakbuk kiim-ah Levi mite in phual sat ding uh hi; Levi mite in teci pan’na biakbuk kem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite in hih uh hi; Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute gamta uh hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Israel mite in amau’ dialkhai gei ciatah a beh dialkhaite tawh phual sat ding uh hi; amaute in a pang simah kikhopna buk mai ngatin phual sat ding uh hi.
Nisuahna lam pangah phual a sat dingte in Judah’ giahphual dialkhai a neite hi ding hi, Judah mite makaipa in Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmsagih leh tulli leh zaguk pha hi.
Ama zomah phual a sat dingte in Issakhar minam hi ding hi, Issakhar mite makaipa in Zuar’ tapa Nethanel ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmnga leh tulli leh zali pha hi.
Tua ciangin Zebulun minam hi ding hi. Zebulun mite makaipa in Helon’ tapa Eliab ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmnga leh tul sagih leh zali pha hi.
Judah’ phual a, a pawl pawl-a omte a vekpi in tul za leh tul sawmgiat leh tulguk leh zali pha hi. A kipai khiat ciangin amau masa ding uh hi.
“A leitaw lam pangah a pawl pawlin Reuben’ giahphual dialkhai a neite ahi ding hi, Reuben mite makaipa in Shedeur’ tapa Elizur ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmli leh tulguk leh zanga pha hi.
Ama zomah phual a sat dingte in Simeon minam hi ding hi, Simeon mite a makaipa in Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmnga leh tulkua leh zathum pha hi.
Tua ciangin Gad minam hi ding hi, Gad mite a makaipa in Re-u-el’ tapa Eliasaf ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmli leh tulnga leh zaguk leh sawmnga pha hi.
Reuben giahphual a, a pawl pawl-a omte a vekpi in tul za leh tul sawmnga leh tul khat leh zali leh sawmnga pha hi. Amaute a nihna-ah paikhia ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna buk in, giahphualte laizangah a om Levi mite’ phual tawh kikhin khawm ding hi; a phual sat hun mah bangun amau’ san ciat ciatah a dialkhai uh tawh paikhia ding uh hi.
“A nitumna lam pangah a pawl pawlin Efraim giahphual dialkhai a neite hi ding hi, Efraim mite a makaipa in Ammihud’ tapa Elishama ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmli leh zanga pha hi.
Ama zomah Manasseh minam hi ding hi, Manasseh mite a makaipa in Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmthum leh tulnih leh zanih pha hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mite a makaipa in Gideoni’ tapa Abidan ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmthum leh tulnga leh zali pha hi.
Efraim giahphual-a a pawl pawl-a omte a vekpi in tulza leh tulgiat leh zakhat pha hi. Amaute a thumna ah paikhia ding uh hi.
“A leilu lam pangah a pawl pawlin Dan giahphual dialkhai a neite hi ding hi, Dan mite a makaipa in Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmguk leh tulnih leh za sagih pha hi.
Ama zom-ah phual a sat dingte in Asher minam hi ding hi, Asher mite a makaipa in Okran’ tapa Pagiel ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmli leh tulkhat leh zanga pha hi.
Tua ciangin Naftali minam hi ding hi, Naftali mite a makai-pa in Enan’ tapa Ahira ahi hi,
ama pawl tul sawmnga leh tulthum leh zali pha hi.
Dan’ giahphual a, om mi vekpi in tul za leh tul sawmnga leh tul sagih leh zaguk pha hi. Amaute a dialkhai tawh kizui-in pai nunung ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in Israel mite a beh zui-a kisim ahi hi; a pawl pawl-a giahphual-a om mi vekpi in tul za guk leh tulthum leh sawmnga pha hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite lakah Levi mite kisim khawm lo hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite in hih uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin a beh tawh kizui-in a innkuankuan-in amau dialkhaite gei-ah giahphual sat uh a, tua mah bangin paikhia uh hi.
Hite in Sinai Mual tungah Topa in Moses tawh a thugen hun lai-a Aaron leh Moses’ huna mite ahi hi.
Hihte in Aaron’ tapate’ min ahi hi: A ta upa Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar ahi hi:
hihte in sathau a kinilh siampi, siampi za-ah na sem dingin a kipsak, Aaron’ tapate’ min ahi hi.

Ahih hangin Sinai gamlak Topa mai-ah mei siangtho lo a zat uh ciangin Topa mai-ah Nadab leh Abihu si hi; amaute in ta nei lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Eleazar leh Ithamar in a pa uh Aaron’ nuntak sung teng siampi na sem uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Levi minamte va paipih in la, amaute in siampi Aaron’ na a sep theih nadingin a mai-ah koih in.
Amaute in biakbuk ah a sep uh ciangin amah leh mi honpi’ adingin kikhopna buk mai-ah na sem ding uh hi;
amaute in kikhopna buk sung nazat khempeuh vaan ding uh a, biakbuk ah a sep uh ciangin Israel mite adingin na sem ding uh hi.
Nangmah in Aaron leh a tapate tungah Levi mite na pia ding hi; amaute pen Israel mite lak panin ama tungah a kipiate ahi hi.
Nangmah in Aaron leh a tapate na seh ding a, amaute in a siampi nasep uh don ding uh hi; ahih hangin midang khatpeuh a nai-ah a pai leh, tua mi kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“En in, Israel mite lakah naubu a hong tacil khempeuh tangdingin Israel mite lak panin Levi mite ka la khin hi. Levi mite in keima’ aa hi ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh tacil khempeuh keima’ aa ahi hi; Izipt gam sungah tacil khempeuh ka thah ni-in, Israel sungah tacil khempeuh, mihing tacil leh ganhing tacil khempeuh, keima adingin ka ap hi; amaute in keima’ aa hi ding hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Sinai gamlakah Moses kiangah,
“Levi mite, a behbeh a innkuan kuanin sim in; pasal kha khat a pha panin a tungsiah peuhmah na sim ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses thu a kipiak bangin amah in Topa’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in amaute sim hi.
Levi’ tapate’ min in: Gershon, Kohath, leh Merari ahi hi.
Gershon’ tapate’ min in: Libni leh Shimei ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapate’ min: Amram, Izhar, Hebron leh Uzziel ahi hi.
Merari tapate’ min in: Mahli leh Mushi ahi hi. Hih mite in Levi mite beh lutang ahi hi.
Gershon beh in Libni mite leh Shimei mite ahi hi; hihte in Gershonte beh ahi hi.
Amaute, kha khat pan a tungsiah a pha pasal peuhmah tul sagih leh zanga ahi hi.
Gershonte beh in nitumna lam biakbuk nungah giahphual satin,
tua Gershon mite sung pan a beh ukpi in Lael’ tapa Eliasaf ahi hi.
Gershonte beh in kikhopna buk sungah a et dingte in, a biakbuk, puanbuk a tuamna tawh, kikhopna buk kongkhak puankhai,
buktual-a a kikhaite, biakbuk kiim-a om buktual-a kongkhak puankhai leh biakna tau, leh a khaute leh hihte tawh a kizom na zat khempeuh ahi hi.
Kohathte beh in Amram mite, Izhar mite, Hebron mite, leh Uzziel mite ahi hi; hihte in Kohathte beh ahi hi.
Pasal khempeuh kha khat pan tungsiah, biakinn nasep a sem peuhmah tulgiat leh zaguk ahi hi.
Kohathte beh in biakbuk leitaw lam pangah giahphual satin,
Kohath mite sung pan a beh ukpi in Uzziel’ tapa Elizafan ahi hi.
Amau’ et dingte in thuciamna singkuang, a sabuai, a meivakkhuam, a biak taute, siampite in nasepna-in a zat uh biakinn nazatte, kidalna puan leh hihte tawh a kizom na zat khempeuh ahi hi.
Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar in Levi mi makaite tungah a ukpi hi ding a, biakinn a en mite’ nasepna vaan ding hi.
Merari-te beh in Mahli mite leh Mushi mite ahi hi; hihte in Merari-te beh ahi hi.
Amaute kha khat panin a tungsiah pasal peuhmah tulguk leh zanih ahi hi.
Merari-te beh sung pan a beh ukpi in Abihail’ tapa Zuriel ahi hi; amaute biakbuk leilu lam pangah giahphual sat dingte ahi hi.
Merari-te beh et dinga a kisehte in biakbuk khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, khuam bullente, a nengneng teng leh hihte tawh a kizom na zat khempeuh ahi hi.
Buktual kimkot-a khuampite leh a bullente tawh, khetphimte leh khaute zong ahi hi.

Nisuahna lam pang biakbuk mai, kikhopna buk mai-ah giahphual a sat dingte in, Israel mite adingin bang khatpeuh peuh sep nadingin biakinn sungah thu a nei Moses leh Aaron leh a tapate ahi hi; midang khatpeuh a nai-ah hong paite kithat ding hi.
Moses leh Aaron in Topa’ thupiakna tawh a innkuan kuanun a sim Levi mi pasal kha khat panin a tungsiah peuhmah tul sawmnih leh tulnih pha hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Israel mite sung panin tacil pasal khempeuh sim in la, kha khat panin a tungsiah peuhmah a mi a min la in,

Israel mite lak panin tacil khempeuh tangdingin Levi mite nong lak sak ding a, Israel mite’ ganhing tacil khempeuh tangdingin Levi mite’ ganhing nong laksak ding hi— keimah in Topa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Topa’ thupiak bangin Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh a sim hi.
Kha khat panin a tungsiah tacil pasal a kisim peuhmah tul sawmnih leh tulnih leh zanih leh sawmsagih leh thum ahi hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh leh a ganhingte uh tangdingin Levi mite leh a ganhingte uh la in; Levi mite keima’ aa hi ding hi: keimah in Topa ka hi hi.
Levi mi pasal khempeuh sangin Israel mi tacil khempeuh zanih leh sawmsagih leh thum-in tam zaw ahih manin,
tuate tat nadingin shekel khatah gerah sawmnih a pha biakinn shekel zangin mi khat ciangin shekel nga pai na la ding a,
tua a tamzaw teng a kitatna uh sumte Aaron leh a tapate tungah pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Levi mite banah a val lai mite tung panin kitatkhiatna sum la hi;
amah in biakinn shekel zangin Israel mi tacilte tung panin sum shekel tulkhat leh zathum leh sawmguk leh nga la hi;
tua ciangin, Topa in Moses a thupiak mah bangin Topa’ thu tawh kizui-in kitatkhiatna sumte Aaron leh a tapate tungah Moses in pia hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron kiangah,
“Levi mite lak panin Kohath mite amau’ innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in,
kikhopna buk sungah na sem dingin na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha tapa khempeuh sim in.
Kikhopna buk sungah Kohath mite nasep ding in a siangtho pen nate ahi hi.
Giahphual a kisuan ding ciangin, Aaron leh a tapate tumin kidalna puan khia ding uh a, tua puan tawh teci pan’na singkuang tun ding uh hi;
tua ciangin amaute in savun tawh tuam ding uh a, tua tungah puan a dum tawh khuhin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.

Ompihna Anlum sabuai tungah amaute in puan a dum phah ding uh a, tua tungah a kuangdaite, paknamtui pakante, kuang-ukte, tuibuahna thawl gongbakte koih ding uh hi; a kikoih tawntung anlum zong a tungah om ding hi;
tua ciangin amaute in a ausan puan tawh tuate khuh ding uh a, savun tawh khuh thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
Mei vakna meivak khuam pen, a meivakte, a taitehte, a kuangte, leh sathau piakna nazatte khempeuh tawh puan a dum khat-in tun ding uh hi:
amaute in a nazat khempeuh tawh savun-in tunin a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
Puan a dum khat tawh kham biakna tau khuh ding uh a, savun tawh tua mah tuam thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi;
amaute in biakinn sungah a kizang nazat khempeuh la-in puan a dum khat tawh tunin, savun tawh tuate tun thuah ding uh a, a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
Amaute in a sumngo biakna tau panin a vutte luak khia ding uh a, a tungah puan a dupsan khat phah ding uh hi;

tua lai-ah nasep nadinga a kizang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a vut luahna peek, a tu-ka, a kawbia, leh a kuang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a tungah koih ding uh hi; tua tungah savun tawh tuam ding uh a, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.

Aaron leh a tapate in biakinn leh biakinn nazat khempeuh a tun khit uh giahphual a kisuan ding ciangin, tuate a pua dingin Kohath mite pai ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in a siangtho nate lawng kha lo ding uh hi; lawng leh si ding uh hi. Hihte in Kohath’ mite puak ding kikhopna buk nate ahi hi.
“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar in meivak tui, a namtui paknamtui, a kikoih tawntung an tawh biakna, nilh sathau, leh biakbuk leh a sunga om khempeuh, biakinn leh a nazatte khempeuh uk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses leh Aaron’ kiangah,
“Levi mite lakah Kohath minamte a siat loh nadingin hih in;
a siangtho pen nate nai-ah amaute a pai ciangin si loin a hin’ na dingun hih un: Aaron leh a tapate pai-in a nasep ding uh leh a van puak ding ciat uhah amaute seh ding uh hi,
ahih hangin a siangtho nate tom khano sung bek nangawn a en dingin amaute tum lo ding uh hi, tum leh si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Gershon mite zong, amau’ innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in sim in,
kikhopna buk sungah nasem dingin na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha tapa khempeuh na sim ding hi.
Nasep leh van puak ciangin Gershonte beh nasep ding;
amaute in biakbuk dalna puante, kikhopna buk a tuamna tawh, a tung zang a, om a khuhna tuuvun, kikhopna buk kongkhak-a puankhai,

buktual-a a kikhaite, biakbuk leh biakna tau kimkotah a om buktual kongpi puankhaite, a khaute, leh amau’ nasepna dinga nazat khempeuh pua ding uh hi; amaute in tuate tawh a kizom nasep kisam khempeuh sem ding uh hi.
Gershon beh pasalte nasep ding, a puak ding leh a hih dingte khempeuh uh Aaron leh a tapate’ thupiakna bang hi ding hi; a puak ding khempeuh uh amaute na ap ding hi.
Hih in kikhopna buk sungah, Gershon beh pasalte nasep hi a, amau’ nasep in siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ ukna nuai hi ding hi.
“Merari mite zong amau’ innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in na sim ding hi;
kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha tapa khempeuh na sim ding hi.
Kikhopna buk sungah amau’ nasep dingte khempeuh biakbuk khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, khuam bullente tawh,
a kimkot-a om buktual-a khuampite a bullente tawh, khetphimte, a khaute, a nazatte khempeuh leh a nengnengte ahi hi; amaute’ puak dinga a kiseh nate a minin na lo ding hi.
Hih in siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ khut nuai-ah Merari mite in kikhopna buk sungah a sep ding teng uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Moses leh Aaron leh mi honte’ makaite in Kohath mi tapate a innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in,
kikhopna buk sungah na sem dingin na sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha mi khempeuh a sim uh hi;
a beh tangun tulnih leh za sagih leh sawmnga pha hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiakna bangin Moses leh Aaron in a sim, kikhopna buk sungah na a sem, Kohathte beh in hih zah ahi hi.
Gershon mite a innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in,
kikhopna buk sungah na sem dingin na a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha tapa khempeuh—
a innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in tulnih leh zaguk leh sawmthum pha hi.
Topa’ thupiakna bangin Moses leh Aaron in a sim, kikhopna buk sungah na sem Gershonte beh in hih zah ahi hi.
Merari mite a innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in,
kikhopna buk sungah na sem dingin na a sem thei kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha tapa khempeuh—
a beh tangun tul thum leh zanih ahi hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiakna bangin Moses leh Aaron in a sim, Merari beh in hih zah ahi uh hi.
Moses leh Aaron leh Israel makaite in a sim, Levi mi a kisim peuhmah, a innkuankuan leh a beh beh-in,
kikhopna buk sungah van puak nasep leh nasep a sem thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga a pha,
a kisim tapa khempeuh tulgiat leh zanga leh sawmgiat pha hi.
Moses tung tawnin Topa’ thupiakna bangin a sep ding a puak ding ciat uh kiseh hi; Moses in Topa’ thupiak bangin amaute sim hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Amaute in mi phakte, nin neite leh mi si tawh kisukha a, a ninte khempeuh giahphual pua-ah a omsak nadingun Israel mite thu pia in;
a laizangah keima omna ahi amau’ giahphual a nitsak loh nadingun hih bangin a nin numei leh pasal paikhia sakin giahphual pua-ah na omsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin Israel mite in hih uh a, giahphual pua-ah amaute hawl khia uh hi; Topa in Moses kiangah a gen bang in Israel mite in hih uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in, Topa tungah mite a khialh theihna ahi khialhna khatpeuh peuh, numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin gamta-in a mawh leh,
a gamtatnasa a khialhna pulak ding hi; amah in a tatkhialhna-ah a kicingin din kik ding a, tua tungah sehnga suah sehkhat behlapin, a khialhnapa tungah pia ding hi.

Ahih hangin a mipa in, tua khialhna hanga ditkikna a sang ding tanau a neih kei leh, a khialpa’ adingin kilemna a kibawlsakna ahi kilemna tuutal banah, khialhna hanga tua ditkikna pen siampipa’ adingin Topa tungah tung ding hi.
Amaute in siampipa tungah a paipih uh biakna peuhmah, Israel mite’ na siangthote khempeuh, ama’ aa hi ding hi;
mi khempeuh’ na a siangthote zong ama’ aa hi ding hi; mi khatpeuh in siampipa tungah a piak peuhmah ama’ aa hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in, Mi khatpeuh’ zi vak vai-in a pasal palhngulh a,
pasal khat in tua nu luppihin, tua thu a pasal in a theih kei a, tua nu kininsak napi-in kuamah in phawk loin, a khialh lai takin tua nu kiman lo ahih manin a langah a pang ding teci a om kei leh;
a pasal in upmawhna lungsim nei-in, a kininsak tawm a zi a up mawh leh; tua ahih kei leh zong, a numei kininsak lo napi-in, a pasal in upmawhna lungsim nei-in, a zi a up mawh leh;

tuapa in siampipa kiangah a zi paipihin, tua nu adingin a kisam biakna, mangbuhham seu khat sehsawm suah sehkhat zong paipih ding hi; tuapa in a tungah sathau sung loin, paknamtui zong koih lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua in upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna, mawhna phawkkik nadinga an tawh biakna ahi hi.
“Siampipa in tua nu va paipihin, Topa’ mai-ah koih ding hi;
siampipa in lei beel khat-in tui siangtho la ding a, biakbuk sual tunga om leivui tawm khat la-in tua tui sungah khah ding hi.

Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah tua numei koih ding a, numei’ sam phelin, upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna ahi phawkkikna an tawh biakna tua nu tawi sak ding hi. Siampipa in ama khut sungah tuisia tawi ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amah kiciam sakin, ‘Na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah na om sungin, kuamah in nang hong luppih loin, nitna lamah a kihei lo na hih leh, hih tuisia panin suak ta in.
Ahih hangin na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah om napi-in nangmah vak vai a, nang leh nang kininsakin, na pasal hilo mi dang khat in nang hong luppih leh,
(siampipa in tua numei kiciam sak ding a, tua nu kiangah) Topa in na pheipi teem sakin na pumpi a pawmsak ciangin, na mite lakah hamsia leh kiciamna-a zat dingin Topa in nang hong bawlin,
hih tuisia in na gil sung zui hen la, na pumpi pawm sakin na pheipi teem sak hen,’ ci ding hi. Tua ciangin numei in, ‘Amen, Amen,’ ci ding hi.
“Tua ciangin siampipa in hih hamsiate laibu khat sungah gelhin tuisia sungah sil khia ding hi;
amah in tua numei a tuisia dawnsak ding a, tua nu’ sungah tuisia tumin na sak velval ding hi.
Siampipa in numei’ khut sung panin upmawhna hanga an tawh biakna lakhia ding a, Topa mai-ah tua an tawh biakna veii-in biakna tau-ah paipih ding hi;
siampipa in phawk nadingin an tawh biakna khut dim khat la-in, biakna tau tungah hal ding a, tua khit ciangin a tui pen numei dawn sak ding hi.

Amah in a tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, tua nu amahmah kininsakin a pasal tungah thuman loin gamta ahih leh, tua tuisia in ama sungah tumin na sak velval ding a, a pumpi pawm-in, a pheipi teem ding a, tua numei in a mite lakah hamsiatna-in kizang ding hi.
Ahih hangin amahmah kininsak hi loin a siang ahih leh, tua nu suakta-in ta nei ding hi.
“Zi khat in a pasal’ ukna nuai-ah om napi-in vak vai-in amahmah a kinitsak ciangin,

ahih kei leh pasal khat in upmawhna lungsim nei-in a zi a upmawh ciangin, upmawhna thute ah zat ding ngeina in hih ahi hi; tua ciangin amah in Topa mai-ah numei koih ding a, siampipa in numei tungah hih ngeina khempeuh zang ding hi.
Pasal in mawhna panin suakta ding a, ahih hangin a mawh leh, numei in ama mawhna thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in; numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, Topa adingin amahmah kituam koih nadingin Nazir kiciamna ahi, a tuam mahmah kiciamna a bawl ciangin,

leenggahzu leh kham theih zu panin a pumpi kikem ding hi; leenggahzu pan ahih kei leh kham theih zu pan a kibawl tuithuk dawn lo ding a, leenggah tui khatpeuh peuh dawn loin, leenggah a hing hita leh a keu hita leh ne lo ding hi.
Amah a kituam koih hun sung teng leenggui panin a piang bangmah ne lo ding hi, a tang ahi a, a hawng nangawn ahi zongin ne lo ding hi.
“Tuam om dingin a kiciam hun sung teng ama lu tungah mul kiatna kitah lo ding hi; Topa adingin a tuam om hun a cin’ mateng amah a siangtho hi ding hi; amah in a sam a sau-in khawi ding hi.
“Topa adingin a tuam om hun sung teng mi si luang kiangah pai lo ding hi.
A nu, a pa ahi a, a sanggamnu a sanggampa ahi zongin a sih leh tuate khatpeuh hangin amah kininsak lo ding hi: bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ adingin a tuam omna ama lu tungah om hi.
A tuam om hun sung teng Topa’ adingin a siangtho ahi hi.
“Mi khatpeuh ama gei-ah thakhatin si-in, amah in a ki-ap ama sam a nitsak leh, a kisian’suah ni-in a sam met ding hi; a ni sagih ni-in met ding hi.
A ni giat ni-in amah in siampipa kiang kikhopna buk kongah vakhu nih ahih kei leh kawl vakhu no nih paipih ding a,

siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nadingin khat pia-in, meihal biak nadingin a khat pia ding a, ama adingin kilemna bawlsak ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mi si luang hangin amah khial hi. Amah in tua ni mahin ama lutang ap pha ding a,

a tuam om ding hun sung teng Topa adingin amah tuam omin, mawhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat paipih ding hi; ahih hangin ama tuam omna kininsak khin ahih manin hun pen a mawkna hi ding hi.
“A tuam om hun a cin’ ciangin zuih ding Nazir ngeina in hih ahi hi: kikhopna buk kongah amah kipaipih ding a,

amah in Topa tungah a letsong ahi meihal biak nadingin kum khat a pha sitbang lo tuuno a pa khat, khialhna hanga biak nadingin kum khat a pha a sitbang lo tuuno a nu khat, leh thunuam-a biak nadingin a sitbang lo tuutal khat,
leh silngo sawhloh anlum lawh khat, sathau tawh a kibawl annel mohte, leh silngo sawhloh sathau tawh a kizut mohphengte, leh an tawh a biaknate leh leenggahzu tawh a biaknate uh paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in Topa’ mai-ah tuate paipihin a khialhna hanga biakna leh a meihal biakna pia ding a,
a tuutal pen Topa tungah thunuam-a biakna-in silngo sawhloh anlum lawh tawh pia khawm ding hi; an tawh biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biakna zong siampipa in pia ding hi.
Tua Nazir mipa in kikhopna buk kongah a ki-ap a sam met ding a, a ki-ap ama lutang panin a samte la-in a thunuam-a biak piakna nuai-ah a om mei sungah hal ding hi.

Siampipa in a kihuansa tuutal liang, leh lawh sung panin silngo sawhloh moh khat, leh silngo sawhloh mohpheng khat la-in, a ki-ap hun sunga a sam a met khit ciangin tua Nazir mipa’ khutah tuate koih ding a,

Topa mai-ah veii-a biak nadingin siampipa in tuate veii ding hi; tuate in, a kiveii a sa-iik leh a kipia a phei tawh siampipa’ adingin a siangtho ama tanh ahi hi; tua khit ciangin tua Nazir mipa in leenggahzu dawn thei ding hi.

“Hih in kiciamna a la Nazir mipa adingin ngeina ahi hi. Ama piak zawh zah a piak banah, Topa tungah ama piakna pen Nazir hihna tawh a kiciamna bang hi ding hi; a ma kiciamna mah bangin amah in Nazir hihna tawh tuam om nading ngeina zui-in a gamta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron leh a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in hih bangin Israel mite thupha na pia ding uh hi. Amaute tungah hih bangin na ci ding uh hi,
Topa in note thupha hong pia-in hong kem ta hen:
Topa in note tungah ama maipha hong taangsak hen la, note hong hehpih ta hen:
Topa in note tungah ama maipha hong pia hen la, note nopsakna hong pia ta hen, ci-in thupha pia uh hen.
“Amaute in tua bangin Israel mite tungah keima min lo ding uh a, keimah in amaute thupha ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in biakbuk ding sakin, tua biakbuk leh a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin ap a, biakna tau leh a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin a ap a man ni-in,
Israel makaite, a beh ukpite, minam makaite ahi a kisim mite a ukte in,
buk a nei leeng guk leh bawngtal sawm-le-nih Topa’ mai-ah paipih uh hi; leeng khatah makai nih, mi khatah bawngtal khat ciatin seh-in a biakna uh pia uh hi; amaute in biakbuk mai-ah tuate pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah,
”Kikhopna buk nasepna ah zat dingin amah tung panin tuate sang in la, a nasep ciat uh tawh kizui-in Levi mite pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in leengte leh bawngtalte sangin Levi mite pia hi.
Amau’ nasep tawh kizui-in Gershon mite tungah leeng nih leh bawngtal li pia hi;
siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ ukna nuai-ah na a sem Merari mite tungah amau’ nasepna tawh kizui-in leeng li leh bawngtal giat pia hi.
Ahih hangin Kohath mite tungah bangmah pia lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh liangko ah puak ding a siangtho nate kep ding amaute tavuan kipia hi.
Biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in a ap nadingin makaite in biakna pia uh hi; makaite in a biakna uh biakna tau mai-ah pia uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Biakna tau ap nadingin makai khat in ni khat tek a biakna uh pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A ni masa ni-a biakna a piapa in Judah minam, Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon ahi hi;
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon’ piak ahi hi.
A ni nih ni-in Issakhar mite a makai, Zuar’ tapa Nethanel in biakna pia hi;

a biak nadingin amah in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Zuar’ tapa Nethanel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni thum ni-in Zebulun mite a makai, Helon’ tapa Eliab ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Helon’ tapa Eliab piak ahi hi.
A ni li ni-in Reuben mite a makai, Shedeur’ tapa Elizur ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biakna dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Shedeur’ tapa Elizur’ piak ahi hi.
A ni nga ni-in Simeon mite a makai, Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtal no khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biak piakna dingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kumkhat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni guk ni-in Gad mite a makai, De-uel’ tapa Eliasaf ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh, sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biakna dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biakna dingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga,leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in De-uel’ tapa Eliasaf piak ahi hi.
A ni sagih ni-in Efraim mite a makai, Ammihud’ tapa Elishama ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtal no khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Ammihud’ tapa Elishama’ piak ahi hi.
A ni giat ni-in Manasseh mite a makai, Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel ahi hi;
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biakna dingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel’ piak ahi hi.
A ni kua ni-in Benjamin mite a makai, Gideoni’ tapa Abidan ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biakna dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Gideoni’ tapa Abidan’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm ni-in Dan mite a makai, Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer ahi hi;
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biakna dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biakna dingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer’ piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm-le-khat ni-in Asher mite a makai, Okran’ tapa Pagiel ahi hi;
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh,
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal pa khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biak piak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Okran’ tapa Pagiel piak ahi hi.
A ni sawm-le-nih ni-in Naftali mite a makai, Enan’ tapa Ahira ahi hi:
ama piakte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za leh sawmthum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawmsagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biakna dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak;
shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
leh thunuam-a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga, leh kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hih in Enan’ tapa Ahira’ piak ahi hi.
Hih in biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in Israel makaite apna biakna ahi hi: ngun kuangdai sawm-le-nih, ngun kuang sawm-le-nih, kham pakan sawm-le-nih,
ngun kuangdai khat ciangin shekel za leh sawmthum gikin ngun kuang khat ciangin shekel sawmsagih gik a, ngun kuangte khempeuh in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel tulnih leh zali gik hi,
paknamtui tawh a kidim kham pakan sawm-le-nihte in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in khat ciangin shekel sawm gik a, kham khempeuh in shekel za leh sawmnih gik hi;
meihal biak nadingin ganhing khempeuh in bawngtal sawm-le-nih, tuutal sawm-le-nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm-le-nih, an-a a biaknate tawh; khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa sawm-le-nih,

leh thunuam-a biak piakna-in ganhing khempeuh in bawngtal sawmnih leh li, tuutal sawmguk, keel a pa sawmguk kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawmguk ahi hi. Hih in biakinn tau sathau a kinuh khit ciangin apna biakna ahi hi.

Topa tawh kiho dingin kikhopna buk sungah Moses a pai ciangin, kherub nihte’ kikal, teci pan’na singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom tung san teng panin amah a hopih awging khat a za hi; tua awging in amah hopih hi.
Tu-in Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Aaron tungah hih bangin gen in. Meivakte na koih ciangin, meivak sagihte in meivakkhuam mai teng a taan dingin koih-in, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Aaron in tua mah bangin hih hi; Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin, meivakkhuam mai teng a taan’ dingin meivakte a koih hi.
Hih in meivakkhuam a kibawlna zia hi a, kham a kiseek ahi hi; a bul akipan a pakte dongin a kiseek ahi hi; Topa in Moses tungah a lahsa lim tawh kizui-in amah in meivakkhuam bawl hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite panin Levi mite la khia in la, amaute siangsak in.

Amaute sian’sak nadingin hih bangin na hih ding hi: sian’suahna tui amaute tungah theh in la, a pumpi khempeuh mulkiatna tawh amau mah kiat sak in la, a puante uh sawpin amau mah na kisiang tawm sak ding hi.
Tua ciangin bawngtalno khat leh sathau leh annel a kibawl an tawh biakna amaute na la sak ding a, nangmah in khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno adang khat na la ding hi.
Kikhopna buk mai-ah Levi mite paipihin, Israel mihon buppi na khawm ding hi.
Topa mai-ah Levi mite na paipih ciangin, Israel mite in Levi mite tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a,
amaute in Topa’ na a sep theih nadingun Aaron in Israel mite sung panin Levi mite Topa mai-ah veii-a biakna-in a pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite in bawngtalte lu tungah a khut uh nga ding uh hi; Levi mite’ ading kilemna bawlsakna dingin khialhna hanga biakna-in khat, meihal biakna-in a khat, Topa tungah na pia ding hi.
Aaron leh a tapate’ mai-ah Levi mite na koih ding a, Topa tungah amaute veii-a biakna-in na pia ding hi.
“Tua ciangin Israel mite lak panin Levi mite na khenkhia ding a Levi mite in keima’ aa hi ding hi.
Amaute siangsakin veii-a biakna-in na piak khit ciangin kikhopna bukah nasem dingin Levi mite pai ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite’ lak panin kei tungah amaute hong kipia khin hi; naubu a hong, Israel mite tacil khempeuh tangdingin keima adingin amaute ka la khin hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite lakah tacil khempeuh, mihing hita leh ganhing hita leh keima’ aa ahi hi; Izipt gam sungah tacil khempeuh ka thah ni-in keima adingin amaute ka tuam koih a,
Israel mite lak panin tacil khempeuh tangdingin Levi mite ka la khin hi.

Kikhopna bukah Israel mite adingin na a sem ding leh, biakinn nai-ah Israel mite a paikhak ciangin Israel mite lakah gimna a tun’ loh nadingin Israel mite’ adingin kilemna a bawl dingin Israel mite’ lak panin Aaron leh a tapate tungah letsong-in Levi mite ka pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua bangin Moses leh Aaron leh Israel mi honpite khempeuh in Levi mite tungah hih uh hi; Topa in Levi mite tawh kisai-in Moses tungah a thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in Israel mite in amaute tungah hih uh hi.

Levi mite in khialhna panin amaute kisiangthosak tawm uh a, a puante uh sawp uh hi; Aaron in veii-a biakna-in Topa’ mai-ah amaute pia a, amaute sian’sak nadingin Aaron in amau’ ading kilemna bawlsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Aaron leh a tapate omna kikhopna buk sungah nasem dingin Levi mite pai uh hi; Topa in Levi mite tawh kisai-in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in Levi mite tungah a hih uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hih in Levi mite tawh a kisai thu ahi hi; kum sawmnih leh kumnga pan a tungsiah a phate in kikhopna buk nasepna sungah na a sem dingin pai ding uh hi;
kum sawmnga a phak uh cianga kipan nasepna panin amau kihemkhia-in na sem nawn lo ding uh hi;
ahih hangin kikhopna buk sungah a sanggamte huh ding uh a, amaute in a na taktak sem lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin Levi mite’ nasep ding na seh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute Izipt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kumnihna a kha masa sungin Sinai gamlakah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“A kiseh hunin Paisan pawi, Israel mite kham sak in.
A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawm leh nili ni nitakin na kham ding uh hi; a thukhamte leh a ngeina kipte bangin na kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paisan pawi a kham nadingun Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi.
Amaute in a kha masa, a ni sawm leh nili nitakin Sinai gamlakah Paisan pawi a kham uh hi; Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi.
Misi luang a lawn’na uh hangin a nin mi pawlkhat om uh a, tua ni-in amaute in Paisan pawi kham thei lo uh hi; tua ni-in amaute Moses leh Aaron mai-ah pai uh hi;
tua mite in ama kiangah, “Misi luang lawn’na hangin ka nin uh hi; bang hangin a kiseh hunin Israel mite lakah Topa biakna hong kipiasak lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Moses in amaute kiangah, “Note’ thu tawh kisai Topa’ thupiak ka zak dong na ngak dih un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in. Note lakah mi khatpeuh ahi a, na suan na khakte uh khatpeuh ahi zongin si luang lawn’na hangin a nin ahi a, khualzinin gamlapi-ah a om ahi zongin, Topa adingin Paisan pawi kham veve ding hi.
A kha nihna a ni sawm leh nili ni nitakin amaute in kham ding uh hi; amaute in silngo sawhloh anlum leh a kha meh tawh ne ding uh hi.
Amaute in a zingsang dong bangmah siit lo ding uh a, a guh khat zong su-tan lo ding uh hi; Paisan pawi thukhamte tawh kizui-in amaute in a kham ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin a siang mi khat khualzin lo napi-in Paisan pawi a kham kei leh, amah in a kiseh hunin Topa biakna pia lo ahih manin a mite lak panin tua mipa kikhenkhia ding hi; tua mi in ama khialhna mah thuak ding hi.

Note lakah khualmi khat hong peemin, Topa ading Paisan pawi a kham leh Paisan pawi thukhamte leh a ngeina kipte bangin hih ding hi; peemta leh tual sung mite’ adingin thukham khat na nei khawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Biakbuk a kidin’sak ni-in meii in teci pan’na puanbuk ahi, biakbuk tuam hi; nitak-a kipan a zingsang dong meikuang tawh kibangin biakbuk tung san-ah om hi.
Tua bangin om den hi; sun-in meii in tuam a, zan-in mei tawh kibang khat in tuam hi.
Puanbuk tung san panin meii a kilak toh khit ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh hi; meii a kiphuhna munah Israel mite in giahphual a sat uh hi.
Topa in thu a piak ciangin Israel mite a ding khia uh a, Topa in thu a piak ciangin amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi; biakbuk tung sanah meii a khawl lai teng, amaute zong giahphual ah om uh hi.
Biakbuk tungah ni tampi tak meii a om khin ta zongin Israel mite in Topa’ thupiakna zui-in ding khia lo uh hi.
Biakbuk tungah ni tawmno sung meii om thei zel hi; tua bang ciangin Topa’ thupiak bangin giahphual ah amaute om uh hi; tua ciangin Topa’ thupiakna mah tawh amaute a ding khia uh hi.

Khat veivei nitak-a kipan zingsang dong tua meii om hi; zingsangin meii a kilak toh ciangin amaute a ding khia uh hi; tua hi kei leh, sun khat leh zan khat a om lai leh zong, meii a kilak toh hun hunin amaute ding khia uh hi.

Ni nih ahi a, kha khat ahi a, a hun sau zaw ahi zongin biakbuk tung san-ah meii a khawl lai teng Israel mite giahphual ah om-in ding khia lo ding uh hi; ahih hangin a kilak toh ciangin amaute ding khia uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in giahphual sat uh a, Topa’ thupiakna mah tawh amaute ding khia uh hi; Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in Topa’ thu a mang uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Ngun peengkul nih bawl in; tuate na bawl ciangin na seek ding hi; mi honte khop nading leh giahphual nusiat nadingin na zang ding hi.
A nih-in a kitum ciangin kikhopna buk kong nangma kiangah mihon khempeuh hong kikhawm ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in khat bek a tum leh Israel minamte’ lutangte ahi makaite nangma kiangah hong kikhawm ding uh hi.
Theihsakna na tum ciangin nisuahna lam panga giahphualate ding khia ding uh hi.
Theihsakna a nih veina na tum ciangin leitaw lam panga giahphual a, omte ding khia ding hi. Amaute a din’ khiat ding peuhpeuh ciangun theihsakna kitum ding hi.
Mihonte a kikaih khop ding ciangin na tum ding a, ahih hangin theihsakna na gingsak kei ding hi.
Aaron’ tapa siampite in peengkulte tum ding uh hi. Peengkul zatna in na khang tawntungun note adingin a kip den ngeina khat hi ding hi.

Na gam sung uhah no hong nengniam na galte uh tawh na kido ding uh ciangin, Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah note hong kiphawk nadingin peengkulte tawh pataukohna aw na gingsak ding uh a, na langte panun note hong kihon ding hi.

Na lungdam hun uh, a kiseh na pawi hunte uh, leh kha kipat hunte-in, note in na meihal baiknate uh leh thunuam-a na biak piaknate uhah zong peengkulte na tum ding uh hi; tuate in na Pasian uh mai-ah phawkna-in kimang ding hi; keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
A kum nihna, a kha nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih ni-in teci pan’na biakbuk tung san panin meii kilakhia to a,
Sinai gamlak panin Israel mite phual khat pan phual khatah ding khia uh hi; Paran gamlakah meii khawl hi.
Moses tung tawnin Topa’ thupiakna tawh khualzin cilna kipan uh hi.
Judah mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawl pawlin ding khia masa uh hi; tua mihonte Amminadab’ tapa Nahshon in uk hi.
Issakhar minam honte Zuar’ tapa Nethanel in uk hi.
Zebulun minam honte Helon’ tapa Eliab in uk hi.
Biakbuk a kiphel khit ciangin, biakbuk a pua Gershon mite leh Merari mite ding khia uh hi.
Reuben’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawl pawlin ding khia uh hi; tua mihonte Shedeur’ tapa Elizur in uk hi.
Simeon minam honpite Zurishaddai’ tapa Shelumiel in uk hi.
Gad minam honpite De-uel’ tapa Eliasaf in uk hi.
Tua ciangin a siangtho nate pua-in Kohath mite ding khia uh a, amaute a tun’ ma-in biakbuk na kidingsak khin hi.
Efraim mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawl pawlin ding khia uh hi; tua mihonte Ammihud’ tapa Elishama in uk hi.
Manasseh minam honte Pedahzur’ tapa Gamaliel in uk hi.
Benjamin minam honte Gideoni’ tapa Abidan in uk hi.
Tua ciangin giahphualte khempeuh’ nung dalin Dan mite’ giahphual dialkhai a neite a pawl pawlin ding khia uh hi; tua mi honte Ammishaddai’ tapa Ahiezer in uk hi.
Asher minam honte Okran’ tapa Pagiel in uk hi.
Naftali minam honte Enan’ tapa Ahira in uk hi.
Hih in Israel mite a din’ khiat uh ciangin amau’ mihonte tawh kizui-in a paina zia uh ahi hi.

Moses in ama zi sanggampa ahi, Midian mi Re-u-el’ tapa Hobab kiangah, “Topa in, ‘Note tungah kong pia ding hi,’ a cihna mun zuanin a ding khia ding ka hi uh hi; ko hong zui in, nang kong limbawl ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Israelte hong limbawl ding hong ciam hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong zui kei ding hi; ka leitang leh ka behte kiangah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kote hong nusia kei in, kong thuum hi, nangmah in gamlakah giahphual sat nading zia thei na hih manin, kote adingin lam hilh nong hi ding hi.
Kote hong zui lecin, Topa in kote hong limbawl ding bangbangin nang zong kong limbawl ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ mual panin ni thum lam a pai uh hi; a tawlngak nading mun uh a zon’sak dingin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang in amau mai ni thum lam na pai khol hi.
Giahphual panin a din’ khiat peuhmah uh ciangin sun-in amaute tungah Topa’ meii a om hi.
Singkuang a din’ khiat peuhmah ciangin Moses in, “Topa aw, ding in la, na galte kithehthang sak in; nang hong mudahte na mai-ah tai sak in,” a ci hi.
A khawl ciangin, “Topa aw, Israel tul sawm tampite kiangah hong ciah kik in,” a ci hi.
Mi honte in amau’ tuahsiatna thu hangin Topa’ zakin phun uh hi; Topa in tua thu a zak ciangin ama hehna so a, amaute lakah Topa’ mei kuangin, giahphual nawl kimkhat kangtum hi.
Tua ciangin Moses’ zak dingin mite kiko uh hi; Moses in Topa tungah thu ngen a, mei a mit hi.
Tua ahih manin tua mun pen Taberah kici hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute lakah Topa’ mei kuang hi.
Tu-in amaute’ lakah a om gamdang mite in anlim a lunggulh mahmah uh hi; Israel mite zong kap kik uh a, “Sa nek ding nei hi leeng maw!
Izipt ah man pia loin i nek ngasate, tangmaite, dawnpawlte, lo-uih neute, lo-uih sante, leh lo-uih kangte i phawk hi;
ahih hangin tu-in i tha bei ta a, hih manna sim loh bangmah om peuhmah lo hi,” ci uh hi.
Manna pen nannan tang tawh kibang a, a meel in bedolak singnai tawh kibang hi.
Mite pai kawikawi-in khawm uh a, an gawina tawh gawi-in, tua ahih kei leh sum sungah su-in, beel-in huan uh a, moh-in bawl uh hi; a limna pen sathau tawh a kibawl moh ki-em tawh kibang hi.
Zan-in giahphual tungah daitui a kiat ciangin manna tawh kia khawm hi.
Mite a innkuankuan-un, a milip-in a puanbuk kongah a kahna uh Moses in za hi; Topa’ hehna sa mahmahin so a, Moses lungkim lo hi.
Moses in Topa kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasempa hong hici bawlsiat na hi hiam? Bang hangin na maipha hong musak loin, hih mi khempeuhte’ vangik kei tungah hong suan na hi hiam?

Keimah in hih mite khempeuh paii ka hi hiam? Nangmah in kei kiangah, ‘Naucingnu in nawi ne naungek a puak bangin, nangmah in amau’ pate piak dingin ka ciam leitangah amaute ang puakin paipih in,’ nong cih theih nadingin kei sunga piang ahi uh hiam?
Hih mite khempeuh piak ding koi lai-ah sa ngah ding ka hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mai-ah amaute kap-in, ‘Ka nek ding uh sa hong pia in,’ hong ci uh hi.
Kei guak in hih mite khempeuh ka si zo kei hi, kei adingin vangik lua hi.
Hih bangin kei hong bawl ding na hih leh, ka gentheihna ka kimuh loh nadingin nong hehpih zawh leh, thakhatin hong that in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Mite’ upa leh ulian hi ci-a na theih, Israel upate’ sung panin mi sawmsagih hong khopsak in; kikhopna bukah amaute paipih in la, tua lai-ah nang tawh ding khawmsak in.

Keimah hong pai sukin tua munah nang tawh i kiho ding hi; keimah in nang sunga om lungsim pawl khat la-in amaute sungah ka guang ding hi; nang guak in na puak loh nadingin amaute in mite’ vangik hong puakpih ding uh hi.

Mite tungah, ‘Zing cianga dingin note ki-ap pha un, sa na ne ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ zakin na kap uh a, “Sa nek ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt gamah nuam i sa hi,” na ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin note tungah Topa in sa hong pia ding a, note in na ne ding uh hi.
Note in ni khat sung, ahih kei leh ni nih sung, ahih kei leh ni nga sung, ahih kei leh ni sawm sung, ahih kei leh ni sawmnih sung bek ne loin,

na ikkhiat dong uh leh na kih dong matengun kha khat tawntung na ne ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note lakah a om Topa nialin a mai-ah na kap uh a, “Bang hangin Izipt panin paikhia i hi hiam?” na ci uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Kei tawh a kisim khawm mi tul zaguk om hi; nangmah in, ‘Kha khat tawntung a nek dingun amaute sa pia ning!” na ci hi.
Amaute’ kham zah dingin tuu honte leh bawng honte amau’ adingin kigo ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh tuipi ngasate khempeuh amau’ kham zah ding kiman ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Topa’ hih theih ding zah kiciangtan sa na hi hiam? Ka thugen a manin hong tun’ leh hong tun’ loh tu-in na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses paikhia-in mite tungah Topa’ thugente gen sawn hi; amah in mite a makai mi sawmsagih kaikhawmin, puanbuk kimkotah amaute om sak hi.

Tua ciangin meii sungah Topa hong pai sukin amah hopih a, ama sunga om lungsim pawl khat la-in upa sawmsagihte sungah a guang hi; amaute sungah tua lungsim a om ciangin, amaute in thu a genkhol uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in tua khit zawh hih nawn lo uh hi.

Giahphual ah mi nih om uh a, khat Eldad kici-in, a khat Medad kici a, amaute sungah tua lungsim a lut hi; amaute in a kiciamtehte lakah a kihelte hi uh a, ahih hangin puanbukah pai loin, giahphual ah thu a genkhol uh hi.
Tangval khat va tai-in Moses kiangah, “Eldad leh Medad-te in giahphual ah thu a genkhol uh hi,” va ci hi.
Ama teel mite lakah khat ahi, Moses’ nasem, Nun’ tapa Joshua in, “Ka topa Moses aw, amaute kham in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in ama kiangah, “Keima tangin hong hazatsak na hi uh hiam? Topa’ mi khempeuh kamsang hi hen la, Topa in amau sungah ama lungsim guan leh ka cih lai tak hi!” a ci hi.
Moses leh Israel upate giahphual ah a ciahkik uh hi.

Topa kiang pan huih nungin, tuipi panin vamimte hong puak a, giahphual kiang hih lam pang ni khat paina ciang, hua lam pang ni khat paina ciang mah’ giahphual kimkotah kia sak hi, lei maitang tungah tong nih bang sah hi.

Tua sun tawntung leh a zan tawntung leh a zing ciang tawntung mite ding-in vamimte khawm uh hi; tawm a khawm pen mipa in beem sawm dim khawm hi; amaute in amau adingin giahphual kimkotah tuate pho uh hi.
Sa a kigaih ma, amau ha kawmah sa baang laipi mahin, mite tungah Topa’ hehna so-in, Topa in gimna lianpi khat tawh mite vatgawp hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Kibrothhattavah kici hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sa a lunggulh mite tua lai munah a vui uh hi.
Kibrothhattavah panin Hazeroth munah mite zin uh hi; Hazeroth ah amaute taam uh hi.
Moses in Kush numei khat ten’pih ahih manin, ama ten’pih Kush numei’ hangin Miriam leh Aaron in amah gensia uh hi;
amaute in, “Topa in Moses’ tung bek tawnin thu gen takpi ahi hiam? Eite’ tung tawnin zong hong gen lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in tua thu za hi.
Pasalpa Moses lungnem mahmah a, leitunga om mi khempeuh sangin lungnem zaw hi.
Topa in thakhat thu-in Moses leh Aaron leh Miriam kiangah, “Kikhopna bukah no mihing thumte hong pai un,” a ci hi. Amau thumte pai uh hi.
Meii khuam sungah Topa hong kum sukin, kikhopna buk kongah ding a, Aaron leh Miriam sam hi; amaute gel mai lam nehin hong pai uh hi.
Amah in, “Ka thu za un: Note lakah kamsang a om leh Topa keimah in ama tungah mangmuhna tawh ka kilak a, amah tawh mang sungah ka kiho hi.
Ka nasem Moses tawh tua bang hi lo hi; ka inn sung thu khempeuh amah ki-ap hi.

Amah tawh kam leh kam kiho-in a kitel lo kampaute tawh hi loin, a kitel takin thu ka gen uh hi; amah in Topa’ mel mu hi. Tua bang ahih ciangin bang hangin ka nasem Moses gensiat ding lau lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa’ hehna amau tungah so a, amah paikhia hi;
puanbuk tung san panin meiipi a kilakkhiat ciangin Miriam phak a, vuk bangin pak hi. Miriam lamah Aaron kihei a, tua numei na phak hi.
Aaron in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa aw, kote hai gamtatin ka khialhna hangun daan hong pia kei in,
a nu’ sung panin a suahkhiat ciangin a pum phel lang khat a bei mi si bangin Miriam hi sak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Topa tungah, “Amah dam sak in, Pasian aw, kong thuum hi,” ci-in kiko hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “Tua numei’ maitangah a pa in cil phih leh tua numei ni sagih sung maizum ding hi lo ahi hiam? Giahphual pua lamah ni sagih sung kikhumcip sak in la, tua khit ciangin amah hong kipaipih kik thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin giahphual pua lamah ni sagih sung Miriam kikhumcip hi; Miriam a kipaipih kik mateng khualzin a zom dingin mite ding khia lo uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Hazeroth panin mite ding khia uh a, Paran gamlakah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah ka piak Kanaan leitang a vaan dingin mi sawl in; amaute lakah makai ahi, nam khat sung panin mi khat ciat sawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Topa’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in Paran gamlak panin Israel mite lutang ahi mi khempeuh a sawl hi.
Hihte in amaute’ min ahi hi: Reuben minam panin Zakkur’ tapa Shamua;
Simeon minam panin Hori’ tapa Shafat;
Judah minam panin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb;
Issakhar minam panin Josef’ tapa Igal;
Efraim minam panin Nun’ tapa Hoshea;
Benjamin minam panin Rafu’ tapa Palti;
Zebulun minam panin Sedi’ tapa Gaddel;
Josef minam (Manasseh minam) panin Susi’ tapa Gaddi;
Dan minam panin Gemalli’ tapa Ammiel;
Asher minam panin Mikhael’ tapa Sethur;
Naftali minam panin Vofsi’ tapa Nahbi;
Gad minam panin Makhi’ tapa Ge-uel ahi hi.
Hihte in gam vaan dinga Moses in a sawl mite’ min ahi hi. Moses in Nun’ tapa Hoshea pen Joshua ci hi.
Moses in Kanaan gam vaan dingin amaute sawl a, amaute kiangah, “Negeb gam gal khatah pai to-in, mual tung gamah paito un la,
leitang bang ci hiam, tua leitangah a teeng mite thahat hiam, thanem hiam, amaute tawm hiam, tam hiam,
amau’ ten’na gam in nuntak olna gam hiam haksatna gam hiam, amaute’ ten’na khuapite in giahphual hiam, mun muanhuai hiam,

a leitang a lei hoih hiam lei sia hiam, sing om hiam om lo hiam va thei un. Na siam tawp-un va hih un la, tua leitanga gah pawl khat hong ciahpih un,” a ci hi. Tua hun in leenggah a palte a min hun ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute pai to-in Zin gamlak panin Hamath khua lutna gei, Rehob mun dong gam vaan uh hi.

Amaute Negeb lamah paito uh a, Hebron tung uh hi; Anak’ suan leh khakte ahi Ahiman mite, Sheshai mite leh Talmai mite, tua lai-ah na om uh hi. (Hebron pen Izipt gamah Zoan a kisat ma kum sagih lai-in kisat hi).
Amaute Eshkol Kuam tung uh a, tua lai panin leenggah bawk khat bek a hiang tawh lo-in, mi nih in zawl khat-in zawng uh hi; amaute in mang kawlsing leh thei zong tawm khat pua uh hi.
Tua lai panin Israel mite in leenggah bawk a lawhna hangin tua mun pen Eshkol Kuam kici hi.
Ni sawmli a cin’ ciangin gam vaanna panin amaute hong ciahkik uh hi.
Paran gamlak Kadesh muna Moses leh Aaron leh Israel mi honte khempeuh kiangah amaute hong tung uh hi; amaute leh mihon khempeuh tungah thu puak kik uh a, tua leitanga gahte amaute lak uh hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Kote nong sawlna leitangah ka va tung uh hi; tua lai-ah bawngnawi leh khuaizu luang a, hih in tua gama gah ahi hi.
Ahi zongin tua gama teeng mite thahat uh a, a khuapite uh kulh tawh ki-uumin lian mahmah hi; tua banah Anak’ suan leh khakte tua lai-ah ka mu uh hi;
Amalek mite Negeb gamah teeng uh hi; Hih mite, Jebus mite, leh Amor mite mual tung gamah teeng uh hi; Kanaan mite tuipi gei leh Jordan dungah teeng uh hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin Kaleb in Moses mai-ah mite gamdai sakin, “Thakhatin pai to-in va luah ni; bang hang hiam cih leh eite pen a zo thei mahmah ding i hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a paito mite in, “Mite do dingin i pai ngam kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh eite sangin amaute hatzaw uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in amau’ vaansa gam thu Israel mite tungah a sia lamin hong puak uh a, “Kote in a vaan dingin ka va paina uh gam in a tunga teeng mite a valhtum thei ding gam ahi hi; tua lai-a ka muh uh mite khempeuh mi tha liante ahi hi.
Tua lai-ah Nefilim mite (Nefilim pana hong piang Anak mite) ka mu uh hi; kote pen kauphe bang lelin ka kingaihsun uh a, amau’ muhna ah zong tua bangmah ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihon khempeuhte nakpi takin kiko uh hi; mite tua zan sung kap uh hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in Moses leh Aaron phunsan uh hi; mihon buppi in amaute tungah, “Izipt gamah a si khin hi zaw hoh le-ung! Tua ahih kei leh zong hih gamlakah a si khin hi zaw hoh le-ung!

Namsau tawh a si dingin bang hangin Topa in hih gamah kote hong paipih ahi hiam? Ka zite leh ka tate uh galte’ mat suak ding uh hi; Izipt ah ciahkik ding ko adingin hoihzaw ding hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute khat leh khat kiangah, “Makai khat teelin Izipt ah ciahkik ni,” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihon kikhawmte khempeuh’ mai-ah Moses leh Aaron boksuk uh hi.
Gam vaante lakah a kihel Nun’ tapa Joshua leh Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb-te in a puan uh balkeekin,
Israel mi honpite khempeuh tungah, “A vaan dingin kote ka va painasa uh leitang in leitang hoih mahmah ahi hi.
Eite tungah Topa a lungkim leh, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na hih leitangah eite hong paipihin eite tungah tua leitang hong pia ding hi.
Topa lehdo kei hamtang un; amaute pen zialmang pak ding i hih manin tua gam mite kihta kei un; amau’ kiang panin amau’ kidalna kilakhia a, eite tawh Topa hong om hi; amaute kihta kei un,” ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin mi honte khempeuh in amaute suang tawh deng un, ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh tung kikhopna buk-ah Topa’ minthan’na kilang hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah, “Hih mite in bang tanvei kei hong simmawh ding ahi hiam? Amaute lakah ka hihsa limte khempeuh om napi-in, amaute in bang tanvei kei hong um lo ding ahi hiam?
Pul natna tawh amaute vat gawpin ka lawnkhia kik ding a, amaute sangin a lianzaw a thahat zaw minamin nang kong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Topa kiangah, “Tua bang hi leh Izipt mite in hih thu za ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ lak panin na thahatna tawh hih mite na paikhiatpih hi.

Amaute in hih gama teeng mite tungah gen ding uh hi. Topa aw, hih mite laizangah nang na omna thu hih mite in za khin zo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, maitang kituahin nang hong kimu a, amaute tungah nangma meii a ding hi. Nangmah in amaute mai-ah sun-in meii khuam sungah, zan-in mei khuam sungah na pai hi.
Tu-in hih mite mihing khat thah bangin that lecin, nangma minthan’na a zasa minamte in,
‘Amaute tungah piak dinga a kiciam leitangah Topa in hih mite paipih zo lo ahih manin, amah in gamlakah amaute that hi,’ ci ding uh hi.

Tu-in, nang tungah hong thuum ing, nangmah in thuciamin, ‘Topa heh hak a, a itna kip lianin, mawhna leh thu palsatna maisak a, ahih hangin a mawhte siangsak ngei loin, pate’ mawhna tate tungah, khang thum khang lina dongin thuk hi,’ na cih mah bangin Topa’ vangliatna liansak in.
A lian nangma itna kip tawh a kizui leh Izipt panin tu hun dong hih mite na maisakna tawh kizui-in hih mite’ mawhna maisak in, kong thuum hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Nangma gen bangin ka maisak hi;
ahih hangin a tak takin, ka nun’tak lai teng, Topa’ minthan’na tawh leitung kidim ding ahih mah bangin,
Izipt leh gamlakah ka hihsa ka minthan’na leh ka limte mu khin napi-in sawm vei kei hong ze-etin keima aw a ngai lo mite,
amau’ pate tungah piak dinga ka kiciam leitang a mu kuamah om lo ding uh hi; kei hong simmawh mi kuamah in tua leitang mu lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin ka nasem Kaleb ahih leh, amah in lungsim tuam nei-in lim takin kei hong zui ahih manin, amah in a zuat leitangah ka tun’ pih ding a, ama suan leh khakte in tua leitang luah ding uh hi.
