En un, Israel mite tungah Topa’ heh luatna a khangsak to lai dingin, khialhna’ tate, na pu na pate uh’ tangin hong khang na hi uh hiam!
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah zuihna panin note na pial uh leh amah in gam lakah amaute nusia kik ding hi; note pen hih mi khempeuh a susia na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute ama kiang nai-ah hong pai-in, “Hih lai-ah ka tuute uh adingin tuu-khawkte bawlin, ka zi ka tate uh adingin khua ka sat ding uh a,

ahih hangin kote in hiam tawi-in amau’ munah Israel mite ka tun’pih mateng uh amau mai-ah a pai dingin ka kiging ding uh hi; tua kikal sungin hih gam sungah a teeng mite kiang pan kihut nadingin ka zi ka tate uh khuapi muanhuai sungah a na om ding uh kisam hi.
Israel mite in amau’ luah ding ciat a luah khit matengun ka inn uhah ka ciah kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Jordan gal khat leh tua ban siah-ah amaute tawh ka luah khawm kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jordan hih lam gal nisuahna lam ko’ luah hong suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute kiangah, “Note, tu-a bangin gamta-in, galdo dingin Topa mai-ah a pai dingin hiam la-in,
Topa in a mai panin a galte a hawlkhiat matengin hiam a tawi note khempeuh in ama mai-ah Jordan kantanin,
Topa mai-ah leitang a kilak matengin na om uh leh; note ciahkikin Topa leh Israel nasep ding uh panin na peng ding uh hi; hih leitang in Topa mai-ah note neihsa hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin note tua bangin na gamtat kei uh leh, en un, Topa’ tungah a khial khin na hi uh hi; na khialhna un note hong sulzuih ding thei tel ta un.
Na zi na tate uh adingin khuapite sat un la, na tuute uh adingin tuu-khawkte bawl un; na ciamsa bangun gamta un,” a ci hi.
Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa’ thupiak bangin na nasemte ka gamta ding uh hi.
Ka tate uh, ka zite uh, ka tuuhonte uh leh ka ganhing khempeuhte uh Gilead gam khuapite ah na om ding uh hi;
ka topa in na thupiak bangin na nasemte, galdo ding a, hiam tawi khempeuh, galdo dingin Topa mai-ah galkah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute’ thu tawh kisai-in siampi Eleazar tung leh Nun’ tapa Joshua tung leh Israel minam beh lutang khempeuh tungah thu pia hi.

Moses in amaute tungah, “Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte ahi, Topa mai-ah galdo dingin hiam a tawi khempeuh in note tawh Jordan kantanin note mai-ah tua gam a kizawh leh, Gilead gam a neih dingun amaute tungah na pia ding uh hi;
ahih hangin hiam tawi-in note tawh hong galkah kei uh leh zong, amaute in Kanaan gam sungah note lakah ngah a nei veve ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte in dawng uh a, “Na nasemte tungah Topa in a gensa bangin kote ka gamta ding uh hi.
Hiam tawi-in Topa mai-ah Kanaan gam sungah ka pai ding uh a, kote’ luah ahi ka neihsa uh Jordan gal khatah kote’ aa mahin na kip ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Moses in Gad minamte leh Reuben minamte leh Josef tapa Manasseh minam a langte tungah, Amor kumpi Sihon’ gam leh Bashan kumpi ahi Og’ gam, a leitang leh a khuapite a gam sung tawh, a gam sunga leitang tunga om khuapi khempeuh pia hi.
Gad minamte in khuapi muanhuai Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atoroth-shofan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Bethnimrah, Bethharan-te satin tuute adingin tuu-khawkte bawl uh hi.
Reuben minamte in Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, leh Baalmeon (a minte khel ding), leh Sibmah khuapite sat uh hi; amau’ satsa khuapite a min thak phuak uh hi.
Manasseh tapa ahi Makhirte beh, Gilead ah pai-in va la uh a, tua sunga om Amor mite suankhia uh hi.
Moses in Manasseh tapa Makhir-te beh tungah Gilead pia-in, tua lai-ah amaute teeng uh hi.
Manasseh minam sung panin Jair pai-in amau’ khua neute va la a, tuate Havvothjair phuak hi.
Nobah pai-in Kenath leh a khua neute va la a, ama min tamin Nobah phuak hi.
Hihte in Moses leh Aaron’ makaihna tawh Izipt gam panin a honin a paikhiat lai-un Israel mite’ giahphualte ahi hi.
Moses in Topa’ thupiakna tawh phual khat khit phual khat amau’ kipatna munte gelh hi; hihte in amau’ kipatna mun tawh kizui-in a giahphualte ahi hi.
A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm leh ni nga ni-in Remeses panin amaute ding khia uh hi; Paisan ni khat a zing ciangin Izipt mite khempeuh’ muhna ah gualzawhna tawh Israel mite paikhia uh a,
Topa in amaute lakah a thah lup tacil khempeuh Izipt mite in a vui laitak uh ahi hi; amau’ pasiante tungah zong Topa in thukhenna bawl hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Remeses panin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Sukkoth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sukkoth panin amaute ding khia uh a, gam monga om Etham ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Etham panin amaute ding khia uh a, Baalzefon nisuahna lama om Pihahiroth lamah kihei kik uh hi; amaute in Migdol mai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hahiroth mai panin amaute ding khia uh a, tuipi laizang kantanin gam lakah pai-in Etham gam lakah ni thum lam pai uh a, Marah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Marah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Elim tung uh hi; Elim ah cik tuikhuk sawm-le-nih leh nisuh kung sawmsagih om a, amaute in tua lai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Elim panin amaute ding khia uh a, San tuipi gei-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
San tuipi panin amaute ding khia uh a, Sin gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sin gamlak panin amaute ding khia uh a, Dofkah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dofkah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Alush ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Alush panin amaute ding khia uh a, mite’ dawn ding tui a om lohna Refidim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Refidim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Sinai gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sinai gamlak panin amaute ding khia uh a, Kibrothhattaavah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kibrothhattaavah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Hazeroth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hazeroth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rithmah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rithmah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rimmonperez ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rimmonperez panin amaute ding khia uh a, Libnah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Libnath panin amaute ding khia uh a, Rissah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rissah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Kehelathah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kehelathah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Shefer Mual ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Shefer Mual panin amaute ding khia uh a, Haradah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Haradah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Makheloth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Makheloth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Tahath ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tahath panin amaute ding khia uh a, Terah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Terah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Mithkah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Mithkah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Heshmonah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Heshmonah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Moseroth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Moseroth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Ben-ejaakan ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ben-ejaakan panin amaute ding khia uh a, Horhaggidgad ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Horhaggidgad panin amaute ding khia uh a, Jotbathah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Jotbathah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Abronah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Abronah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Ezion-geber ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ezion-geber panin amaute ding khia uh a, (Kadesh ahi) Zin gam lakah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kadesh panin amaute ding khia uh a, Edom gam mong Hor Mual-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Israel mite Izipt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kum sawmli-na a kha ngana a ni masa ni-in Topa’ thupiakna tawh Hor Mual tungah siampi Aaron paito-in tua lai-ah a si hi.
Hor Mual-ah Aaron a sihin kum za leh kum sawmnih leh kumthum a pha hi.
Kanaan gam sung Negeb gamah a teeng Kanaan mi Arad kumpipa in Israel mite’ hong paina thu za hi.
Hor Mual panin amaute ding khia uh a, Zalmonah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Zalmonah panin amaute ding khia uh a, Punon ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ponun panin amaute ding khia uh a, Oboth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Oboth panin amaute ding khia uh a, Moab gam sung ahi Iyeabarim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Iyim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Dibongad ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dibongad panin amaute ding khia uh a, Almondiblathaim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Almondiblathaim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Nebo tun’ ma Abarim mualte-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Abarim mualte panin amaute ding khia uh a, Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah giahphual sat uh hi;
Jordan kiang Bethjeshimoth panin Moab leizang sunga a om Abelshittim dongah amaute in giahphual sat uh hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in; Jerikho kantanin Kanaan gam na tun’ uh ciangin

note mai panin tua gama teeng mi khempeuh na hawlkhia ding uh a, amau’ suang milimte khempeuh susia-in, a kisung amau’ milimte khempeuh na susia ding uh a, mual tunga a biaknate khempeuh uh na sumang ding uh hi;
na neih dingun note tungah leitang hong pia khin ka hih manin note in leitang luahin tua tungah na teeng ding uh hi.

Note in na minam uh tawh kizui-in aisaanna tawh leitang na luah ding uh hi; minam tamte tungah luahna a tam na pia ding a, minam tawmte tungah luahna a tawm na pia ding hi; mi khatpeuh ading ai a phatna peuhpeuh ama’ aa hi ding hi; na pate uh nam tawh kizui-in na luah ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin note’ mai panin tua gam sunga teeng mite na hawlkhiat kei uh leh, na om sak laite uh note tungah na mittang uhah hong do, na pang uhah a hong sun lingte hong hi ding uh a, na ten’na gam uhah note hong gimsak ding uh hi.
Amaute tunga hih dinga ka ngaihsut bangin note tungah kong hih ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite thu pia in la, amaute tungah, Kanaan gamah na lut uh ciangin (hih in note’ luah dingin note hong kipia ding, Kanaan leitang a vekpi-in),
na leitaw lam pang uh in Zin gamlak panin Edom pang teng hi ding a, leitaw lam na gamgi uh nisuahna lamah Ci Tuipi mong pan kipan ding hi;
na gamgi uh Akrabbin mual leitaw lamah kawi-in Zin dong banin, Kadeshbarnea leitaw lamah pai ding hi; tua ciangin Hazaraddar lamah pai suakin Azmon dongah pai ding hi;
gamgi in Azmon panin Izipt Lui lamah kawi-in Tuipi ah tawp ding hi.
“Nitumna gamgi dingin Tuipi Lian leh a gei dung teng na nei ding uh hi; hih in nitumna lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Hih in leilu lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi: Tuipi Lian panin Hor Mual dongah lam na ciamteh ding uh hi;
Hor Mual panin Hamath tumna ciang dong na ciamteh ding uh a, gamgi in Zeadad dong ban ding hi;
tua ciangin Zifron dongah gamgi kikhung ding a, a mong in Hazarenan ah tawp ding hi; hih in leilu lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Nisuahna lam na gamgi uh Hazarenan panin Shefam dong na ciamteh ding uh hi;
gamgi in Shefam panin Ain nisuahna lam Riblah dongah paisuk ding hi; gamgi paisuk lai-in nisuahna lamah Khinnereth tuipi liangko dong ban ding hi;
Jordan dongah gamgi paisuk ding a, a mong in Ci Tuipi ah tawp ding hi. Hih in a kimkot-a gamgi a nei na leitang uh hi ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Moses in Israel mite thu pia-in, “Hih in minam kua leh minam langte tungah piak dingin Topa in a thupiak aisaana tawh na luah ding uh leitang ahi hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Reuben minamte a behbeh leh Gad minamte a behbehin amau’ luahna ngah khin zo uh a, Manasseh minam a langte in zong ngah khin zo hi;
minam nihte leh minam langte in nisuahna lam Jerikho nai Jordan gal khatah amau’ luahna ngah khin zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Hihte in luah dingin note’ tungah gam a hawm ding mite’ min ahi hi; siampi Eleazar leh Nun’ tapa Joshua ahi uh hi.
Luah dingin gam a hawm dingin minam simah makai khat na la ding hi.
Hihte in tua mite’ min ahi hi; Judah minam sung panin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb ahi hi.
Simeon minam panin Ammihud’ tapa Shemuel ahi hi.
Benjamin minam panin Khislon’ tapa Elidad ahi hi.
Dan minam sung panin makai khat, Jogli’ tapa Bukki ahi hi.
Josef tapate sung pan: Manasseh minam sung panin makai khat, Efod’ tapa Hanniel ahi hi.
Efraim minam sung panin makai khat, Shiftan’ tapa Kemuel ahi hi.
Zebulun minam sung panin makai khat, Parnak’ tapa Elizafan ahi hi.
Issakhar minam sung panin makai khat, Azzan’ tapa Paltiel ahi hi.
Asher minam sung panin makai khat, Shelom’ tapa Ahihud ahi hi.
Naftali minam sung panin makai khat, Ammihud’ tapa Pedahel ahi hi.
Hihte in Kanaan gamah Israel mite adingin gamh a hawm dingin Topa in a thupiak mite ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Amaute in amau’ neih a luah uh sung panin ten’ nadingin Levi mite tungah khuapi a piak nadingun Israel mite thu pia in: khuapi kiim-a lonona gamte Levi mite tungah na pia ding hi.
Khuapite in amau’ ten’ nading hi ding a, a lonona gamte in amau bawngte leh a inn ganhingte leh a ganhing khempeuh’ ading ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak ding uh khuapi lonona gamte in khuapi kulh panin a kimkot tong tul ciang bang ding hi.

Khuapi pualam na teh ding a, nisuahna lam pang tong tulnih, leitaw lam pang tong tulnih, nitumna lam pang tong tulnih, leilu lam pang tong tulnih hi ding a, a laizangah khuapi om ding hi; hih in amau’ khuapite’ lonona taang gam dingin a neih ding uh ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapite in bukna khuapi gukte hi ding a, mi thatte tua lai-ah na taisak ding uh a, tuate banah khuapi sawmli leh nih na pia ding uh hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapi khempeuh in sawmli leh giat hi-in, a lonona gamte tawh hi ding hi.

Israel mite’ neihsa sung panin na piak ding khuapite in, minam tamte tung panin tam la-in, minam tawmte tung panin tawm na la ding hi; amau’ luah gamh tawh a kizui-in Levi mite tungah a khuapite uh pia ciat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Moses kiangah,
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Jordan kantanin Kanaan gamah na tun uh ciangin,
sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a that kha mi thatte a va tai theih nadingin note adingin bukna khuapi dingin khuapite na teel ding uh hi.
Thu kikhen dingin mi honpi mai-ah a din’ ma-in mi thatte a sih loh nadingin khuapite in phulapa’ kiang panin note’ adingin bukna hi ding hi.
Na piak uh khuapite in note’ bukna khuapi gukte hi ding hi.
Bukna khuapi dingin Jordan gal khatah khuapi thum, Kanaan gamah khuapi thum na pia ding uh hi.
Sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a that khate a tai theih nadingin hih khuapi gukte in Israel mite leh khual mite leh note lakah a peemte’ adingin bukna hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin amah in na-a kizang sik khat tawh amah satin amah a sih leh, amah in mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
Amah in, mi a sih theih nading mah ahi a khut sunga om suang khat tawh a suk a, a sih leh, amah mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh, amah in, mi a sih theih nading ahi a khut sunga om sing a kibawl hiam khat tawh amah a sat a, a sih leh, amah mi that ahi hi; a mi thatpa kithat ding hi.
A kinaipih pen khat in a phu la-in mi thatpa that ding hi; amah a tuah ciangin that ding hi.
Amah in muhdahna tawh sunin, ahih kei leh bukin a khawh a, a sih leh,
tua ahih kei leh galbawlna tawh a khut-in tumin a sih leh, tua a tumpa kithat ding hi; amah mi that ahi hi; a phulapa in a tuah ciangin tua mi thatpa that ding hi.
“Ahih hangin gal bawl lopi-in thakhatin amah sunin, ahih kei leh buk lopi-in na khatpeuh tawh amah khawh-in,
ahih kei leh, amah pen ama gal hilo, ama siatna ding a zong hilo napi-in, mi a sih theih nading suang khat zangin, a muh lopi-in amah in deng kha a, a sih leh,
mi thatpa leh a phulapa kikalah hih ngeina kipte tawh kizui-in mihonpi in khen ding hi;

a phulapa’ khut sung panin mihonpi in mi thatpa honkhia-in, mihonpi in amah a va taina, bukna khuapi ah amah puakkik ding a, sathau siangtho a kinilh siampi lianpa a sih matengin tua sungah a teeng ding hi.
Ahih hangin hun khatpeuh peuhah amah a taina bukna khuapi gamgi kheng in a pai a,
a phulapa in ama bukna khuapi daihual pua lamah amah mu-in, a phulapa in mi thatpa a thah leh, tua a thatpa mawh lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh siampi lianpa a sih matengin tua mipa a bukna khuapi sungah a om ding ahi hi; ahih hangin siampi lianpa a sih khit ciangin mi thatpa a neihsa leitangah ciahkik thei ding hi.
“Hihte in na ten’na khempeuh uhah na khang tawntungun thukham leh ngeina hi ding hi.
Khatpeuh in mi khat a thah leh, tecite’ genna siksanin mi thatpa kithat ding hi; ahih hangin teci khat bek’ teci pan’na siksanin kuamah kithat lo ding hi.
Tua tham loin, sihna thuak dingin a mawh mipa’ nuntakna tatna sum na sang kei ding uh hi; amah kithat ding hi.
Siampi lianpa a sih ma-in bukna khuapi ah a taisa mipa a gamah a ciahkik theih nadingin ama nuntakna tat nading sum na sang kei ding uh hi.

Na ten’na leitang uh na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi thahna in leitang ninsak a, a that mipa a kithah kei buang leh, tua mi kithahna leitang sian’sak nading thu dang om thei lo hi.
A laizangah keimah ka ten’na, note ten’na leitang na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa keimah in Israel mite laizangah ka teeng hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Josef tapate beh Manasseh, Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, Makhir’ tapa Gilead ahi Gilead’ tapate beh lutangte in hong naih-in Moses leh Israel mi beh lutang ahi makaite’ mai-ah thu gen uh a,

amaute in, “Israel mite tungah aisaanna tawh luah dingin leitang piak ding Topa in ka topa thu hong pia hi; ka sanggam uh Zelofehad’ luahnate a tanute tungah piak dingin Topa in ka topa thu hong pia hi.

Ahih hangin Israel sungah minam dangte’ tapate khatpeuh peuh tawh amaute kiteng leh a pate uh’ luahna panin amau aa teng kilakhia-in a manawh minamte tungah tua luahna kipia beh ding hi; tua ahih ciangin ko’ ngahsa luahna panin a kikhen khia ding ahi hi.
Israel mite’ jubili hong tun ciangin, amau’ aate pen a manawh minamte’ tungah kapia beh ding hi; ka pa uh namte’ luahna panin amau’ aa kikhenkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in Topa genna tawh kizui-in Israel mite thu pia a, “Josef suan minamte’ genna man hi.
Hih in Zelofehad’ tanute tawh kisai-in Topa thupiak ahi hi; Amaute in hoih a sak pente uh tawh kiteng hen; ahih hangin amau’ behte bek ten’pih thei ding uh hi.
Israel mite’ gamhte minam khat pan namdang khatah paikhia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mi khempeuh a minam ciat uh tawh kip ding uh hi.
Israel mite khempeuh in a pate’ uh gamh a luah theih nadingun, Israel mite’ sung panin minam khat peuhpeuh ah gamh a nei tanu khempeuh in a pate’ nam sung khatpeuh peuh’ zi hi ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin minam khat pan a dangah gamh paikhia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite sung panin minam khempeuh amau’ gamh ciat tawh kip ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Zelofehad’ tanute gamta uh hi;
Bang hang hiam cih leh Zelofehad’ tanu Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milkah leh Noahte, a pate uh sanggamte’ tapate tawh kiteng uh hi.
Josef’ ta Manasseh’ tapate innkuan sungah amaute in pasal nei uh a, a pate nam innkuan sungah amau’ gamh luahte kip hi.
Hihte in Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab leizangah Israel mite tungah Moses tung tawnin Topa in a piak thupiaknate leh ngeina kipte ahi hi.
Abraham’ suan, David’ suan, Zeisu Khazih’ khang ciamtehna lai inah:
Abraham’ tapa Isaak, Isaak’ tapa Jakob, Jakob’ tapa Judah, leh a unaute teng hi.
Judah in a zi Tamar tawh a neih a tapa Perez leh Zerah, Perez’ tapa Hezron, Hezron’ tapa Aram,
Aram’ tapa Amminadab, Amminadab’ tapa Nashon, Nashon’ tapa Salmon,
Salmon in a zi Rahab tawh a neih a tapa Boaz, Boaz in a zi Ruth tawh a neih a tapa Obed, Obed’ tapa Jessi,
Jessi’ tapa David kumpipa hi. David in Uriah’ zi ahi ngei tawh a neih a tapa Solomon,
Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam, Rehoboam’ tapa Abijah, Abijah’ tapa Asa,
Asa’ tapa Jehoshafat, Jehoshafat’ tapa Joram, Joram’ tapa Uzziah,
Uzziah’ tapa Jotham, Jotham’ tapa Ahaz, Ahaz’ tapa Hezekiah,
Hezekiah’ tapa Manasseh, Manasseh’ tapa Amon, Amon’ tapa Josiah,
Josiah in Babilon khuapi-ah a paipih lai takin a neih a tapa Jekhoniah leh a unau teng hi.
Babilon khuapi-ah a paipih khit ciangin Jekhoniah’ tapa Shealtiel, Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel,
Zerubbabel’ tapa Abiud, Abiud’ tapa Eliakim,
Eliakim’ tapa Azor, Azor’ tapa Zadok, Zadok’ tapa Akhim, Akhim’ tapa Eliud,
Eliud’ tapa Eleazar, Eleazar tapa Matthan, Matthan’ tapa Jakob,
Jakob’ tapa Josef, Mari’ pasal ahi hi. Tua Mari in Khazih kici Zeisu’ nu ahi hi.

Tua hi a, a khang kigawmin Abraham pan David dongin khang sawm leh khang li, David pan Babilon khuapi-ah a paipih dongin khang sawm leh khang li, Babilon khuapi-ah a paipih pan Khazih dongin khang sawm leh khang li hi.
Zeisu Khazih’ suahna thu in hih bang ahi hi. A nu Mari in Josef tawh kingai a, a kiten’ ma-in Kha Siangtho in a gaisak hi.
A lawmpa Josef in mi lungsim pha ahih maninah Mari mindaisak nuam loin, maksim ding a lungngai hi.
Tua banga a lungngaih lai takin a mang sungah Pasian’ vantungmi khat kilang a, “David’ suan Josef aw, na lawmnu Mari na ten’pih dingin lunghimawh kei in. Ama gaina in Kha Siangtho in a gaisak hi.
Amah in tapa a nei ding hi. Tua tapa in ama mipawlte’ mawhnate sung pan a gumkhia ding ahih ciangin a min Zeisu na phuak ding hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
Tua thu khempeuh in Topa in a kamsangte tungah a genkholh bangin a tun’ nading ahi hi. Tua thu genna in:
“En un, nungak khat gai ding a, Tapa a nei ding hi. Tua a tapa a min Emmanuel kici ding hi,” a ci hi. Emmanuel a khiatna in ‘Eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi’ a cihnopna hi.
Josef in a ihmutna pan a khan’lawh ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi in a thu hilh bangin mangin a lawmnu a ten’pih hi.
Ahih hangin a ta a suah matengin a luppih kei hi. Tua a tapa a min Zeisu a phuak hi.

Judah gam Herod Kumpipa a man’ lai takin, Bethlehem khua-ah Zeisu a suah khit ciangin mipilte in ni suahna gam lam panin Jerusalem khuapi-ah tung uh a, tu lai taka suak Judah kumpipa koi lai takah om hiam?
Ni suahna gam lam pan ama aksi ka mu zo uh hi. A bia dinginah ka hong pai uh hi,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Herod kumpipa in tua thu a zak ciangin Jerusalem khuami khempeuh tawh a lunghimawh uh hi.
Pasian siampi leh laithei upa teng khawm a, “Khazih in koi lai-ah suak ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Pasian’ kamsangpa khat in:

‘Judah gam Bethlehem khua aw, Judah gam khuapi lakah nang, khua neu, khua gina lo na hi kei hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, keima mipawl Israel mite cing dingin, Nangma sungah mangpa khat a piang ding hi, ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Judah gam Bethlehem khua-ah Khazih a suak ding hi,” ci-in kumpipa kiangah a gen uh hi.
Herod in mipilte sam sim a, aksi kilat hun pha takpi-in dong a,

a theih khit ciangin, “Note pai un la, tua naupang va hah zon’ un. Na muh uh leh, kei kiangah hong gen kik in. Kei zong pai-in tua naupang ka va bia ding hi,” ci-in vaikhak a, Bethlehem khua-ah a paisak hi.
Tuate in kumpipa’ thu a zak khit uh ciangin paikhia uh a, ni suahna gam lam pan a kimusa aksi in amau mai-ah pai a, naupang’ omna tung a tun’ ciangin a khawl hi.
Mipilte in tua aksi a muh uh ciangin nuam mahmah uh a,
inn sungah a lut uh leh, naupang leh a nu Mari a muh uh ciangin a bia uh hi. Amau van a suah khit uh ciangin kham leh paknamtui leh mirrah a pia uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin Herod kumpipa kiangah a pai nawn loh nadingun a mang sung uhah thu kipiakna bangin, amaute khua-ah ciah dingin lampi dang a tawn uh hi.

Tua mite a pai khit uh ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi khat in Josef’ mang sungah kilang a, “Tho in, naupangno leh a nu sam in la, Izipt gamah taipih in. Ka hong hilh kik matengin tua gamah va om in. Herod kumpipa in naupang that nuamin a zong ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef tho a, naupang leh a nu zankimpi-in samkhia a, Izipt gamah a taipih hi.
Herod kumpipa a sih matengin tua gamah a va om hi. Tua bang va omna in Pasian in a kamsangpa tungah, “Ka tapa Izipt gam panin ka sam zo hi,” ci-a a genkholhsa thu a tun’ nading hi.

Herod kumpipa in mi pilte’ khemna a theih ciangin a thangpai mahmah a, mite sawl a, mipilte kiangah a tel taka a dot hun tawh kizui-in Bethlehem khua-a kipan khua kimah a om kum nih nuaisiah pasalno khempeuh a thatsak hi.
Pasian’ kamsangpa Jeremiah in a gensa bangin tua lai takin a tung hi.
A genna in:“Ramah gamah nakpi kahna kiza hi. Rachel in ama tate ading a kap hi. A tate om lo ahih ciangin kinem zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
Herod kumpipa a sih khit ciangin Izipt gamah Josef’ mang sungah Pasian’ vantungmi khat kilang kik a,
“Tho in la, naupang leh a nu sam in la, Israel gamah na ciahpih in. Naupang that nuama a zongte in a si zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho a, naupang leh a nu sam a, Israel gamah a tung kik hi.
Herod’ za a tapa Arkhelaus in luah a, Judah gamah a man’ thu a zak ciangin tua gamah tung ngam lo a, a mang sungah a kihilh ciangin
Galile gamah pai a, “Khazih in Nazereth mi kici ding hi,” ci-a Pasian’ kamsangte’ gen bangin a tun’ nadingin Nazareth kici khua khatah tungin a teeng hi.
Tua lai takin Baptaiz-pa Johan hong kilang a, “Vantung Gam a hong nai zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na mawhna uh kisik kik ta un,” ci-in Judah gam, gampa lakah a hilh hi.
Pasian in kamsangpa Isaiah tungah a hilh ngei bangin: “Gampa lakah a kikopa’ aw in, ‘Topa paina lam na sial un, Ama lampi na tangsak un,’ a ci hi,” a cihna in tua mipa a cihnopna hi.
Johan in kalaoh mul kigan puan silh a, savun kawnggakin a kawng a gak hi. Kauphe leh gampa lak khuaizu in a kivak hi.
Tua lai takin Jerusalem khuapi, Judah gam, Jordan gun gei-ah a om mi khempeuhte Johan kiangah va pai uh a,
amau mawhna khialhna pulakin Jordan gun sungah ama khut tungah kibaptaiz uh hi.
Farisai-te leh Saddusi-te a kibaptaiz dinga hong pai Johan in a muh ciangin, “No mualtan’ suante aw, a hong tung ding hehna pan na taikhiat nadingun kua in hong hilhkhol hiam?
Mawhna kisik kikna tawh kilawm gah na gah un.
‘Abraham ka pa uh,’ ci-in na lungsim sung uhah lungngai kei un. Ke’n kong cih-inah, Pasian in hih suangte zong Abraham’ tate a suaksak thei hi.
Tu-in zong sing phungah hei a om hi. A gah hoihte a gah lo kung khempeuh phuk paii-in mei sungah kikhul ding hi.

Keimah in na mawhna na kisikkikna uh hangin tui sungah ka hong baptaiz hi. Ahih hangin ka nungah hong paipa in kei sangin a lianzaw hi. Ama khedap tawi ding nangawn ka kilawm kei hi. Amah in Kha Siangtho leh mei sungah note hong baptaiz ding hi.
A khut in lawhpi tawi a, ama buhphual zap siang ding a, a tak teng a sal sungah a koih ding hi. A site ahih leh, mit ngei lo mei in a hal ding hi,” ci-in Johan in a gen hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu kibaptaiz dingin Galile gam panin Jordan gun gei Johan kiangah va pai hi.
Johan in, “Nangmah in kei nong baptaiz ding kilawm zaw napi-in kei kiangah hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in a nial hi.
Zeisu in, “A dik thu khempeuh i zuih ding a kilawm ahih ciangin tu-in thu hong mang in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Johan in a mang hi.
Zeisu a kibaptaiz khit tui sung pan a thawhtoh lai takin van kihong a, Pasian’ Kha Siangtho vakhu bangin hong kum sukin, ama tungah a khawl a mu hi.
“Hih pa in ka lung hong damsak ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” ci-in vantung panin aw khat a ging hi.
Tua ciangin dawimangpa’ kheemna thuak nadingin Kha Siangtho in, Zeisu gampa lakah a sawl hi.
Zeisu in ni sawmli leh zan sawmli an a tan’ khit ciangin a gilkial hi.
Tua lai takin a kheem dingpa in va nai a, “Nang in Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi leh, hih suangte khomun suaksak in,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Mi in khomun bek tawh nungta lo hi, Pasian’ kam sung pan hong pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nungta hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci kik hi.
Tua khit ciangin dawimangpa in, Zeisu khua siangtho sungah paipihin, biakna innpi khum zangah a koih khit ciangin,

“Nang in Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi leh, na pumpi kikiasuksak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh: “Amah in ama vantungmite, nang ading thu a pia ding hi,” leh, ‘Na khe in suang tawh a kisuk khak loh nadingin, amau in a khut un, nang hong dom ding uh hi; ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” dawimangpa in a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
Dawimangpa in mual sangpi dawnah Zeisu paipihto a, leitungah a om gam khempeuh leh gam sungah a om,
minthan’na a lah khit ciangin, “Nangmah in bokin hong bia leteh, kong lah peuhpeuh ka hong pia ding hi,” a cih ciangin
Zeisu in “Satan aw, kihemkhia in. Na Topa Pasian na bia ding hi; ama na bek na sem ding hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin, dawimangpa in Topa kiang pan paikhia a, vantungmite hong pai-in an a vaak uh hi.
Johan’ kimatna thu Zeisu in a zak ciangin, Galile gamah pai a,
Nazareth khua khengin Zebulun gam leh Naftali gam kikalah, tuili tawh kinai Kapernaum khua-ah tungin a teeng hi.
Tua a va omna in Pasian’ kamsangpa Isaiah in a gen bang a tun’ nading hi. A genna thu in:
“Zebulun gam leh Naftali gam ahi, Jordan gun galah tuipi lian lam, Gentailte omna Galile gamah,
Khuamial sungah a om mite in, Khuavakna a mu uh hi; Sihna liim gam sungah a tute tungah, Khuavak a taang zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua nung ciangin Zeisu in, “Na mawhna uh kisikkik ta un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam a hong nai zo hi,” ci-in thuhilh a kipan hi.
Galile tuili gei lamah a pai lai-in, Piter kici Simon leh Andru te unau, ngabengte ahih uh ciangin tui sungah ngen paai-a om uh a mu hi.
Zeisu in, “Ka nung hong zui un. Mi mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a cih ciangin,
amaute in thakhatin a ngen uh nusia-in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
Tua mun a khen ciangin, unau dang nih, Zebedi’ ta Jakob leh Johan-te, a pa tawh gunkuang sungah ngen khui-a a om a muh ciangin a sam hi.
Amau in thakhatin a pa leh a gunkuang uh nusia-in Zeisu nung a zui pah uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute kikhopna inn sungah Vantung Gam’ Lungdamna Thu hilh a, cinate damsakin Galile gam sung tengah a vak kawikawi hi.
A thu khempeuh in Siria gam teng zeel a, dawi lut, sibup, khut leh khe si akipan, cinatna pawl khempeuh a veite ama kiangah hong paipih uh a, cinatna khempeuh a damsak hi.
Galile gam, Dekapolis gam, Jerusalem khuapi akipan, Judah gam, Jordan gungal khat pan mi tampi hong pai uh a, a nung a zui uh hi.
Tua mihonpi a muh ciangin, Topa in mual tungah kahto a, tu-a a om lai takin, a nungzuite in ama kiangah va nai uh hi.
Amah in kam ka a, a nungzuite thu a hilh inah:
“Lungsim niamkhiatte in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam in amau gam uh ahi ding hi.”
“A dahte in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in lungdamna a ngah ding uh hi.”
“Lungnemte in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in leitung a luah ding uh hi.”
“Gilkial a, an duh banga lungsiangtho a deihte in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in vaakna a ngah ding uh hi.”
“Midang a hehpih theite in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in zong hehpihna a ngah kik ding uh hi.”
“Lungsim siangthote in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in Pasian a mu ding uh hi.”
“Mi kitawng kilemsak kik theite in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ tate cihna a ngah ding uh hi.”
“Dikna thu hanga bawlsiatna a thuakte in thupha a ngah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam in amau gam uh ahi ding hi.
Kei hanga note in gensiatna, bawlsiatna, ahi lo kimawhsakna na thuak uh leh, thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
Lungdamin na nuam un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gamah a lian noptuamna na ngah ding uh hi. Note pian’ ma a piang kamsangte zong tua mah bangin a bawlsia uh hi.”
“Note in leitung’ ci na hi uh hi. Ci in a alna a man’ leh, bangci a al kik ding hiam? Dai pua lamah paikhia-in mite sikgawp ding longal kiman’na om lo hi.
Note in leitung khuavak na hi uh hi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiliah zo lo hi.
Mite in meivak a vak khit uh ciangin seeng a khuh kei uh hi. Inn sungah mi khempeuh in meivak a muh nadingun, a kho sangah a vaak uh hi.
Tua mah bangin, midangte in na gamtatna phate a muh uh ciangin, vantungah a om na Pa uh Pasian’ min a phat nadingun, na khuavak uh mite mai-ah na tangsak un.”
“Thukhamna leh Pasian’ kamsangte’ thu siasak dingin hong pai hi ci-in hong um kei un. Siasak dinga hong pai ka hi kei hi. A kicingsak dingin hong pai ka hi hi.
Aman takpi kong cih-inah, van leh lei a mangthang zongin thu khempeuh a kicin’ matengin Pasian’ Thukham a neupen nangawn kisia ngei lo ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, mi khatpeuh mah in Thukham a neupen khial a, midangte zong hilh a, a khialhsak leh, tua mi, Vantung Gam sungah mi neupen a kici ding hi. Mi khatpeuh mah in thukham zui a, midangte hilh a, a zuih sak leh, tua mi, Vantung Gam sungah milian a kici ding hi.
Note’ gamtatnate in laitheite leh Farisaite’ gamtatnate sangin a phat zawk kei leh, Vantung Gamah na tung zo peuhmah kei ding uh hi.”
“Mi na that kei un. Mi thatte in zum innah thukhenna thuak ding hi,’ ci-in tanglai mite kiangah cihna na za zo uh hi.

Ke’n kong cih-inah, a sanggamte tungah a hehte khempeuh in zum innah thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi. A sanggam a gensiate in upa vaihawmna pan thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi. A sanggam a phuisamte in meikuang sungah kikhulna a thuak ding uh hi.
Pasian’ biakna tau-ah biakna pia ding na om lai takin, na sanggamte khat na tungah lungkim lo hi cih na phawk leh,
biakna tau mai-ah na biakna koih phot inla, ciah kik-in na sanggam tawh na kilem khit ciangin pai kik inla, biakna na pia in.

Na kitotpihpa tawh lam na tonkhawm lai takin na kilem mengmeng in. Tua ahih kei leh, amah in thukhen mangpa kiangah hong khia ding hi. Thukhen mangpa in palikte kiangah hong pia ding a, palikte in thong sungah hong khum ding hi.
Aman takpi kong cih inah, na liau ding dangkasan a khitna na piak khit matengin thong sung pan na paikhia thei kei ding hi.”
“Mi’ zi tawh na mawh kei in,’ a cihna thu na za uh hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, numei khat peuhmah khialh nopna lungsim tawh a ente in, a lungsim sungah tua numei tawh a mawh zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na mit taklam in hong puksak leh, khelkhia inla paai in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, na pumtangin hel khua sungah na kiat sangin na na khat kisia leh, nang adingin a phazaw ding hi.
Na khut taklam in hong puksak leh, sat tan inla, paai in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, na pumtangin hel khua sungah na pai sangin, na na khat kisia leh, nang adingin a phazaw ding hi,”
“A zi a ma nuam peuhmah in kikhenna lai pia ta hen,’ a cihna thu a om zo hi.
Ke’n kong cih inah, pasal dang tawh a mawh longal thudang hangah zi a mate in midang tawh a zi angkawmsak a suak hi. A maksa numei a teen’pihte a vekpi un mi’ zi tawh a mawh uh hi,”
“Khat vei: ‘A hi lopi-in na kiciam kei in, Pasian tawh na kiciamnate na tungsak in,’ ci-inah tanglai mite tungah a kigen thu na thei zo uh hi.
Ke’n kong cih inah, na kiciam peuhmah kei un. Vantung in Pasian’ tokhom ahih ciangin vantung tawh na kiciam kei un.
Leitung in Pasian’ khe ngakna ahih ciangin leitung tawh na kiciam kei un. Jerusalem khuapi in a lian Kumpipa’ khua ahih ciangin Jerusalem khuapi tawh na kiciam kei un.
Na lu tawh na kiciam kei un, bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na samzang khat a kang a vom dingin na bawl thei kei uh hi.
A hite ‘A hi mah hi’, a hi lote, ‘A hi lo mah hi,’ na ci un. Tua sang a kan zawk leh, a gilo mi’ sung pan a piang hi.”
“Mittang khat tangin mittang khat, ha khat tangin ha khat,’ a cihna thu na za zo uh hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, a gilo mi na thukkik kei un. Na pang taklam mi khatpeuh in hong bet leh, pang langkhat zong na dawh lai un,
Na puanak hong deihgawh manin zum innah hong heekte puanza zong na lasak un,
Zawhthawh thu-in tai khat hong paipih nuamte tai nih na zui un.
A hong ngente na pia un. A hong leitawite na nungngat kei un.”
“Na pawlte na it in, na galte na mudah in a cihna thu na za zo uh hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah vantungah a om na Pa uh Pasian’ tate na suah nadingun na galte na it un. Hong bawlsiate ading thu na ngetsak un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian in miphate leh migilote tungah ama ni a tangsak kim hi. Misiangthote leh misiangtho lote tungah guah a zusak kim hi.
Hong itte bek na it uh leh, na gitna uh bang phattuamna na ngah ding uh hiam? Siahdongte in zong tua bang ahih uh hilo ahi hiam?
Na sanggamte tung bekah na kamsiam uh leh, midangte sangin na siamna uh om tuan lo hilo ahi hiam? Gentailte in zong tua bang ahih uh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, vantungah a om na Pa uh a migi mah bangin na migi ta un.”
“Mi mai-ah kisialin, gamtatna a pha mite muh dingin na bawl loh nadingun na kikem un. A hih kei leh vantungah a om na Pa uh kiangah nopna na ngah kei ding uh hi.”

“Tua ahih ciangin, note in hehpihna na piak uh ciangin mi simtatte in phatna a ngah nop manun, kikhopna inn sung leh lam lai-a a mai-ah peengkul a tumsak uh bangin na hih kei un. Aman takpi kong cih-inah, amau in a phattuamna uh a ngah zo uh hi.
Note in hehpihna na piak uh ciangin a kithei lo dingin na taklam khut’ hihna na veilam khut theisak kei un.
A kilang lona-ah a mu thei na Pa un phattuamna hong pia ding hi.”

“Thu na nget uh ciangin mi simtatte bangin na hih kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, mi muh nadingin a ut manun kikhopna inn sung leh lamka bomah dingin thu a ngen nuam uh hi. Aman takpi kong cih-inah, amau in a phattuamna uh a ngah zo uh hi.
No thu na nget uh ciangin inn sung tawngah lut un la, kong na khak khit uh ciangin a kilang lona munah a om na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. A kilang lona-ah a om na Pa un phattuamna a hong pia ding hi.
Thu na nget uh ciangin, Gentailte bangin kam nainawng ci tuan kei un. Amau in kam tampi gen leeng ngai deuh ding a sa uh hi.
Tuate tawh kibangin na hih kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na deihna khempeuh uh na nget ma un na Pa un a thei zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga a om kote Pa aw, nangma min siangtho ta hen.
Na Gam hong piang ta hen. Vantungah na deihna a kicin’mah bangin, leitungah kicing ta hen.
Tu ni-a ka khamkhop ding uh an hong pia in.
Kote tungah hong mawhte ka maisak uh bangin, Kote mawhna zong hong maisak ta in.
Kheemna hong thuaksak kei in. Gilopa kiang pan hong honkhia in,” ci-in tua bangin thu na ngen un,
Note in mite mawhna na maisak uh leh, vantungah a om na Pa un note mawhna uh hong maisak ding hi.
Note in midangte mawhna na maisak kei uh leh, na Pa un note mawhna uh hong maisak lo ding hi.”

“Note in an na tan’ uh ciangin, mi simtatte bangin na mai uh vulsak kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in antang ahih uh mite theih ding a ut manun a mai a siasak uh hi. Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, amau in a phattuamna uh a ngah zo uh hi.
Nomau in an na tan’ uh ciangin na an tan’na uh mi mai-ah kilang loin, a kilang lona-ah a om na Pa uh mai-ah a kilat nadingin na sam sathau nilh un la, na mai uh phiat un.
A kilang lona-ah a muthei na Pa un phattuamna hong pia ding hi.”
“Na sum na paite uh kekseu thei, nget in ne thei leh, gutate in luh a, a guktheihna hih leitungah na khol kei un.
Kekseu thei lo, nget in ne thei lo, gutate in luha a guk theih lohna vantungah na sum uh khol un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na sum omna munah na lungsim uh a om ding hi.”
“Mittang in pumpi meivak ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin, na mit a ciim leh, na pumpi zong a vaak kim ding hi.
Na mit a man’ leh na pumpi khempeuh a mial ding hi. Na pumpi sungah a om khuavak in khuamial ahih leh, tua khuamial in a mialpha mahmah hi.”

“To nih’ na kuamah in semkhawm zo lo hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a tote khat mudahin khat a it ding hi. Khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na leh leitung’ na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

Tua ahih leh ‘Bang ka ne, bang ka dawn ding hiam?’ ci-in na nuntak nading uh lunghimawh kei un, ‘Bang ka silh ding hiam?’ ci-in na pumpi ading lunghimawh kei un. An sangin nuntakna a lianzaw hi. Puan sangin pumtak lianzaw hilo ahi hiam?”

“Vanah a om vasate na lungngai un. Amaute in khaici tuhin, vawhin, buh atin, beem sungah a khol kei uh hi. Ahih hangin vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a vaak hi. Tuate sangin note in man tampha zaw hilo na hi uh hiam?
A lunghihmawh manin tong khat beek a khangkhan thei note lakah kua a om hiam?
Puan silh dingah bang hangin lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlakah unok kungte in bangci khang thei ahi uh hiam ci-in lungngai un. Amaute in na lah sem lo, khau lah kheek lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin Solomon nangawn a minthan’na puan a silh lai takin tua unok khat bangin kizeem lo hi, ci-in kong gen hi.
Upna neute aw, tuni-in om a, zing ciangin mei khukah kikhul thei lopate Pasian in puan silhsak ahih ciangin, tua tham loin note zong puan hong silhsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Bang ka ne ding hiam? Bang ka dawn ding hiam? Bang ka silh ding hiam?’ ci-in lunghimawh kei un.
Gentailte in tua nate khempeuh hangah a lungmang uh hi. Tua na khempeuh na sap uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi.
Pasian’ Gam leh ama dikna zong masa un. Na zon’ uh leh, tua na khempeuh a hong pia thuah ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, zing ciang ading na lunghimawh kei un. Zing ciang in ama ading a lunghimawh ding hi. Tuni a, om lungkhamna in tuni ading a kicing hi.”
“Thukhenna tawh na kipelh theih nadingun midangte’ thu na khen kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, midangte tungah na khen uh bangin note in thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi. Midangte na piakna uh seeng bangin no zong seengin hong kipia kik ding hi.
Na mit sunga singluang lungngai loin na u na nau’ mit sunga ninneng tang bang hangin na en hiam?
Na mit sungah singluang om napi-in na u na nau kiangah, ‘Na mit sungah a om ninneng tang hong paaikhiasak in,’ bang hangin ci na hi hiam?
Nang mi simtatpa aw, na mit sungah a om singluang paaikhia masa in. Tua khit ciangin, na u na nau’ mit sunga a om ninneng tang paihkhiat ding na tel muh thei ding hi.”
“Na a siangthote uite na pia kei un. Vok mai-ah suangmanphate na paai kei un. Tuate in a khe uh tawh a sikgawp khit uh ciangin, kihei-in hong pet kha ding uh hi.”
“Ngen un. Na nget uh leh, hong pia ding hi. Zong un. Na zon’ uh leh, na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak na kiu un. Na kiuh uh leh, hong hon’ ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a ngente khempeuh in a ngah uh hi. A zongte khempeuh in a mu uh hi. A kiute khempeuh ading kongkhak a hon’ ding hi.
A ta in khomun ngen leh, suang a pia ding,
ngasa ngen leh, gul a pia ding, note lakah kua a om hiam?
Note in migilo na hi napi-un na tate uh a hoih na piak uh leh, tua sangin vantungah a om na Pa un a ngente a hoih, a bang zah a hong pia zaw ding hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, nang tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangin, midangte tungah na bawl in. Hih thu in Pasian’ Thukham leh Pasian’ kamsangte thu sung pan a bulpi ahi hi.”
“Kong kawciik ah lut un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, siatna mun tun’ nading kong leh lampi tanzau a, mi tampi a lut uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, nuntakna mun tun’ nading kong kawciik a, lam neu a, mi tawmcik a lut uh hi.”
“A sungah hangsan ngia hi napi-in tuuvun silh a, no kiangah hong pai thuzuau hilhte na kingaihsun un.
Amau gah en le uhteh, amau lungsim na thei ding uh hi. Lingkungah leenggah kilo thei hiam? Thangling kungah theigah kilo thei hiam?
A kung hoih khempeuh in gah hoih a gah thei uh hi. Kung hoih lo in gah hoih lo a gah thei hi.
A kung hoih in a gah hoih lo gah thei lo hi. A kung hoih lo in a gah hoih gah thei lo hi.
A gah hoih lo kung khempeuh kiphuk tan a, mei sungah kikhul ding hi.
Tua hi a, tua mite’ lungsim uh a gahin na thei ding uh hi.”
“Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci khempeuhte Vantung Gam sungah tum thei kim lo ding uh hi. Vantungah a om ka Pa’ deih bang a gamtate bek a tung ding uh hi.

Tua Ni ciangin, ‘Topa, Topa, kote in nangma min tawh Pasian thu hilh hilo ka hi uh hiam? Nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia hilo ka hi uh hiam? Nangma min tawh nalamdang tampi hih hilo ka hi uh hiam?’ ci-in mi tampite in hong gen ding uh hi.
Tua bang a hong gen uh ciangin, ‘Note cikmahin kong thei ngei kei hi. Mawhna a hihte aw, kei kiang panin taikhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.”
“Tua ahih ciangin, ka thuhilhna za a, a zuite khempeuh in suang tunga inn lam mipil tawh kibang ahi cih ka genteh ding hi.
Guah tampi zu a, tui luang a, huih nung a, tua inn a mut ciangin, suang tungah kilam ahih maninah puk lo hi.
Tu-a ka thuhilhte za napi, a ngai lo mi khempeuhte in sehnel tungah inn lam mihai tawh kibang ahi cih ka genteh ding hi.
Guah tampi zu a, tui luang a, huihpi nung a, tua inn a mut ciangin, sehnel tungah kilam ahih maninah a puk hi. Tua pukna in pukna lian ahi hi,” ci-in Zeisu in a hilh hi.
Hih bangin Zeisu in thu khempeuh a hilh khit ciangin, mihonpite in Topa’ thuhilhna lamdang a sa uh hi.
Bang hang hiam i cih leh, amah in laitheite bangin a hilh kei hi, ukpa bangin thu a hilh hi.
Zeisu mual tung pan hong kumsuk khit ciangin, mihonpi in a nung a zui uh hi.
Tua lai takin miphak khat in Zeisu kiangah va pai-in bia a, “Topa aw, nong hih nop leh, kei nong damsak zo ding hi,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Zeisu in a khut zanin lawng a, “Ka hih nuam hi, na dam ta in,” a cih leh, thakhatin a dam pah hi.
Zeisu in, “Hih thu kuamah kiangah na gen kei in. Pasian’ siampi kiangah pai inla, va kilak in. Amau in a theih nadingun Moses’ thu piaksa bangin biakna na pia in,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in Kapernaum khuapi-ah a tum ciangin galkap mangpa khat in a kiangah va nai a,
“Topa aw, keima nasempa khat a khut a khe si-in gim mahmah a, inn sungah a lum hi,” ci-in a ko hi.
Zeisu in, “Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Galkap mangpa in, “Topa aw, keima inn khum nuaiah nong lut dingin ka kilawm kei hi. Na kam bekin thupia lecin zong ka nasempa a dam ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh, keimah in zong za nuai ah hong kikoih hi. Keima nuai ah zong galkapte a om hi. Tua galkapte khat, ‘Pai in,’ ka cih ciangin a pai hi, khat ‘hong pai in’ ka cih ciangin a hong pai hi. Ka nasempa, ‘Hih na sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua thu a zak ciangin lamdang sa a, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih zah alian upna Israel mipawl lakah ka mu ngei kei hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, mi tampi in nisuahna lam, nitumna lam panin hong pai-in, Abraham, Isaak leh Jakobte tawh Vantung Gam sungah a tukhawm ding uh hi.
Gamsung mite ahih uh leh, pualam khuamial lakah a hawlkhia ding hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a gen hi.
Zeisu in galkap mangpa kiangah, “Na ciah in. Na upna bangin nangma ading piang ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua a nasempa in tua hunin a dam pah hi.
Zeisu in Piter’ inn sungah a tum ciangin, Piter’ sungnu nattun’ a, lum a mu hi.
Zeisu in, a khut a lawn’ ciangin a nattun’ dam a, tho-in zinte a vaak hi.
Nitak ciangin a sungah dawi lut tampi Zeisu kiangah hong paipih uh a, thu khat bek tawh dawi a hawlkhia a, cinate khempeuh a damsak hi.
Tua thu khempeuh in kamsangpa Isaiah tungah a gen ngei bangin a tun’ nading ahi hi. A genna thu in, “Amah in eite gimna tawlna la a, eite cinatna lunatna a thuak hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonpi in amah a uum Zeisu in a muh ciangin, “Galkhat ah pai ni,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin laitheipa khat hong pai a, “Sia aw, na paina khempeuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Ngiate in kua nei uh hi. Vasate in zong bu a nei uh hi. Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa in ahih leh, a lutang ngak nading mun a nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite khat in, “Topa aw, ka pa vui masak nadingin ah thu hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Zeisu in, “Misite in amau misite na vui ta hen. Ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in gunkuang tungah tuang a, a nungzuite in a zui uh hi.
Huih nakpi nung a, tui kilok-in gunkuang a pap hi. Zeisu a ihmu hi.
A nungzuite in Zeisu a phong uh a, “Topa aw, kote ka si dek tak uh hi. Hong hon in,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Upna neute aw, bang dinga lau na hi uh hiam?” a cih khit ciangin, tho a, huih leh tuihual a taai khit ciangin a dai ta hi.
Tua mite in, “Hih pa in bangci mi ahi hiam? Huih leh tuipi nangawn in a thu a ngai tazen uh hi!” ci-in lamdang a sa uh hi.
A galkhatah Gadara gam a tun’ uh ciangin, lampi ah kuama pai ngam lohna dinga om, a hangsan mahmah dawi lut nih in han lak pan pusuakin Zeisu va dawn uh hi.
“Pasian’ Tapa aw, kote in nang tawh bang kikum i hi hiam? A hun hong tung nai lopi-in kote susia ding hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Tua mite tawh kigamla-ah vok honkhat gamta-in a om uh hi.
Dawite in, “Topa aw, kote nong hawlkhiat leh, vok hon sungah hong lutsak in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
“Pai ta un,” a cih ciangin dawite a paikhia uh a, vokte sungah a lut uh leh, vok hon in keen sang tung pan nakpi-in taisuk uh a, tui sungah a si khin uh hi.
Vok cingte tai uh a, khua sungah a lut khit uh ciangin, dawi lutte’ thu a kipan thu khempeuh a ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin, khuazangin Zeisu dawn dingin a kuankhia uh a, Zeisu a muh uh ciangin, “Ko gam pan taikhia in,” ci-in a thuum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa zong gunkuang sungah tuang a, a galkah khit ciangin a teen’na khua-ah a tung hi.

Tua lai takin a khut a khe si mi khat a lupna tawh pua uh a, Zeisu kiangah a va paipih uh leh, Zeisu in amaute’ upna a theih ciangin, a khut leh khe sipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na lunghimawh kei in. Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
Laitheite kimkhat in, “Hihpa in Pasian tungah a pau khial hi,” ci-in a lungngai uh hi.
Zeisu in amau lungsim a theih ciangin, “Na sin sung uhah hoih lohna thu bang hangin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
Bang ci leng a baih zaw hiam? ‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ ci leng a baih zaw hiam? ‘Tho inla, pai in,’ ci leng a baih zaw hiam?
Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa in leitungah mawhna a maisak theih nading thu a neih lam na theih nadingun, ‘Tho in, na lupna puan la inla, na innah ciah in,’” ci-in a khut a khe sipa kiangah a ci hi.
Amah tho-in a innah a ciah pah hi.
Mihonte in a muh uh ciangin a lau uh a, hih bang bawl theih nading thu mi tungah a pia Pasian a phat uh hi.
Zeisu in tua mun panin paikhia a, Mattiu kici mi khat siah don’na buk sungah tu-a om a mu hi. “Ka nung hong zui in,” a cih ciangin ding-in a zui hi.
Zeisu in inn sungah an a nek lai takin, siahdongte leh mawhnei tampite va pai uh a, Zeisu leh a nungzuite a tukhawm uh hi.
Farisaite in a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Na Siapa uh siahdongte leh mawhneite tawh bang hangin an ne khawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in a zak ciangin, “Cidamte in zato deih lo uh hi. Cinate bek in a deih uh hi.
‘Sagawh biakna sangin hehpihna ka deih zaw hi,’ a cihna thu na theih nadingun pai un la, va sin un. Miphate sam dinga hong pai ka hi kei hi. Mawhneite sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin Johan’ nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a, “Ko leh Farisaite in an nek ka tang zeel uh hi. Bang dinga na nungzuite in an nek tang lo ahi uh hiam?” a cih uh ciangin

Zeisu in, “Zipipa in a lawmte tawh a omkhawm lai takin tuate a dah thei ding uh hiam? Ahih hangin zipipa in a lawmte tawh a kikhen ni a hong tung ding hi. Tua ciangin a lawmte in an nek a tang ding uh hi.
Kuamah in puanlui pen puan thak tawh a thuap kei uh hi. Tua bangin a thuap leh, a thuapna puan in a luisa kai keek semsemin a vang gol ding hi.

Mite in leenggahtui thak savun uum lui sungah a thun kei uh hi. Tua bangin a thun leh, savun a puakkham sak ding hi. Leenggahtui luangkhia-in savun a kisia gawp thei hi. Leenggahtui thak savun uum thak sungah a kithun leh, a nihin kisia lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua bangin thu a hilh lai takin, ukpa khat in va nai a, Zeisu a biak khit ciangin, “Ka tanu a si zo hi. Ahih hangin Topa hong pai-in a tungah na khut nga leteh, a nungta kik ding hi,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Zeisu ding a, a nungzuite tawh tua pa nung a zuikhawm uh hi.
Tua lai takin kum sawm leh kum nih tawntung si luang natna a vei numei khat in,
“Ama puan bek lawng kha leng ka dam ding hi,” ci-in lungngai a, Zeisu nung lamah pai-in a puan mong teep a lawng hi.
Zeisu kihei a, tua numei a muh ciangin, “Ka tanu aw, na lunghimawh kei in. Na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a cih ciangin, thakhatin a dam pah hi.
Zeisu in ukpa’ inn sungah a lut leh, tamngai tumte leh mihonpi gamlum a, om a muh ciangin,
“Taikhia un. Numeino a si hi lo hi, a ihmu hi,” a cih leh, tua mite in zahpihin a nuihsan uh hi.
Zeisu in mihonpi a hawlkhiat khit ciangin inn sungah tum a, numeino’ khut a let leh, numeino a thokik hi.
Tua thu in gam sung khempeuh zelin a thang hi.
Zeisu tua mun panin a paikhiat ciangin, mittaw nih in a nung zui uh a, “David’ Tapa aw, ko hong hehpih in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Innah a lut ciangin mittawte in Zeisu kiangah va nai uh a, Zeisu in, “Hih thu bawl thei-in na hong um uh hiam?” ci-a a dot ciangin amau in, “Ka um uh hi, Topa aw,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in tuate’ mittang lawng a, “Na up uh bangin note ading hong piang ta hen” a cih ciangin amau mit uh a vak hi.
Zeisu in, “Hih thu kuama theih loh nadingin kikeem un,” ci-in nakpi-in a kham hi.
Ahih hangin amau tegel paikhia uh a, tua thu gamsung khempeuh zelin a thangsak uh hi.
Tua mite a paikhiat lai takun dawivei, pau theilo mi khat Zeisu kiangah va kipaipih hi.
Zeisu in dawi a hawlkhiat leh, pau theilopa in kam a gen thei pah hi. Mihonte in lamdang a sa uh a, “Israel pawlte sungah hih bang thu kimu ngei lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Farisaite in, “Dawi mangpa suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in kikhopna inn sungah thu hilhin, gamsung khuapi, khuaneu khempeuh ah vak kawikawi a, Vantung Gam Lungdamna Thu hilh a, cina, luna khempeuh a damsak hi.
Amah in mihonpite a muh ciangin hehpihhuai a sa hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, tua mite in a cing om lo, kikhenthang a, a gim tuute bangin a om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Buh at ding tampi a om hi. Ahih hangin a at ding mite a tawm hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, ‘buh at nasem ding mi hong sawl in’ ci-in buh nei Topa kiangah thu na ngen un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite sawm leh nihte a sap khit ciangin, kihhuai dawite hawlkhiat theih nading ahi zongin, cinatna pawl khempeuh damsak theih nading ahi zongin thu a pia hi.
Sawltak sawm leh nihte a min un: a masa bel Piter kici, Simon leh a naupa Andru, Zebedi’ tapate Jakob leh Johan,
Filip leh Bartholomai, Thomas leh siahdong Mattiu, Alfe-as’ tapa Jakob leh Thaddeas,
Kanaan mi Simon leh Zeisu a lehheekpa Judah Iskarot-te ahi uh hi.
Tua sawm leh nihte Zeisu in sawl a, “Gentailte omna-ah pai kei un. Samaria-te khua sungah lut kei un.
Israel pawl a gammang tuute kiangah na pai zaw un,
Na pai uh ciangin, ‘Vantung Gam hong nai zo hi,’ ci-in na hilh un.
Cinate na damsak un, misite na hing kiksak un. Miphakte na dam sak un. Dawite na hawlkhia un. Man piak lohin na ngah uh bangin, man sang loin na pia un.
Kham, ngun, sumngote, na kawnggak sung uh ah na vom kei un.
Lampi-ah na zat dingun thungip, puanak nih, khedapte, ciangkhut, tuate na keng kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, nasempa in neek ding dawn ding a ngah tuak hi.
Khuapi, khuaneu khatpeuh mah na lut uh ciangin, ‘Hih khua-ah tun’ nading kua kilawm ahi hiam?’ ci-in na dong un la; na paikhiat matengun tuapa’ innah va om un.
Inn sungah na lut uh ciangin, ‘Thupha om ta hen,’ na ci un,
Tua inn a kilawm leh, note thupha a tungah tung ta hen. A kilawm kei leh, note kiangah hong kileh kik ta hen.
Mi khatpeuh mah in no hong nolh a, na thu uh a ngaih nop kei leh, tuapa’ inn pan ahi zongin, a khua pan ahi zongin na paikhiat uh ciangin, na khepeek uhah leivuite na singkhia un.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, thukhen ni ciangin tua khua in, Sodom leh Gomorrah khuate sangin a thuakzaw ding hi.”
“Ngia hon lakah tuute bangin no kong sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin, note in gul bangin na pil un la, vakhu bangin gilo nei loin na om un.
Mite na kikeem un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau in upa vaihawmte thukhenna inn sungah kikhopna inn sungah note hong sat ding uh hi.
Tuate akipan Gentailte mai-ah teci-in na pan’ nadingun, mangte leh kumpite mai-ah keima hangin note hong paipih ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in note hong piak uh ciangin, bang ka ci pau ding hiam, bang thu ka gen ding hiam ci-in lunghimawh kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na gen ding uh thu tua lai takin na ngah ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, note a gen ding na hi kei uh hi; na Pa uh’ Kha Siangtho in note tungah a gen ding hi.

Unau khat leh khat ahi zongin, pa in a tapa ahi zongin, sih nadingin a kiheek ding uh hi. Tate in a nu leh a pate galin do ding uh hi. Tate in a nu leh a pate galin do ding uh a, thah dingin a pia ding uh hi.
Keima min hangin, mite khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. A tawp dongin a thuak zote in gupna a ngah ding uh hi.
Khua khatah note hong bawlsiat uh leh, khua khatah na tai un. Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, Israel khua khempeuh na vak kim khit ma-un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding hi.”
A nungzuite in a siapa sangin lianzaw lo hi. Nasempa in a topa sangin lianzaw lo hi.
A nungzuite in a siapa bangin, a silapa in a topa bangin ahih leh, a pha hi. Inn teekpa ‘Beelzebub’ a cih uh leh, a innkuanpihte tua sangin a ci nuam zaw sem ding uh hilo ahi hiam?”
“Tua ahih ciangin, amaute na kihta kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a kilak lo dinga kisincip bangmah om lo hi. A kithei lo dinga bu bangmah om lo hi.
Khuamial lakah no kiangah ka gennate, khuavak lakah na gen un. Na bil sung uhah kong gennate, innkhum vumah kiko-in na gen un.
Pumpi a thah theih hangin kha a that zo lote na kihta kei un. Pumpi leh kha hel khua sungah a khul zopa na kihta zaw un.
Gitta nih in dangkasan peek khat tawh kizuak hilo ahi hiam? Na Pa un thu pia kei leh, tua gitta khat beek lei tungah kia mawk lo hi.
Na sam uh zong a kisim khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, na lau kei un. Note in gitta tampi sangin na manpha zaw uh hi.”
“Mite mai-ah kei hong mang hong ngai peuhmah, vantungah ka Pa mai-ah zong ka ngai ding hi.
Mite mai-ah hong nial peuhmah, vantungah ka Pa mai-ah ke’n zong ka nial ding hi.”
“Leitungah kilemna khah dingin hong pai hi,’ ci-in hong um kei un. Kilemna khah dingin hong pai ka hi kei hi. Namsau khat khah dingin hong pai ka hi hi.
A tapa leh a pa, tanu leh a nu, teeknu leh monu, khat leh khat kitawngsak dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
Mi khat adingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal hong suak ding hi.
Kei hong it sangin a nute a pate a it zaw mi in, kei tawh kituak lo hi. Kei hong it sangin a tapa a tanu a it zawte in, kei tawh kituak lo hi.
A singlamteh pua-a ka nung hong zui lote in, kei tawh kituak lo hi.
Ama nuntakna a ngahte in, a nuntakna a mangthang ding hi. Keimah hanga nuntakna a mangsakte in, nuntakna a ngah ding uh hi.”
“No hong ngaite in kei hong ngai hi. Kei hong ngaite in kei hong sawlpa zong a ngai hi.

Pasian’ kamsangpa in kam sangpa ahih maninah, tua kamsangpa a ngaite in Pasian’ kamsangpa’ phattuamna a ngah ding hi. Misiangtho in mi siangtho ahih maninah, tua misiangtho a ngaite in misiangtho’ phattuamna a ngah ding hi.
Keima thu zui ahih maninah, hih naupang a neupen tui hai khat a pia peuhmah in, aman takpi kong cih inah phattuamna ngah loin a om kei ding hi,” ci-in Zeisu in a gen hi.
Zeisu in a nungzui sawm leh nihte tua bangin a vaikhak khit ciangin, khua sungah thu gen ding, thu hilh dingin tua mun pan a paikhia hi.
Khazih in a bawlna thu thong sung pan Johan in a zak ciangin a nungzuite sawl a,
“Nangmah in a hong pai dingpa taktak na hi hiam? Ahih kei leh, midang khat ka lamen lai ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong sak hi.
Zeisu in, “Note pai un la, na zaksa uh, na muhsa uh, Johan kiangah va gen un.

Mi mittawte in khua mukik thei uh hi. Khebaite in lam a pai thei uh hi. Miphakte in damna a ngah kik uh hi. Bengngongte in khua za thei uh hi. Misite in hin’kikna a ngah uh hi. Mizawngte kiangah Lungdamna Thu kihilh hi.
Keimah hangah puk nading a nei lo peuhmah in thupha a ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua mite a paikhiat khit uh ciangin, Zeisu in mihonte kiangah Johan’ thu a geninah, “Note in bang en dingin gampa lakah paikhia na hi uh hiam? Huih mut a, vuang pumpeeng en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam?
Ahih kei leh, bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puannel silhte en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puannel silhte in kumpipa’ inn sungah a om uh hi.
Ahih kei leh, bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Pasian’ kamsangpa en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Ahi mah hi. Pasian’ kamsangpa sang a lianzaw hi, kong ci hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin:‘En in, na pai nading lam sial ding, Na mai-ah ka sawltakpa ka paisak ding hi,’ a cihna in tua mipa a cihna ahi hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, numei sung pan a suakte lakah Baptaizpa Johan sanga lianzaw khat beek a om kei hi. Ahih hangin Vantung Gam sungah a neupen in tuapa sangin a lianzaw hi.
Baptaizpa Johan pan akipan tu dongin Vantung Gam in zawhthawh bawlna thuak a, a zawhthawh bawlte in gam a sut uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ kamsangte khempeuh leh thukham in Johan hun donga a piang ding thute a genkhol hi.
Note in na san’ nop uh leh hong pai ding hi ci a, a kigenpa Eijah in amah ahi hi.
Khua zak nading bil nei mi in za ta hen!”
“Tu lai khang mite bang tawh ka genteh ding hiam?
Sumbukah tu-a a om naupangte in a lawmte saminah, ‘Tamngai ka tum uh hangin na laam kei uh hi. Ka thuum uh hangin na kap kei uh hi,’ a kici naupangte tawh kibang hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Johan in an ne lo, tui dawn loin hong pai a, amaute in, ‘Hih pa in dawi lawm a nei hi,’ a ci uh hi.

Mihing Tapa in an ne, tui dawnin hong pai a, amaute in, ‘Hih pa in an hai, zu haipa hi. Siahdongte leh mi gilote tawh zawlin a kiman hi,’ a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin lungpilna in a tate tung panin diksakna a ngah hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vangliatna tampi a lahna khuate in, a mawhna kisik kik lo uh ahih ciangin Zeisu in a mawhsakinah,

“Khorazin khuapi aw, nangmah in gimna na thuak ding hi. Bethsaida khuapi aw, nangmah in gimna na thuak ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, note sungah hong kilak vangliatnate in Tai-ar khuapi leh Sidon khuapi sungah kilak ngei leh, amau in sawtpi pekin khautang puan silhin, vut tawh kibuakin a kisik kik zo ding uh hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah thukhen ni ciangin, note in Tai-ar khuapi leh Sidon khuapi sangin na thuak zaw ding uh hi.

Kapernaum khuapi aw, vantung dongin minthan’na na ngah ding hiam? Nang in hel khua dongin na kiasuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, nangma sungah a kilak vangliatnate in Sodom khuapi sungah kilak ngei leh, tu-ni dongin a kip lai ding hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, thukhen ni ciangin nang in Sodom khuapi sangin na thuakzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Vantung leh leitung a uk ka Pa aw, nangmah in hih nate mipilte leh misiamte kiangah im-inah, naupangte tungah lak na hih ciangin na hehpihna ka phat hi.
A hi mah hi, ka Pa aw, tua bangin na deih hi.
Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei hong pia zo hi. Pa longal kuamah in Tapa a thei kei hi. Tapa leh Tapa in a theihsak nopte longal kuamah in Pa a thei kei hi.
Van gik pua a, a gim mi khempeuhte aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi.
Keima hakkol na kisuan un la, kei kiangah kisin ta un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, keimah in lungsim niam mi ka hi hi. Note in lungsim noptuamna zong na ngah ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ka hakkol puak nop a, ka van zong a zang hi,” ci-in Zeisu in a gen hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in, Nipi ni khatvei, buh lei-ah a vak leh, a nungzuite gilkial uh a, buhvui lo-in a ne uh hi.
Farisaite in a muh uh ciangin Topa kiangah, “En in, Nipi ni-in ahih tuak lo na, na nungzuite in ahih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “David in ama lawmte tawh a gilkial lai takin,
Pasian’ biakna inn sungah lut a, amah leh a lawmte nek dinga kilawm lo, siampite bek nek dinga kilawm khomun siangtho a nek thu, sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian biakna inn sungah a om siampite in, Nipi ni a tan’ khialh uh hangin a mawh kei uh hi, a cihna Pasian’ Thukham Lai Siangtho sungah sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
Hih san takah Pasian biakna inn sangin a lianzaw khat a om hi, kong ci hi.
‘Sagawh biakna sangin, hehpihna ka deih zaw hi,’ a cihna thu na theih uh leh, mawh neilo mite na mawhsak kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Mihing Tapa in Nipi ni ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua mun pan paikhia a, amaute kikhopna inn sungah a lut hi.
Tua lai-ah khut langkhat si mi khat a om hi. Amaute in Topa a mawhsak nop manun, “Nipi ni-in cinatna damsak tuak ahi hiam?”ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ama tuu khat bek a neih Nipi ni-in leihawm sungah kia leh, a lakhia lo ding note lakah kua om ahi hiam?
Mi khat in tuu sangin a manpha zaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin Nipi ni-in phatna bawltuak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a cinapa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” a cih ciangin ama khut a zan leh, a khut langkhat mah bangin a dam hi.
Tua lai takin Farisaite paikhia a, “Amah bangci leeng susia thei ding i hi hiam?” ci-in a vaihawm uh hi.
Zeisu in a theih ciangin tua mun pan a paikhiat leh, mihonpi in a nung a zui uh a, cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
“Kei kua mi ka hih lam kuamah kiangah na gen kei un,” ci-in a kham hi.
Bang hangin hih bangin a kham hiam i cih leh, Pasian in kamsangpa Isaiah tungah a genna thu a tun’ nading hi. A thu genna in:
“Ka teelsa ka nasempa, Ka lung hong damsak, ka it mahmah pa en un. Ama tungah ka Kha Siangtho ka omsak ding hi. Amah in Gentailte tungah thukhenna thu a hilh ding hi.
Amah in thuseel lo kiko lo ding a, Lampi ah a aw kuamah in za lo ding hi.
Thu a khensak khit matengin A awnsa pumpeeng kuai tan lo a, A khu suaksa meivak khau a sumit kei ding hi.
Ama min zong Gentailte in a muang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin dawi lut a, mittaw, a pauthei lo mi khat Zeisu kiangah a paipih uh a, a damsak ciangin, tua pa in khua mu thei a, a pau thei pah hi.
Tua gama mi khempeuh in lamdangsa-in, Hih pa in David’ ta ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Farisaite in a zak uh ciangin, “Hih pa in Beelzebub suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amau lungsim ngaihsutna a theih ciangin, “Gamsung mi kilem lo-a a kikhen gam khempeuh kisia ding hi. A mi kilem lo, a kikhen khua leh inn khempeuh zong a kip zo kei ding hi.
Satan in Satan a hawlkhiat leh, amah leh amah kilem lo a, kikhen hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ama gam bangci a kip zo ding hiam?
Keimah in Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia leng, na tate un kua suangin dawite hawlkhia ding ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin, amaute in note tungah thukhen dingte ahi uh hi.
Keimah in Kha Siangtho suangin dawite ka hawlkhiat leh, Pasian’ Gam in note kiangah hong tung zo hi.
Mi khat in, thahatpa hen masa kei leh, a inn sungah bangci tumin a sumte a sut zo ding hiam? Mi thahatpa a hen khit ciangin, a inn sungah sumte kisut zo bek ding hi.
Kei tawh kipawl lote in, ka lang khatah a om hi. Keimah tawh a khawmkhawm lote in a kithehthang sak hi.

Tua thu hangin ke’n kong cih-inah, mawhna leh Pasian gensiatna khempeuh, maisak nading thu mite in a ngah ding uh hi. Ahih hangin Kha Siangtho gensiatna kimaisak nading thu mite in ngah zo lo ding hi.
Mihing Tapa a gensiate, a mawhna kimaisak thei ding hi. Kha Siangtho a gensiate’ mawhna ahih leh, tu khang laitak ahi zongin, tu nung khang ahi zongin kimaisak zo lo ding hi.”
“A kung hoih a, a gah hoih hi, na ci un. Ahih kei leh, a kung hoih lo a, a gah hoih lo na ci un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a kung a gahin kithei hi.
No mualtan’ suante aw, no gilo na hih uh ciangin kam hoih bangci gen theih ding na hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, lungsim dima om bangin kam in a gen thei hi.
Miphate in a sumkholna hoih sung pan a pha nate a pusuaksak hi. Mipha lote in a hoih lo sumkholna sung panin a pha lo nate a pusuaksak hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, mite in mawkna kampauna khempeuh hangin thukhen ni ciangin teldotna a thuak ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na thu genna hangin mawhsakna tawh na kipelh ding uh hi. Na thu genna hangin thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
Tua lai takin laitheite leh Farisaite kimkhat in, “Topa aw, lim khat hong lak le-cin kote in ka mu nuam uh hi,” a cih uh ciangin
Zeisu in, “Mipaktat leh mi gilo khang mite in lim a nget uh hangin, Jonah lim longal lim dang amau tungah a kilak kei ding hi.
Jonah in ngapi’ gil sungah ni thum a om mah bangin, Mihing Tapa in ni thum lei sungah a om ding hi.

Thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khuamite in tu-a khang mite lang khatah ding-in a mawhsak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Jonah in thu a hilh manin amau in mawhna a kisikkik uh hi. Hih lai takah Jonah sangin a lianzaw mi khat a om hi.

Khang lam gam kumpinu in, a thukhen ciangin, tu-a khang mite lang khatah ding-in a mawhsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amah in Solomon’ lungpilna thu ngai dingin, lei mong panin a pai hi. Hih lai takah Solomon sangin a lianzaw mi khat a om hi.”
“A kihhuai dawi in mi khat sung pan a paikhiat khit ciangin, mun keuna ah vakin khawl nading a zong hi.
A muh loh ciangin, ‘Ka paikhiatna inn lam ciahkik ning,’ ci-a a pai leh, a tun’ ciangin tua inn awngin, kiphiat kipuah a, om a mu hi.

Tua ciangin pai a, amah sangin a gilo zaw dawi sagih va sam a, tua pa sungah a lut uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin, tuapa a pian’ nunung pen in a pian’ masak sangin a siazaw hi. Tua mah bangin hih a gilo khang mite zong ahi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in mihonpi thu a hilh lai takin a nu leh a sanggamte in amah hopih nuamin, inn pua lamah ding-in a om uh hi.
Mi khat in, “Na nu leh na sanggamte in nang hong hopih nuamin inn pua lamah ding-in a om uh hi,” a cih ciangin
Zeisu in, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte kua ahi uh hiam?” ci-in dong a,
a khut zanin a nungzuite kawk a, “En un, hih mite in ka nute, ka sanggamte ahi uh hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamtate in, ka sanggampa, ka sanggamnu, ka nu ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ni-in Zeisu in inn panin paikhia a, tuili geiah a tut lai takin,
mihonpi a kiangah kikhawm uh a, amah in gunkuang tungah tuangin a tu hi. Mihonpite khempeuh tuili geiah, lei tungah a ding uh hi.
Zeisu in thugentehna tawh thu tampi a hilhinah,
“En un, khaici vawhpa in khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi. Khaici a vawh lai takin, kimkhatte lampi geiah kia a, vasate hong pai-in, tawmin a ne uh hi.
Kimkhatte lei tam lohna suang lakah kia a,
lei a dai manin, a po pah hangin, ni suak a, a sat ciangin, zung kha zo lo ahih manin a vul gawp hi.
Kimkhatte ling lakah kia a, lingkungte a khan’ ciangin dep gawp uh hi.
Kimkhatte in lei hoihna-ah kia a, a zah zakhat, a zah sawmguk, a zah sawmthumin a gah hi.
Zak nading bil a nei teng in za ta un!” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in va nai uh a, “Topa aw, bang hangin thu gentehna tawh hih mite hilh na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin
Zeisu in, “Note in Vantung Gam thu theih hakte na theih nadingun thu hong pia hi. Amaute ahih uh leh, a theih nadingun thu kipia lo hi.
A neite kipia beh ding a, a hauzaw ding hi. A neilote kiang pan a neihsa nangawn kilakhia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, tua mite thugentehna tawh ka hilh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amau enin, en napi-in mu lo ding uh hi. Ngai-in, ngai napi-in za lo uh a, akhiatna a thei kei ding uh hi.

Pasian’ kamsangpa Isaiah’ hilh ngeina thu in amau tungah a tung ding hi. Isaiah thu in: ‘Note in ngai-in, na za napi-un a khiatna na thei kei ding uh hi. Note in enin, na en napi-un na mu kei ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, hih mipawlte in a mit un khua mu lo, A bil un khua za lo, A lungsim un thei lo, A gamtatna uh kikhel lo, Amau cinatna uh ka damsak loh nadingin, Amau lungsim uh khauh a, A bil uh ngong a, A mit uh a si uh hi,’ a ci hi.
Note na mittang un mu thei ahih ciangin thupha na ngah ding uh hi. Na bil un khua za ahih ciangin, thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, na muhte uh Pasian’ kamsangte leh misiangthote tampi in a muh nop uh hangin a mu kei uh hi. Na zakte uh a zaknop uh hangin a za kei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, khaici vawhpa thugentehna na ngai un.
Mi khat in Vantung Gam thu a zak ciangin, thei lo ahih ciangin dawimangpa hong pai a, a sin sunga kivawh khaici a lakhia hi. Tuate in lampi geiah a kia khaici ahi hi.
Suang lakah a kiate in, thu a zak ciangin lungdamin a man’ pah hangin, a sungah zung kha lo ahih ciangin tawlkhat kikal bek a kip hi.
A thu hangah gimna ahi zongin, bawlsiatna ahi zongin a thuak ciangin, thakhatin a pukte ahi hi.
Ling lakah a kiate ahih leh, thu a zak ciangin leitung lunghihmawhna, sum leh pai khemna in depgawp uh a, a gah zo lote ahi hi.
Lei hoihna ah a kiate in, thu a zak ciangin a khiatna thei-in a zah zakhat, a zah sawmguk, a zah sawmthumin a gah theite ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna khat in, “Vantung Gam in khaici hoih a vawh mi tawh kibang hi.
Mite ihmut kalun a galpa pai a, tahum tang, taang lakah a vawh khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Taang po a, hong vuih khit ciangin tahum zong hong kilang hi.

A nasemte in a topa uh kiangah pai a, ‘Topa aw, lo lai-ah khaici hoih vawh hilo na hi hiam? Tahum in koi pan a hong piang hiam? ci-a a koh uh ciangin a topa un, ‘Hih thu in galte hong bawlna thu hi,’ a ci hi.
A nasemte in, “Tahum kungte va bot le-ung nong awi hiam?’ a cih uh leh, a topa un,
‘Bot nai kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na bawh uh leh, taang kung tawh na botkhawm kha ding uh hi.

Taang lak hun matengin a nam nihin khangkhawm tadih hen. Taang lak hun hong tun’ ciangin, lopa teng bot masa un la, mei ah hal dingin lom hen un. Taang ahih leh, ka sal sungah hong koih un,’ ci-in taang late ka vaikhak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna adang inah, “Vantung Gam in, mi khat in lo lai-ah a cin’ ankamtang tawh kibang hi.
Ankamtang in tang khempeuh lakah a neupen hi. Ahih hangin a khan’ khit ciangin, ankung khempeuh sangin golzaw a, vana vasate in leengin a hiangah a tuang thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna adang a geninah, “Vantung Gam in numei khat in buhnel seeng thum a tawk khit matengin a sawh, silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tuate khempeuh thugentehna tawh mihonpite a hilh hi. Thugentehna loin thu a hilh kei hi.
Bang hang hiam i cih leh; “Ka kam ka-in thugentehna-in ka hilh ding hi. Lei pian’cil a kipan, thu ki-im khempeuh ka pulak ding hi,” ci-a Pasian’ kamsangte tungah a gensa a tun’ nading hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, mihonpi lak pan paikhia-in, inn sungah a lut khit ciangin, a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Lo lai-ah a po tahum kung gentehna thu a khiatna ko hong hilh tel in,” ci-in a dot uh leh, Zeisu in,
“Khaici vawhpa in Mihing Tapa hi.
Lo lai in leitung mite hi. Khaici hoih in Gam sung tate ahi uh hi. Tahum tang in gilomi’ tate ahi uh hi.
Tahum tang vawh galpa in dawimangpa hi. Taang lak hun in leitung bei nading hi. Taang la mite in vantungmite ahi uh hi.
Lopa kungte botkhia a, mei tawh a hal uh mah bangin, leitung a bei ciangin a piang ding hi.
Mihing Tapa in ama vantungmite sawl ding a, a khialte leh a puksakte khempeuh a Gam sung pan nilkhia-in,
meiphual sungah a khul ding uh hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.
Tua lai takin miphate in amau Pa’ Gam sungah ni bangin a taang ding uh hi. Zak nading bil a nei teng in na za ta un!”
“Vantung Gam in lo lai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Tua sum a mupa in khatvei seel kik a, lungdam mahmahin pai a, a neih khempeuh zuakin tua lo a va lei hi.”
“Vantung Gam in suang manpha a zong, sum zuakpa tawh kibang hi.
Tuapa in suang manpha pen a muh ciangin ciah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua suang manpha va lei hi.”
“Khatvei, Vantung Gam in tuili a, kipaai, ngasa nam tampi a awk thei ngeen tawh kibang hi.
Ngasa a dim tak a awk ciangin, ngabengte in tui geiah kaikhia uh a, tu-in nga a hoihte teelin bawm sungah a guang uh hi. Ngasa a hoih lo teng a pam khawng ah a paii uh hi.
Tua mah bangin leitung a bei ciangin, vantungmite hong kumsuk ding uh a, mi siangthote lakah a gilo teng lakhia-in meiphual sungah a khul ding uh hi.
Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Hih thu khempeuh note’n na thei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Ka thei khin uh hi,” a cih uh leh,
Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh, Vantung Gam thuzui a suak laithei khempeuh in sumkholna pan a thak leh a lui a lakhia thei inn teekpa tawh kibang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua bang thugentehna khempeuh a hilh khit ciangin, tua mun pan a paikhia hi.
Ama khua-ah a tun’ ciangin, kikhopna inn sungah thu hilh hi. Khuapihte in lamdang a sa uh hi. “Hihpa in hih bang pilna leh vangliatna koi pan a ngah hiam?
Amah in khutsiampa’ tapa hilo ahi hiam? A nu min Mari hilo ahi hiam? Ama sanggamte in Jakob, Josef, Simon, Judah te hilo ahi uh hiam?
Ama sanggamnute in i kiangah om hilo ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih leh, amah in hih thute khempeuh koi pan a ngah hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Amaute in amah hanginah a lungkia uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pasian’ kamsangpa in ama khua, ama inn longal mun dangah minthan’na ngah loin om lo hi,” ci-in amaute kiangah a ci hi.
A khuapihte in a thu um lo uh ahih ciangin tua san takah nalamdang tampi a bawl zo kei hi.
Tua lai takin Herod Kumpipa in Zeisu thu a zak ciangin,
“Tua pa in Baptaizpa Johan ahi hi. Amah in sihna pan a tho kik zo hi. Tua ahih ciangin, hih vangliatna in ama tungah ahih hi,” ci-in a nasemte kiangah a ci hi.
Herod in a nau Filip’ zi Herodias thu hangin Johan a matsak khit ciangin, henin, thong sungah a khia hi.
Bang hang hiam i cih leh, Johan in, “Tua numei na teen’pih ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in Herod kiangah a hilh hang hi.
Herod in Johan a thah nop hangin mihonpite in Johan Pasian’ kamsangpa hi sa uh ahih ciangin a lau hi.
Tua nung ciangin Herod a suah ni a tun’ ciangin pawi kham a, Herodias’ tanu in pawi khamna-ah a lam ciangin, Herod a nuam hi.
“Na hong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci-in thu a ciam hi.
Tua numei in a nu hilhna bangin, “Baptaizpa Johan’ lutang dalkuang sungah hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Kumpipa a dah hangin a kiciam zawhna leh, sabuaiah a tut khawmpihte a zahtak manin, “Pia ta un,” ci a,
mi khat sawl a, thong sungah Johan’ ngawng a tan sak hi.
A lutang dalkuang sungah koih a, tua numeino a piak leh, numeino in a nu kiangah a paipih hi.
Johan’ nungzuite hong pai-in a luang a la uh a, a vui khit uh ciangin Zeisu a ko uh hi.
Zeisu in a zak ciangin, gunkuang tungah tuangin gam daihna munah amah bek a pai hi. Mihonte in a theih uh ciangin khuapi, khuaneu panin paikhia uh a, lei lamah a delh uh hi.
Zeisu paikhia a, mihonpi a muh ciangin hehpih huai sa a, cinate khempeuh a damsak hi.
Nitak ciangin a nungzuite in Topa kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai tak in gampa lak ahi hi. Ni lah a tum zo hi. Hih mihonte khua sungah an lei dingin paisak ta in,” a va ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ka paisak nuam kei hi; amau nek ding an note’n na pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Khomun pum nga leh ngasa tawn nih longal a dang nek ding bangmah ka nei kei uh hi,” a cih uh ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Tua khomun leh ngasa hong paipih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin, “Mihonte lopa tungah tusak un,” a cih khit ciangin Zeisu in khomun nga leh ngasa tawn nih la a, vantung lam ento-in hehpihna a phat khit ciangin, khomun leh ngasa balnenin a nungzuite a pia hi. A nungzuite in zong mihonte a lui uh hi.
Mi khempeuhte in a ne uh a, a kham khit uh ciangin, khamval a neng a themte tawm uh a, seeng sawm leh seeng nih dim a ngah uh hi.
An ne mite in numei leh naupang sim loh pasal tul nga bang pha hi.
Zeisu in mihonte a paikhiatsak lai takin, a nungzuite gunkuangah thakhatin tuang sakin, a gal khatah a paisak masa hi.
Zeisu in mihonpite a paikhiatsak khit ciangin, thu ngen dingin mual tungah amah guak kahto a, nitak dongin a va om hi.
Gunkuang ahih leh, tuili laizangah om a, a deih lohna uh lam panin huih in lehmut ahih ciangin, tui nakpi-in kilok a, gunkuangah a tuangte in a gim uh hi.
Zingsang khuavak ma nai thum ciangin, Zeisu in tuili tungah a nungzuite kiangah va pai hi.
Tui tungah a pai, a nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin, “Sikha hi,” ci-in lau-in a kiko uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Na lungdam ta un; keimah ka hi hi, na lau kei un,” a cih pah leh,
Piter in, “Topa, nang na hih leh, kei zong nangma kiangah kong tun’ nading, tui tungah hong pai theisak in,” ci-in a nget ciangin,
“Hong pai in,” Zeisu in a ci hi. Piter gunkuang sung pan kum a, Zeisu kiang zuan dingin tui tungah a pai hi.
Ahih hangin huihpi nung a muh ciangin lau a, a tum dektak ciangin, “Topa aw, hong hon in,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Zeisu in thakhatin a khut zan a, Piter lenin, “Upna neupa aw, bang hangin um khial na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Gunkuang tungah a kahtoh ciangin, huih nung a dai hi.
Gunkuang sungah a omte in, “Pasian’ Tapa na hi takpi hi,” ci-in bokin a bia uh hi.
Tua gal khatah a kah khit uh ciangin, Gennesaret gamah a tung uh hi.
Tua munah a om mite in Topa’ meel thei uh ahih ciangin, a kimkot gam khempeuhah mi sawl uh a, cina khempeuh a samsak uh hi.
Cinate in Zeisu’ puan mongteep a lawn’ nadingun a ngen uh hi. A lawng khempeuhte in cidamna a ngah uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin, Jerusalem khua panin Farisaite leh laitheite Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a,
“Tanglai upate’ ngeina, na nungzuite in bang hangin palsat ahi uh hiam? Khut sil loin an a ne uh hi,” ci-in a ko uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in tanglai ngeina zui-in Pasian’ thukham bang hang palsat na hi uh hiam?
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa na zahtak in. A nu a pa a gensiate in sihna thuak ta hen,’ a ci hi.
Note na hih uh leh, ‘Keima kiangah na zat theih keima sum, Pasian ka pia zo hi,’ ci-in mi khat in a nu a pate zahtak kei ta hen,’ na ci uh hi.
Na tanglai ngeina uh zui-in, Pasian’ thukham na valmawk sak uh hi.
Isaiah in mi simtat note tungah a kituakin a gen khol hi. Isaiah a genna in:
“Hih mipawlte in amau’ kam uh tawh kei hong zahtak uh hangin, A lungsim uh, kei tawh kigamla hi.
Mite’ thukham a hilh uh a, A mawkna-in kei hong bia uh hi,” a ci hi.
